mcqs.question_en: IC stands for _____?

mcqs.question_en: CDMA stands for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: سی ڈی ایم اے کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation CDMA is a wireless communication technology that allows multiple signals to occupy a single transmission channel using unique codes. It improves efficiency and security in mobile networks.

mcqs.question_en: VDU stands for ______?
mcqs.question_ur: وی ڈی یو کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Computer Monitor is also called VDU . VDU (Visual Display Unit) refers to devices like monitors or screens that display output from a computer. It is an essential part of the user interface in computing.

mcqs.question_en: NIC stands for _______?
mcqs.question_ur: این آئی سی کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation NIC (Network Interface Card) is a hardware component that allows a computer to connect to a network. It enables communication over local area networks (LAN) or the internet.

mcqs.question_en: PIN stands for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: پن کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PIN is a short for a personal identification number. The PIN is a set of personal numbers used to prove positive identification. It is often used with automated bank teller machines, telephone calling cards, and accessing wireless networks.

mcqs.question_en: POP stands for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: پی او پی کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation POP (Post Office Protocol) is a protocol used to retrieve email from a mail server to a client's device. It is a popular protocol for receiving email . It is often used in conjunction with SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol) for sending email.

mcqs.question_en: OMR stands for ______?
mcqs.question_ur: او ایم آر کا مطلب ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation OMR stands for Optical Mark Recognition . It is a technology that uses light to identify marks made on a paper document , typically for data collection and processing.

mcqs.question_en: DFD stands for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈی ایف ڈی کا مطلب _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DFD stands for Data Flow Diagram . It is used to represent the flow of data in a system. It shows how data moves between processes, data stores, and external entities.

mcqs.explanation: Explanation Charles Babbage is known as the Father of the Computer . He was an inventor from the UK. He was born in 1791. He was died in 1871.

mcqs.question_en: In a computer processed data is known as
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر میں پروسیس شدہ ڈیٹا کو کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Process data is called information . Information is the result of processing raw data. Data is raw and unprocessed, while information is a processed version of data. Information can be stored in many forms, such as text, images, sound, and videos

mcqs.question_en: Which option in File pull-down menu is used to close a file in MS Word?

mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS word Minimum font size: 8 Maximum font size: 72 Standard font size: 12 Ms Word manually font size (1- 1638 ) Ctrl + Shift + P is used to change the font size To increase the font size, press Ctrl + ] . To decrease the font size, press Ctrl + [ .

mcqs.explanation: Explanation You can access the Fonts dialog box or use the tools in the Home tab in MS Word. • The list contains font size in points 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 14, 16, 18, 20, 22, 24, 26, 28, 36, 48 and 72. • Word supports font size between 1 and 1638.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel, by pressing Shift and Space keys at a time from the keyboard you can select?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں، کی بورڈ سے ایک وقت میں شفٹ اور اسپیس کیز کو دبانے سے آپ منتخب کر سکتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Pressing Shift + Space selects the entire row of the currently active cell in MS Excel. It is a quick way to highlight a row for formatting, deletion, or other operations . Other Related Shortcuts in MS Excel: Ctrl + Space : Selects the entire column of the active cell. Shift + Arrow Keys : Expands the selection of cells in the direction of the arrow keys. Ctrl + Shift + End : Selects all cells from the active cell to the last used cell in the worksheet. Ctrl + Shift + Down Arrow : Selects all rows from the active cell to the last data-filled cell in the column .

mcqs.question_en: COMPUTER stands for ________?

options: Competent Operated Machine Particularly Used for Technical Education and Research
Commonly Operated Machine Particularly Used for Technical Education and Research
Commonly Operated Machine Particularly Used for Trade Education and Research
Commonly Operated Machine Particularly Used for Technical Electron and Research
mcqs.correct_answer: Commonly Operated Machine Particularly Used for Technical Education and Research
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The term COMPUTER is often expanded as an acronym in educational contexts to highlight its technical and educational use . It captures the widely accepted expansion for learning purposes .

mcqs.question_en: OCR stands for ________?

mcqs.question_en: Which key is used to refresh all web pages?

mcqs.explanation: Explanation The F5 key is used to refresh the current web page in most web browsers. To refresh a page while ignoring cached content, you can use the Shift + F5 or Ctrl + Shift + r shortcut

mcqs.question_en: Microprocessor of a computer system is a ______?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر سسٹم کا مائکرو پروسیسر ایک ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A microprocessor is the central processing unit (CPU) of a computer. It is a hardware component that performs all arithmetic and logical operations.

mcqs.question_en: One Megabyte (MB) is equal to ____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک میگا بائٹ (ایم بی) کس کے برابر ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation One Megabyte ( MB ) is equal to: 1024 Kilobytes (KB) 1024 x 1024 Bytes (since 1 KB = 1024 Bytes) 1,048,576 Bytes (calculating 1024 x 1024)

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following appliances has Cathode Ray Tube? Television, Telephone, Fax Machine, Washing Machine
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا آلات کیتھوڈ رے ٹیوب ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Cathode Ray Tubes (CRT) are used in old television sets and computer monitors . They work by directing electron beams onto a screen to create images.

mcqs.question_en: What is the main function of the Drafts folder in Gmail?
options: To store emails that have been sent successfully.
To store incoming emails from other people.
To store emails that are written but not yet sent.
mcqs.correct_answer: To store emails that are written but not yet sent.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Drafts folder is a designated location for emails that have been c omposed or started but have not been sent yet. When you begin writing a new email but close it without clicking "Send," Gmail automatically saves it as a draft to prevent you from losing your work.

mcqs.question_en: What does SSL stand for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation SSL stands for Secure Socket Layer, It is a protocol used to authenticate, encrypt, and decrypt data over the internet.

mcqs.question_en: Which one can be used as watermark in a word document?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Transparent logos, text, or images are placed on documents and photographs as watermarks. The purpose of including a watermark is to ensure content authenticity and validity, as well as to safeguard confidential information and content from being copied. RK17123

mcqs.question_en: How do you select a chart in MS PowerPoint?

mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS PowerPoint, you can select a chart by single-clicking on it.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word 2007, which shortcut key is used to switch to Outline view?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ 2007 میں، آؤٹ لائن ویو پر جانے کے لیے کون سی شارٹ کٹ کی استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word 2007, the shortcut key ALT+CTRL+O is used to switch to Outline view. It allows users to organize and structure their document more effectively.

mcqs.question_en: What does the VLOOKUP function do in Excel?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل میں وی لُک اپ فنکشن کیا کرتا ہے؟
options: Searches for a value in a column and returns a value in the same row
mcqs.correct_answer: Searches for a value in a column and returns a value in the same row
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The VLOOKUP function in Excel is used to search for a value in the first column of a range And return a value in the same row from a specified column. It is commonly used for looking up data in a table or range.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel you can use a function to combine text from two cells into one cell. But you can use an operator to do the same thing. Which operator is that?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں آپ دو سیلز سے ٹیکسٹ کو ایک سیل میں جوڑنے کے لیے فنکشن استعمال کر سکتے ہیں۔  لیکن آپ ایک ہی کام کرنے کے لیے آپریٹر استعمال کر سکتے ہیں۔  وہ کون سا آپریٹر ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Ampersand (&) operator in MS Excel is used to concatenate (combine) text from two or more cells into one cell. For example, =A1 & B1 will combine the text in cells A1 and B1 into a single string.

mcqs.question_en: Reasons to use Macro in Microsoft Office ?

mcqs.question_en: Bookmarks work with ______?
mcqs.question_ur: بُک مارکس ______ کے ساتھ کام کرتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Bookmarks are used to link specific parts of a document. They work together with hyperlinks for easy navigation.

mcqs.question_en: “Email Forward” means?
options: To send an email to someone else
To save an email for later
mcqs.correct_answer: To send an email to someone else
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Email forwarding is the action of re-sending an email you receive to another person or multiple people. It allows the original message, including attachments and formatting, to be sent to new recipients who were not on the original email chain. You can forward an email as is or add your own comments, attachments, or edit the content before sending.

mcqs.question_en: Microsoft Word displays hyperlinks as a ________

mcqs.question_en: The freezing row and column in Excel is in which pane?

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following protocols helps to send emails?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا پروٹوکول ای میل بھیجنے میں مدد کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation E-mail stands for: Electronic Mail Father of E-mail: Ray Tomlinson First E-mail sent: 1971 @ is used to divide an email into: two parts SMTP helps to send: E-mails SMTP stands for: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol Received email is saved: inbox Sent email is saved in: sent box Maximum attachment size in Yahoo Email: 25 MB G-mail stands: Google Mail Email spam also called: junk email To close email account click: sign out To create new E-mail: Sign Up Email hacking means: Illegal access to open email accounts of others Junk email is also called: Spam At sign ( @ ): always a part of email address Sending an E-mail is similar to: writing a letter A allows us to access our e-mail from anywhere: Webmail interface Bookmark :  is associated with Internet E-mail

mcqs.question_en: What is phishing?
mcqs.question_ur: فشنگ کیا ہے؟
options: A method of encrypting data for security
Cybercrime involving fraudulent emails or messages to obtain sensitive information
A technique to speed up network connections
A way to block access to websites
mcqs.correct_answer: Cybercrime involving fraudulent emails or messages to obtain sensitive information
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Phishing is a type of cybercrime where attackers send fraudulent emails or messages designed to trick individuals into providing sensitive information, such as: Passwords Credit card numbers

mcqs.question_en: To send email, we use?
mcqs.question_ur: ای میل بھیجنے کے لئے، ہم کیا استعمال کرتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To send email, we use Outlook (or other email clients like Gmail, Yahoo, etc.). Email (Electronic Mail) is a way to send messages electronically via the internet. Email clients like Outlook, Gmail, Yahoo , etc. allow users to compose, send, and receive emails. Emails typically consist of a sender, recipient, subject, and message body. Emails can also include attachments , such as files or images. Email is a popular form of communication in personal and professional settings.

mcqs.question_en: Format painter in power point relates to :
mcqs.question_ur: پاور پوائنٹ میں فارمیٹ پینٹر سے متعلق ہے۔
options: To copy formatting from one object or piece of text and then applied it else where
To paint pretty pictures on your slides
To change the background colors of your slides
mcqs.correct_answer: To copy formatting from one object or piece of text and then applied it else where
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Format painter in power point relates to  c opy formatting from one object or piece of text and then applied it else where Use Format Painter to quickly apply the same formatting , such as color, font style and size, or border style, to multiple pieces of text or graphics. With format painter, you can copy all of the formatting from one object and apply it to another

mcqs.question_en: The shortcut key for the Past.
mcqs.question_ur: ماضی کے لیے شارٹ کٹ کلید۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The shortcut key for the Past is CTRL + V. The shortcut for copy command in MS Word is CTRL + C *** Some of the top shortcut keys in Microsoft Word are: Ctrl + S: Save Ctrl + C: Copy Ctrl + X: Cut Ctrl + V: Paste Ctrl + Z: Undo Ctrl + Y: Redo Ctrl + B: Bold Ctrl + I: Italic Ctrl + U: Underline Ctrl + F: Find

mcqs.question_en: DMS stands for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A document management system ( DMS ) It is a software solution that helps organizations store, organize, manage, and track digital documents and files

mcqs.question_en: ATM stands for ____?
mcqs.question_ur: اے ٹی ایم کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Automated Teller Machine (ATM) was invented by John Shepherd Barron . The first model was built and installed in London in 1967 . The first ATM in Pakistan was installed in the mid-1980s .

mcqs.question_en: In the OSI model, which layer is responsible for encryption and decryption?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Presentation layer converts data into a usable format for the application layer . It performs encryption and decryption to ensure secure data transfer.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following languages is used for webpage development?
mcqs.question_ur: ویب پیج ڈیولپمنٹ کے لیے درج ذیل میں سے کون سی زبان استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation HTML (Hypertext Markup Language) is the standard markup language used for creating web pages . It is the backbone of webpage development . It providing the structure and content that appears on the web.

mcqs.question_en: What does VIRUS stand for?
mcqs.question_ur: وائرس کا کیا مطلب ہے؟
options: Verified Information and Research Using Systems
mcqs.explanation: Explanation VIRUS stands for Vital Information Resources Under Siege , referring to malicious software that attacks computer systems. It highlights that a virus targets important information and disrupts normal functioning.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following correctly differentiates between an Inkjet printer and a Laser printer? Inkjet printers use liquid ink sprayed through nozzles; Laser printers use toner powder fused with heat., Inkjet printers are generally faster than Laser printers., Laser printers are less expensive per page than Inkjet printers., None of these
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون انکجیٹ پرنٹر اور لیزر پرنٹر کے مابین صحیح طور پر فرق کرتا ہے؟
options: Inkjet printers use liquid ink sprayed through nozzles; Laser printers use toner powder fused with heat.
Inkjet printers are generally faster than Laser printers.
Laser printers are less expensive per page than Inkjet printers.
mcqs.correct_answer: Inkjet printers use liquid ink sprayed through nozzles; Laser printers use toner powder fused with heat.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Inkjet printers : Spray tiny droplets of liquid ink directly onto paper. Laser printers : Use toner powder and heat/fuser to print, making them faster and cheaper per page for bulk printing.

mcqs.question_en: What is a solid-state drive (SSD) advantage over a hard disk drive (HDD)?
mcqs.question_ur: ہارڈ ڈسک ڈرائیو (ایچ ڈی ڈی) سے زیادہ ٹھوس ریاست ڈرائیو (ایس ایس ڈی) کیا فائدہ ہے؟
options: SSDs are faster and more durable than HDDs
mcqs.correct_answer: SSDs are faster and more durable than HDDs
mcqs.explanation: Explanation SSDs have no moving parts, making them faster, quieter, and more shock-resistant than HDDs . They offer quicker data access and better performance for tasks like booting and file transfer.

mcqs.question_en: Which of following shortcut keys is used to change the case in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی شارٹ کٹ کیز ایم ایس ورڈ میں کیس کو تبدیل کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The shortcut key to change case in MS-Word is: Shift + F3 There are five change cases in MS Word: Sentence Case Lowercase Uppercase Title Case Toggle Case

mcqs.question_en: Who invented the first computer?
mcqs.question_ur: پہلا کمپیوٹر کس نے ایجاد کیا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Charles Babbage is known as the Father of the Computer . He was an inventor from the UK. He was born in 1791. He was died in 1871.

mcqs.question_en: Which of following device can store large amount of data
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا آلہ بڑی مقدار میں ڈیٹا محفوظ کر سکتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Hard disk is an hardware component which is used to store large amounts of data. The primary characteristics of hard drive are its capacity and performance. ****** VU FIA CONSTABLE PAPER 2021

mcqs.question_en: In MS word short cut "Shift+Delete " is used to
options: Delete the selected item permanently without placing the item in recycle bin
Create a short cut to selected item
mcqs.correct_answer: Delete the selected item permanently without placing the item in recycle bin
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Shift + Delete in MS Word (and Windows generally) is used to: Delete the selected item permanently without placing the item in the Recycle Bin . This means the file or text bypasses the Recycle Bin and is removed immediately. Use with caution.

mcqs.question_en: Small files that are deposed on user's hard drive when they visit a website are best described as
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Cookies are text files with small pieces of data . like a username and password . That are used to identify your computer a s you use a computer network. Specific cookies known as HTTP cookies are used to identify specific users and improve your web browsing experience.

mcqs.question_en: A voice mailbox in a voice mail system is?
mcqs.question_ur: صوتی میل سسٹم میں ایک صوتی میل باکس کونسا ہے۔
options: Storage location on a hard disk
mcqs.correct_answer: Storage location on a hard disk
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A voice mailbox is a designated digital storage space within a voicemail system Those stores recorded voice messages for a specific individual or extension When they are unavailabl e to take a call. It acts as a digital substitute for an answering machine, Allowing users to receive, retrieve, and manage their voicemails from various locations and devices at their convenience.

mcqs.question_en: ____ is to protect data and passwords
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا اور پاس ورڈ کی حفاظت  کون کرتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Encryption is used to protect data and passwords by converting them into a secret code that can only be accessed with the correct decryption key. This process makes sensitive information unreadable to unauthorized parties, Protecting it both when it is stored (at rest) and when it is being sent over networks (in motion).

mcqs.question_en: The browser _____keep a list of web pages you have visited in the current session?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The browser history k eeps a list of web pages you have visited in the current session. It records the URL, title, and visit time, allowing you to go back to previous pages and use the back/forward buttons.

mcqs.question_en: A ___ certificate is a notice that grantee a user or a website is legitimate
mcqs.question_ur: کونسا سرٹیفکیٹ ایک نوٹس ہے جو کسی صارف یا ویب سائٹ کو دینے کے لیے جائز ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A digital certificate is a notice that guarantees a user or a Web site is legitimate

mcqs.question_en: Hard copy of a document refers to which of the following? Display copy , Resolved copy , Scanned copy , Printout
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A hard copy is a physical, printed version of a document, typically on paper. It is a tangible object that you can hold and touch, which distinguishes it from a digital or "soft" copy. The term printout is a common and accurate synonym for a hard copy.

mcqs.question_en: Within a browser what does a Home do?
options: Add your e-mail address to your e-mail message
Enter your home address into text box
Take you to the previously visited site
Display the content of your designated start page
mcqs.correct_answer: Display the content of your designated start page
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Home button or icon in a web browser is designed to take you directly to your designated start page (also called the homepage). This is usually the website you set as your default page when you open the browser. - Option (A) is incorrect because it’s about email, not browsing. - Option (B) is unrelated to browser functions. - Option (C ) describes the “Back” button, not “Home.”

mcqs.question_en: From which menu you can insert the Header and Footer?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Microsoft Word, headers and footers can b e inserted from the Insert menu. Within the Insert tab's "Header & Footer" group, options for Header, Footer, and Page Number are available .

mcqs.question_en: Which one of the following is not a search engine? Yahoo ,Windows, Google, Bing
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا سرچ انجن نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Windows , as it is an operating system and not a search engine. The provided Google, Yahoo, and Bing are examples of search engines. ND7-3-2023

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is a correct email format of Email address?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ای میل ایڈریس کا درست ای میل فارمیٹ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation there are two parts of A valid email address. email prefix an email domain , In the address example@mail.com, "example" is the email prefix, "mail.com" is the email domain.

mcqs.question_en: Within a browser what does a Home do?
options: Add your e-mail address to your e-mail message
Enter your home address into text box
Take you to the previously visited site
Display the content of your designated start page
mcqs.correct_answer: Display the content of your designated start page
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Home button or icon in a web browser is designed to take you directly to your designated start page (also called the homepage). This is usually the website you set as your default page when you open the browser. - Option (A) is incorrect because it’s about email, not browsing. - Option (B) is unrelated to browser functions. - Option (C ) describes the “Back” button, not “Home.”

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is a URL? (A) Netscape (B) Searchnet.com (C) Internet Explorer (D) www.yahoo.com
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A URL (Uniform Resource Locator) is a complete web address used to find a specific resource on the internet. It is the unique address you would type into a web browser's address bar to visit a website. www.yahoo.com is a classic example of a URL, consisting of a domain name (yahoo.com) and a subdomain (www).

mcqs.question_en: When you friend someone on a social networking site. What does this allow them to see?
options: the same as everyone else can see
They can see all of things you put on private so only friends can see
They can see just your picture
mcqs.correct_answer: They can see all of things you put on private so only friends can see
mcqs.explanation: Explanation When you friend someone on a social networking site, it usually means you give them access to content that you have restricted to “friends only” privacy settings. So: - (A) is wrong because friends typically see more than strangers. - (B) is correct because they can see all content you’ve shared privately with friends. - (C) is wrong because f riends see more than just your picture. - (D) is wrong because (A) and (C) ar e both incorrect.

mcqs.question_en: Optical Fiber System is utilized in _____?
mcqs.question_ur: آپٹیکل فائبر سسٹم _____ میں استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Optical Fiber Systems are utilized in Telecommunication Systems to transmit data as light signals through thin glass or plastic fibers. It enabling high-speed internet, voice, and data communications over long distances.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel if a numeric value start with ____ then this value can be treated as a table?Hash, Equal Sign, Apostrophe, Tide
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Excel, if a numeric value starts with = (Equal Sign) It is treated as a formula rather than a table. Tables in Excel are typically created by formatting a range of cells as a table using Ctrl + T or the "Format as Table" option.

mcqs.question_en: In which view headers and footers are visible?
mcqs.question_ur: کس منظر میں ہیڈر اور فوٹر نظر آتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Print Layout View header and footer are visible. **** Headers and footers appear only in print layout view , print preview, and in printed documents.

mcqs.question_en: The _____ option is used to show a specific row or column on every printed page.
mcqs.question_ur: آپشن ہر پرنٹ شدہ صفحہ پر مخصوص قطار یا کالم دکھانے کے لیے کیا استعمال ہوتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation How do I use Print titles in Excel? To print titles, execute the following steps. On the Page Layout tab, in the Page Setup group, click Print Titles. The Page Setup dialog box appears. To repeat row 1 at the top of each printed page, click in the corresponding box and select row 1. Click OK. ... On the File tab, click Print for a print preview.

mcqs.question_en: MS PowerPoint is example of _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس پاورپوائنٹ _____ کی مثال ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS PowerPoint is an example of Application software. *** Microsoft PowerPoint is a powerful slide show presentation program. The program utilizes slides to convey information rich in multimedia content . PowerPoint, a presentation program created by Robert Gaskins and Dennis , was released on May 30, 1990. ** The default font size in MS PowerPoint is 18

mcqs.question_en: A computer on internet is identified by its ______?
mcqs.question_ur: انٹرنیٹ پر کمپیوٹر کی شناخت اس کے ______ سے ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An IP address is a unique address that identifies a device on the Internet or a local network. IP stands for "Internet Protocol. " It is the set of rules governing the format of data sent vi a the Internet or local network. E-mail Address: This identifies a user's mailbox for sending and receiving email, not the computer itself. Street Address: This is a physical address and is not used to identify a computer on the internet. Login Password: This is used to authenticate a user and gain access to an account or device, not to identify the device on the network.

mcqs.question_en: Which of following software is used to prepare/create multimedia presentation?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا سافٹ ویئر ملٹی میڈیا پریزنٹیشن تیار کرنے/بنانے کے لئے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PowerPoint is a software specifically designed for creating slides and presentations. It is widely used for business, educational, and professional purposes.

mcqs.question_en: What term describes a picture that has been resized by a percentage?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی اصطلاح اس تصویر کی وضاحت کرتی ہے جس کا سائز فی صد تبدیل کیا گیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The number used to represent one unit length of a bar or one picture on a pictograph. Scaled Picture or Pictograph Graph DEFINE. A pictograph that uses a picture to represent more than one unit. Scaled Bar Graph DEFINE. A bar graph that uses intervals of more than one unit

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not a valid MS PowerPoint view?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا درست ایم۔ایس پاورپوائنٹ ویو نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The correct answer is: Reading page. MS PowerPoint has several built-in views, including: Normal view : The default view, where you can edit and design your slides. Notes Page view : A view that shows the slides with accompanying notes. Slide Sorter view : A view that shows thumbnails of all slides for easy organization. Slide Show view : A view that displays the presentation as a slideshow. There is no "Reading page" view in MS PowerPoint.

mcqs.question_en: MS Excel is a ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل ایک ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS Excel (Microsoft Excel) is a popular spreadsheet software program used for data analysis, calculation, and visualization. It allows users to create and edit spreadsheets, charts, and graphs. It is widely used in various fields such as business, finance, and education . MS Excel is a part of the Microsoft Office suite and is used for: Data entry and management Calculations and formulas Chart and graph creation Data analysis and visualization Budgeting and forecasting In MS Excel you can enter 3 types of Data in a cell,labels, values and formulas.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not an application software? WinWord XP ,Page Maker, Windows NT, None of these
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ایپلیکیشن سافٹ ویئر نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Windows NT is a proprietary graphical operating system produced by Microsoft . It is the first version of which was released on July 27, 1993.

mcqs.question_en: …… is a computer software whose user interface and API resembles that of printer driver?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An application programming interface is a connection between computers or between computer programs. It is a type of software interface, offering a service to other pieces of software.

mcqs.question_en: Shortcut Key of Undo Typing is __________?
mcqs.question_ur: ٹائپنگ کی شارٹ کٹ کلید کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + Z = Undo Ctrl + P = Print Ctrl + Y = Redo Ctrl + S = Save Ctrl + C in MS Word is used for the Copy command Ctrl + V  used for = Past Ctrl + C  used for = Copy Ctrl + X used for = Cut Ctrl + Y used for = Redo *************** vu FIA CBT PA PER 15-12-2021 ND30-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: The Headquarters of Google located in the city ________?
mcqs.question_ur: گوگل کا صدر دفتر کس شہر میں واقع ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Headquarters of Google is located in the city: of California Google, a US multinational technology company Google is a type of search engine operating since 1997 it was founded in the year: September 4, 1998 it was founded by Sergey Brin & Larry Page Sergey Brin is the real owner of Google ND07-3-2023

mcqs.question_en: “Add or Remove programs” is a(an) ……?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Utility software is software designed to help analyze, configure, optimize or maintain a computer.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word 2007, to select a column of the table from bottom to top, press?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word 2007, to select a column in a table from bottom to top, you can use: SHIFT + ALT + PAGE UP

mcqs.question_en: PRINT INPUT is?
mcqs.question_ur: پرنٹ ان پٹ کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In linguistics, syntax is the study of how words and morphemes combine to form larger units such as phrases and sentences.

mcqs.question_en: CPU is an example of ?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The CPU performs basic arithmetic, logic, controlling, and input/output (I/O) operations specified by the instructions in the program.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not an example of a Web Browser?  Chrome Safari ,Internet Explorer, Microsoft Office
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ویب براؤزر کی مثال نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Google Chrome, Safari & Internet Explorer are examples of Web Browser. Microsoft Office is an example of software.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following are the components of Central Processing Unit (CPU)?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا سنٹرل پروسیسنگ یونٹ (سی پی یو) کے اجزاء ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The main components of a Central Processing Unit (CPU) are the control unit, arithmetic logic unit, and register set. Other components include the cache, clock, and buses.

mcqs.question_en: A set of information that defines the status of resources allocated to a process is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: معلومات کا ایک مجموعہ جو کسی عمل کے لئے مختص وسائل کی حیثیت کی وضاحت کرتا ہے وہ ____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A set of information that defines the status of resources allocated to a process of process description . A process description is a set of information that describes the characteristics of a process in terms that will enable its effective installation, commissioning, operation, control and maintenance.

mcqs.question_en: 1 byte is equal to _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک (1) بائٹ کس کے برابر ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation 1 byte equals 8 bits. Additional Information 1024 Bytes = 1 Kilobyte (KB) 1024 Kilobytes = 1 Megabyte (MB) 1024 Megabytes = 1 Gigabyte (GB) 1024 Gigabytes = 1 Terabyte (TB)

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is invalid type of memory in computer? RAM (Random-Access Memory), ROM (Read-Only Memory), EPROM (Erasable Programmable Read-Only Memory), PRAM (Programmable Read Access Only Memory)
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا کمپیوٹر میں میموری کی غلط قسم ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PRAM as “ Programmable Read Access Only Memory ” is not a valid or recognized memory type in computers. RAM, ROM, and EPROM are all valid and standard memory types used in computing.

mcqs.question_en: Software required to run the hardware is known as _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ہارڈ ویئر کو چلانے کے لئے درکار سافٹ ویئر _____ کے نام سے جانا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A device driver is software that allows the operating system to communicate with hardware devices. Without drivers , the hardware cannot function properly or be recognized by the computer.

mcqs.question_en: The section of the CPU that is responsible for performing mathematical operations is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: سی پی یو کا وہ حصہ جو ریاضی کی کارروائیوں کو انجام دینے کے لئے ذمہ دار ہے وہ ____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The section of the CPU responsible for performing mathematical operations is the ALU (Arithmetic Logic Unit). The ALU is specifically designed to handle arithmetic calculations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division , as well as logical operations like comparisons.

mcqs.question_en: When a key pressed on keyboard, which standard is used for converting keystroke into the corresponding bits? ISO, ANSI, EBCDIC, None of these
mcqs.question_ur: جب کی بورڈ پر دبایا جانے والا ایک کلید ، جس کا معیار اسی بٹس میں کی اسٹروک کو تبدیل کرنے کے لئے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The ANSI (American National Standards Institute) standard is used to convert keyboard keystrokes into corresponding binary codes. It ensures a consistent representation of characters across computers and software.

mcqs.question_en: Ctrl + L Shortcut key is used for _____?
options: Left Align (Align the selected text or line to the left)
mcqs.correct_answer: Left Align (Align the selected text or line to the left)
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Pressing Ctrl + L in Microsoft Word left-aligns the selected text or paragraph . It is a quick shortcut for formatting text without using the alignment buttons in the toolbar.

mcqs.question_en: The shortcut key Ctrl + K is used for ____?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The shortcut key Ctrl + K is used to insert a hyperlink in many applications. It opens a dialog where you can add or edit a link. Ctrl + Shift + K formats letters as small caps in many text editing applications.

mcqs.question_en: Ctrl + M Shortcut is used in Microsoft Word to?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + M in Microsoft Word is used to increase the left indent of a paragraph . It allows quick paragraph alignment adjustment without manually dragging the ruler.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is known as the language made up of binary-coded instructions? High-Level Language, Machine Language, C++, None of these
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون بائنری کوڈڈ ہدایات پر مشتمل زبان کے نام سے جانا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Machine language consists of binary-coded instructions ( 0s and 1s ) that a computer can directly execute. High-level languages like C++ need to be translated into machine language before execution.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is the correct definition of Computer? Computer understands only binary language which is written in the form of 0s & 1s, Computer is a programmable electronic device that stores, retrieves, and processes the data, Computer is a machine or device that can be programmed to perform arithmetical or logic operation, All of these
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا کمپیوٹر کی صحیح تعریف ہے؟
options: Computer understands only binary language which is written in the form of 0s & 1s
Computer is a programmable electronic device that stores, retrieves, and processes the data, Computer is a machine or device that can be programmed to perform arithmetical or logic operation
Computer is a machine or device that can be programmed to perform arithmetical or logic operation
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A computer is a programmable electronic device that can store, retrieve, and process data. It understands only binary language (0s & 1s). It can perform arithmetical and logical operations.

mcqs.question_en: What is an other name for junk Email?
mcqs.question_ur: فضول ای میل کا دوسرا نام کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Spam is another name for junk Email junk email refers to unsolicited email messages, usually sent in bulk to a large list of recipients. *** Computer important Information: E-mail stands for: Electronic Mail Father of E-mail: Ray Tomlinson First E-mail sent: 1971 @ is used to divide an email into: two parts SMTP helps to send: E-mails SMTP stands for: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol Received email is saved: inbox Sent email is saved in: sent box Maximum attachment size in Yahoo Email: 25 MB G-mail stands: Google Mail Email spam also called: junk email To close email account click: sign out To create new E-mail: Sign Up Email hacking means: Illegal access to open email accounts of others Junk email is also called: Spam At sign ( @ ): always a part of email address Sending an E-mail is similar to: writing a letter A allows us to access our e-mail from anywhere: Webmail interface Bookmark :  is associated with Internet E-mail

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is the oldest search engine? Google, Yahoo, MSN Search, Alta Vista
mcqs.question_ur: سب سے پرانا سرچ انجن ________ ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation AltaVista: While not the very first search engine, it was one of the earliest widely used search engines, launched in 1995. Google : Although widely used today, Google wa s founded later in 1998. Yahoo: Yahoo was also founded later than AltaVista, in 1994. MSN Search: MSN Search was launched even later, in 2005.

mcqs.question_en: Which number key is used with shift to type %?
mcqs.question_ur: شفٹ ٹو ٹائپ % کے ساتھ کون سی نمبر کلید استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Shift key ⇧ Shift is a modifier key on a keyboard, used to type capital letters and other alternate " upper" characters. There are typically two shift keys , on the left and right sides of the row below the home row.

mcqs.question_en: The artificial intelligence chatbot "Bard" is developed by _____?
mcqs.question_ur: مصنوعی ذہانت کا چیٹ بوٹ "بارڈ" _____ کے ذریعہ تیار کیا گیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Bard is an AI chatbot developed by Google . It was later rebranded as part of Google’s Gemini AI platform.

mcqs.question_en: In computing, NOS stand for?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹنگ میں، این او ایس کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation NOS stands for Network Operating System. It is software that manages network resources and allows computers to communicate within a network. Such as file sharing and printer access.

mcqs.question_en: Which type of Computer Program would be used to design an invitation card?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Desktop Publishing (DTP) software is used for designing and creating visually rich documents, such as: Invitation cards Flyers Brochures Posters - It allows precise control over layout, fonts, colors, and images. - Examples include Adobe InDesign, Microsoft Publisher, and Canva. - Word processing tools (like MS Word) are more for text documents, not advanced graphic design. - Simulation and Virtual Reality are unrelated to card designing.

mcqs.question_en: A program that time destroy all of your computer programs is called____
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A program designed to destroy data and spread to other computers is called a virus, It is malicious software that damages data.

mcqs.question_en: The transfer of data from one place to another is called?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا کی ایک جگہ سے دوسری جگہ منتقلی کو کیا کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The transfer of data from one place to another is called data communication . It involves sending data through a communication medium like cables or wireless signals.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not a major reason for an email bounce?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ٹاپ لیول ڈومین ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An email bounce usually occurs due to issues like a bad domain name or a bad user account name. However, a temporary issue like the domain server being down is not a major or common cause for permanent email bounce.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel, which function automatically total a column or row of values?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں، کون سا فنکشن خود بخود ایک کالم یا قطار کی قدروں کو مکمل کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation All important questions about " MS EXCEL" Microsoft Excel is a spreadsheet application launched in 1985 by the Microsoft Corporation. MS-Excel uses the _____ function when creating a data table. spreadsheet **** Which of the following functions in Microsoft Excel is used to count items in a cell range? Count *** In MS Excel, which function automatically total a column or row of values? SUM *** MS Excel's function arguments are always written in----------? Parenthesis *** In MS Excel, which function automatically totals a column or row of values? SUM **** Columns in MS Excel are called? Fields *** Constant value in excel also called? Number *** Ctrl +D in MS Excel? Fill down in the selection *** Ctrl+R is used in Excel too? Fill the selection with active cells to the right *** MOD () function is used in MS Excel to get Remainder **** ND30-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: Shortcut key to close an application or a window _____?
mcqs.question_ur: کسی ایپلیکیشن یا ونڈو کو بند کرنے کے لیے شارٹ کٹ کلید کونسی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Alt + F4 keyboard shortcut to close an app or program on Windows Confused question Ctrl+F4 is the shortcut key to an application or a window Alt + F4: Close the current app or window. Alt + Tab : Switch between open apps or windows. ND 19-3-2023

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following way cannot be used to link excel worksheet data to a Word document?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل ورک شیٹ ڈیٹا کو ورڈ دستاویز سے جوڑنے کے لیے درج ذیل میں سے کون سا طریقہ استعمال نہیں کیا جا سکتا؟
options: With the copy and paste buttons on the standard toolbar
With the copy and paste special commands
mcqs.explanation: Explanation With a hyperlink cannot be used to link Excel worksheet data to a Word document for dynamic updates. Hyperlinks can only direct to the Excel file but do not embed or link data directly.

mcqs.question_en: Shortcut keys to switch to the next windows?
mcqs.question_ur: اگلی ونڈوز میں کون سی شارٹ کٹ کیز کو تبدیل کرنا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Pressing Alt + Tab lets you switch between your open Windows.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word 2018 which of the following is not present in insert menu?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The "Columns" command is found in the Layout tab (or "Page Layout" tab in some older versions) of Microsoft Word, not the "Insert" tab. The Layout tab is primarily for setting up a document's overall page format, such as margins, orientation, and columns.

mcqs.question_en: Which shortcut key inserts a new slide in current presentation?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی شارٹ کٹ کلید موجودہ پریزنٹیشن میں نئی سلائیڈ داخل کرتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + N shortcut key used to Create a new presentation document Ctrl + M shortcut key used for Insert a new slide Ctrl + S shortcut key used to save a presentation **

mcqs.question_en: Common name for software errors is called _____?
mcqs.question_ur: سافٹ ویئر کی خرابیوں کا عام نام کیا کہلاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A bug is a flaw in a software's code that can lead to errors ranging from minor glitches to critical system crashes. The term "bug" was popularized in the 1940s When Grace Hopper discovered an actual moth was causing an issue in a computer's relay The process of finding and fixing these bugs is called debugging.

mcqs.question_en: Mouse of a computer system is ______?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر سسٹم کا ماؤس ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A mouse is a physical input device used to interact with the computer. Being a tangible device , it is classified as hardware .

mcqs.question_en: The unit to measure the speed of a microprocessor of a computer is ______?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کے مائکرو پروسیسر کی رفتار کی پیمائش کرنے کے لئے یونٹ ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The speed of a microprocessor is measured in Hertz (Hz), which indicates cycles per second . Modern processors are usually rated in Megahertz (MHz) or Gigahertz (GHz).

mcqs.question_en: VRML stands for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation VRML ( Virtual Reality Modeling Language ) It is a standard file format for representin g 3-dimensional (3D) interactive vector graphics, Designed particularly with the World Wide Web in mind. X3D has superseded it. Originally —before 1995

mcqs.question_en: SEO stands for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Search engine optimization ( SEO ) It is the process of improving the quality and quantity of website traffic to a website or a web page from search engines.

mcqs.question_en: IP stands for ________?
mcqs.question_ur: آئی پی سے کیا مراد ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation IP stands for " Internet Protocol ". It is the set of rules governing the format of data sent via the internet or local network.

mcqs.question_en: LAN stands for ________?
mcqs.question_ur: ایل اے این کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation LAN stands for local area network It is a collection of devices connected together in one physical location For example" school laboratory university campus office building. LAN covers can be small or large from home network and enterprise network Additional Information WAN stands for wide area network. MAN stands for Metropolitan Area WANs and MANs connect many LANs together WANs and MANs cover a large geographical area ND27-8-2023

mcqs.question_en: HTML is an abbreviation for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایچ ٹی ایم ایل _____ کے لئے ایک مخفف ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation HTML is used to create a web page **** HTML is an abbreviation for Hypertext Markup Language It is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser. *************** The tag in HTML stands for underline, and it's used to underline the text enclosed within the tag

mcqs.question_en: DNS stands for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈی این ایس کا مطلب ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DNS stands for Domain Name System *** DNS is a naming database in which internet domain names are located. ********* VU FIA ASSISTANT PAST PAPER 01-01-2022 ****** RY 15-01-2023

mcqs.question_en: What does the term HTTPS means?
mcqs.question_ur: ایڇ۔ٹی۔ٹی۔پی۔ایس کی اصطلاح کا کیا مطلب ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation HTTPS ( Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure ) is an extension of the Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) used for secure communication over the internet. It combines HTTP with an additional security layer, typically Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) or Transport Layer Security (TLS), to encrypt and protect the data being transmitted between a website and a user's browser.

mcqs.question_en: ROM stands for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: روم کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ROM stands for read-only memory .. It is The devices are used for the storage of data that does not require modification ROM is a non-volatile memory that permanently stores instructions for your computer. .. RAM stands for random access memory PROM stands for Programmable Read-Only Memory. WINDOWS stands for Wide Interactive Network Development for Office work solution ****** VU FIA CONSTABLE PAPER 2021 ** ND13-1-2023

mcqs.question_en: CAD stands for _______?
mcqs.question_ur: سی اے ڈی کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation CAD, or CADD, is short for computer-aided design or c omputer-aided design and drafting. CAD is a software used in the computer systems by: Engineers Architects Drafters Artists

mcqs.question_en: Which is the fastest supercomputer in the world?
mcqs.question_ur: دنیا کا تیز ترین سپر کمپیوٹر کون سا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In May 2022, Frontier Supercomputer of USA beat Japan`s Fugaku to become world fastest supercomputer.

mcqs.question_en: Which is the fastest Memory of a Computer?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کی تیز ترین میموری کون سی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Cache memory is also called CPU memory. Cache memory is the fastest. It is located close to the CPU . It temporarily stores frequently used data for quick access by the processor .

mcqs.question_en: Which was the first programming language ever developed?
mcqs.question_ur: اب تک تیار ہونے والی پہلی پروگرامنگ لینگویج کونسی تھی؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation FORTRAN (Formula Translation), developed in 1957 by John Backus and his team at IBM, It is considered the first high-level programming language. It was designed for scientific and engineering calculations.

mcqs.question_en: The capacity of Floppy disk is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: فلاپی ڈسک کی گنجائش _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A typical floppy disk can store up to 1.44 megabytes of data. There are 3 types of Floppy: 1. 8 Inch floppy 2. Mini floppy 3. Micro floppy

mcqs.question_en: ADSL stands for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ADSL stands for Asymmetric Digital Subscriber Line It is a type of DSL (Digital Subscriber Line) technology That allows high-speed internet access over regular telephone lines, Where download speeds are faster than upload speeds

mcqs.question_en: ALGOL stands for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ALGOL (Algorithmic Language) It is a high-level programming language Developed in the 1950s .

mcqs.question_en: ALU stands for what?
mcqs.question_ur: اے ایل یو کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An arithmetic logic unit  is a digital circuit used to perform arithmetic and logic operations . It represents the fundamental building block of the central processing unit (CPU) of a computer. Modern CPUs contain very powerful and complex ALUs. *******

mcqs.question_en: A programmer is a _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک پروگرامر _____ ہے؟
options: Technology specialist who writes software to match user requirements
Person who oversees the project from beginning to end
mcqs.correct_answer: Technology specialist who writes software to match user requirements
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A programmer is primarily focused on coding and developing software applications based on specific requirements provided by users or organizations. Additional Points : Programmers are skilled in programming languages like Python, Java, C++, etc . They often work on debugging, testing , and optimizing code to ensure it runs efficiently.

mcqs.question_en: RTF stands for:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation RTF stands for Rich Text Format It is a universal document file format and is easily read by many of the word-processing packages.

mcqs.question_en: Which language is commonly used for writing/developing business applications?
mcqs.question_ur: کاروباری ایپلی کیشنز لکھنے کے لیے عام طور پر کون سی زبان استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation COBOL stands for Common Business-Oriented Language It is a programming language specifically designed for business, finance, and administrative systems. It was designed in 1959 by CODASYL And was partly based on the programming language FLOW-MATIC Designed by Grace Hopper Stable release: ISO/IEC 1989: 2023 / 2023

mcqs.question_en: What are the shortcut keys to paste special?
mcqs.question_ur: خصوصی پیسٹ کرنے کے لیے شارٹ کٹ کیز کیا ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: The Shortcut key to split a table in MS Word is _________?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں ٹیبل کو تقسیم کرنے کی شارٹ کٹ کلید _________ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The shortcut key to split a table in ms-word is ctrl + shift + enter.

mcqs.question_en: Minimum and maximum font size in MS Word is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں فونٹ کا کم سے کم اور زیادہ سے زیادہ سائز _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS Word Minimum font size : 8 Maximum font size : 72 Standard font size : 12 MS Word manually font size (1-1638) Ctrl + Shift + P is used to change the font size. To increase the font size, press Ctrl + ]. To decrease the font size, press Ctrl + [.

mcqs.question_en: What number system is used in computers?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر میں کس نمبر کا نظام استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The binary numbering system is used in computing. Binary system is used because it's the simplest counting method available.

mcqs.question_en: A system software that translates high-level language source code into machine-level object code is called _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک سسٹم سافٹ ویئر جو اعلی سطح کے زبان کے ماخذ کوڈ کو مشین لیول آبجیکٹ کوڈ میں ترجمہ کرتا ہے اسے _____ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A compiler is system software that translates the entire high-level language source code into machine-level object code at once. It checks for errors during translation and produces a separate executable file.

mcqs.question_en: What is the Extension of MS Word documents?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ دستاویزات کی توسیع کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DOCX is the newer version of DOC, the original official Microsoft Word file format. Microsoft Word 97 - 2003 Document extension (.doc). Microsoft Word 2007 to till date Document extension (.docx). *** More Details .xls extension of Excel, .ppt extension of PowerPoint, .txt extension of Text files, .pdf extension of Portable Document Format.

mcqs.question_en: Which tab in MS Word contains options for formatting text?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں کون سا ٹیب متن کو فارمیٹ کرنے کے اختیارات پر مشتمل ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Home tab contains text formatting tools like font style, size, color, bold, italics, and alignment . It is the main tab used for editing and styling text .

mcqs.question_en: Errors from computer hardware and software cab be identifying and removed by which process?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر ہارڈویئر اور سافٹ وئیر کی خامیوں کو کس عمل سے پہچانا اور دور کیا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Debugging is the process of finding and fixing errors or bugs in the source code of any software. Sometimes thes e mistakes are referred to as " bugs."

mcqs.question_en: Which key is used to edit the selected cell in excel?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل میں منتخب سیل کو ایڈٹ کرنے کے لیے کون سی کلید استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation F2 function key is used to edit the content of a cell in MS-Excel.

mcqs.question_en: Name AI powered tool which can be used in Excel?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The AI-powered tool among the options that can be used with Excel is Tableau . Tableau has integrated AI features (like Ask Data, Explain Data ) that help in analyzing and visualizing data , including data imported from Excel.

mcqs.question_en: The use of computer is attractive because of its _____?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Computers are fast (Speed), precise (Accuracy), and dependable (Reliability). These qualities make their use attractive in various tasks.

mcqs.question_en: Shift + Enter shortcut key is used for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Shift + Enter shortcut key used for manual line break.

mcqs.question_en: What is the file extension for python files?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation .py Used for writing Python programs. Python was created by Guido van Rossum in 1991. More Details .cpp extension of C++, .java extension of Java, .html extension of Web, .docx extension of Word

mcqs.question_en: How many decisions can be handled using if-else-else?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation If-else-if structures can handle multiple decisions. You can chain as many conditions .

mcqs.question_en: Which key is used to start a new paragraph in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں نیا پیراگراف شروع کرنے کے لیے کون سی کلید استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Enter key is used to start a new paragraph in MS Word ***** Most repeated questions about shortcut key Goes to the beginning of the current line = Home Goes to beginning of document = Ctrl + Home Goes to end of current line = End Goes to end of document = Ctrl + End Highlights from the current position to the beginning of line = Shift + Home Highlights from current position to end of line = Shift + End Cut selected item = Shift + Del & Ctrl + X Copy selected item = Ctrl + C Paste selected item = Ctrl + V

mcqs.question_en: What is the largest font size available in the font size tool on formatting toolbar?
mcqs.question_ur: فارمیٹنگ ٹول بار پر فونٹ سائز ٹول میں دستیاب سب سے بڑا فونٹ سائز کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation You can access the Fonts dialog box or use the tools in the Home tab in MS Word. • The list contains font size in points 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 14, 16, 18, 20, 22, 24, 26, 28, 36, 48 and 72. • Word supports font size between 1 and 1638.

mcqs.question_en: Line spacing refers to ______?
mcqs.question_ur: لائن اسپیسنگ سے مراد کیا ہے؟
options: The space between the lines of text
mcqs.correct_answer: The space between the lines of text
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Line spacing is the vertical space between lines of text in a document . It helping to improve readability and layout.

mcqs.question_en: The amount of vertical space between lines of text in a document is called___________?
mcqs.question_ur: کسی دستاویز میں متن کی لکیروں کے درمیان عمودی جگہ کی مقدار کو ___________ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Line spacing determines the amount of vertical space between lines of text in a paragraph. By default, lines are single-spaced, meaning that the spacing accommodates the largest font in that line, plus a small amount of extra space.

mcqs.question_en: In which generation was the one-line computer popular?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The third generation of computers (roughly 1964-1971) It is associated with the development an d widespread use of integrated circuits (ICs), They allowed for smaller, faster, an d more powerful computers. This era also saw the emergence of online real-time systems, making them a defining characteristic of this generation.

mcqs.question_en: A computer does not boot if it doesn't have?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A computer will not boot if it doesn't have an operating system (OS) Because the OS is the essential software that manages all hardware and software resources. Without an OS, the computer's basic firmware, like the BIOS, can only start up and run very simple diagnostics. The error message "Operating System not found" indicates the computer cannot locate the software needed to run.

mcqs.question_en: Ctrl + D shortcut key is used for _____ in MS Word document.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + D is used to open the Font dialog box in MS Word. It where you can change font settings. Bold: Ctrl + B Alignment : Ctrl + E (Center) Ctrl + L (Left) Ctrl + R (Right) Justification : Ctrl + J

mcqs.question_en: Ctrl + D in MS Excel is used for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Microsoft Excel, Ctrl+D is the keyboard shortcut for the "Fill Down" command.
