mcqs.explanation: Explanation An index helps the database quickly locate rows in a table without scanning the entire data. It improves query performance by providing direct pointers to the data rows.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following technique for deadlock recovery is easily regarding CPU?
mcqs.question_ur: تعطل کی بازیابی کے لئے مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی تکنیک آسانی سے سی پی یو کے بارے میں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Process termination is the easiest method for deadlock recovery as it directly frees resources by ending one or more processes. Although effective, it may cause loss of work and should be used carefully.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following operating system is multitasking and command drivers?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا آپریٹنگ سسٹم ملٹی ٹاسکنگ اور کمانڈ ڈرائیور ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation UNIX is a multitasking operating system that supports multiple users and command-line interface (command drivers). It is widely used in servers and academic environments due to its robustness and flexibility.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following computers are most powerful and used in research laboratories?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا کمپیوٹر سب سے زیادہ طاقتور اور تحقیقی لیبارٹریوں میں استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Supercomputers are the most powerful computers, capable of performing trillions of calculations per second . They are used in research laboratories for complex tasks like climate modeling, simulations, and scientific research.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is an example of a Visual programming language?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا بصری پروگرامنگ زبان کی مثال ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Scratch is a visual programming language where users create programs by dragging and connecting code blocks. It is mainly used for educational purposes to teach programming concepts in a simple , interactive way.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is an application of Robots?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون روبوٹ کا اطلاق ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Robots are widely used in automobile manufacturing for tasks like assembling cars with precision and speed. This is a key application of industrial robotics in automation and production lines.

mcqs.question_en: If you want to receive data transmission speed of 100 Mbps in a building, then which of the following transmission medium you will use ______?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ کسی عمارت میں 100 ایم بی پی ایس کی ڈیٹا ٹرانسمیشن کی رفتار حاصل کرنا چاہتے ہیں تو پھر آپ مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ٹرانسمیشن میڈیم استعمال کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Unshielded Twisted Pair (UTP) cable, especially Cat5 or Cat5e , supports data transmission speeds up to 100 Mbps or more. It is widely used in buildings for Ethernet networks due to its cost-effectiveness and reliability.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is an employee "Physics" stored in database then which option is correct regarding absolute domains of databases?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ملازم "طبیعیات" ڈیٹا بیس میں محفوظ ہے پھر ڈیٹا بیس کے مطلق ڈومینز کے بارے میں کون سا آپشن درست ہے؟
options: This name does not satisfy semantic description of "Name" attribute
This name satisfies the semantic description of "Name" attribute
This is a valid name shared in database
mcqs.correct_answer: This name does not satisfy semantic description of "Name" attribute
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In databases , semantic description defines what kind of data an attribute should store. Storing " Physics " as an employee name violates the expected semantic meaning of a name (e.g., " John ", " Ali ").

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following unit is used to increase bandwidth of analog signal?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا یونٹ ینالاگ سگنل کی بینڈوتھ کو بڑھانے کے لئے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Hertz (Hz) is the unit used to measure the frequency of an analog signal , and higher frequency means higher bandwidth. Bandwidth in analog signals refers to the range of frequencies, which is expressed in Hertz.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is the correct statement to print a string in C programming?
mcqs.question_ur: سی پروگرامنگ میں اسٹرنگ کو پرنٹ کرنے کے لئے مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا صحیح بیان ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation printf() is the standard function in C to print output to the screen. The syntax must include double quotes around the string and end with a semicolon .

mcqs.question_en: If you want to display one of the cheapest and most affective network architecture in a building then which of the following network architecture you will apply?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ کسی عمارت میں سب سے سستا اور سب سے زیادہ متاثر کن نیٹ ورک فن تعمیر میں سے ایک کو ظاہر کرنا چاہتے ہیں تو آپ مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا نیٹ ورک فن تعمیر درخواست دیں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Peer-to-Peer (P2P) network is cheap and simple to set up, as it doesn’t require a dedicated server. It's ideal for small networks within a building where each computer shares resources equally.

mcqs.question_en: Which option in the following best explains Signals with reference to Linux Interprocess Communication (LPC)?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں کون سا آپشن لینکس انٹرپروسیس مواصلات (ایل پی سی) کے حوالے سے سگنل کی وضاحت کرتا ہے؟
options: Signals are asynchronous messages sent to a process
Signals provide communication with external devices
Signals eliminate the page faults in operating system
mcqs.correct_answer: Signals are asynchronous messages sent to a process
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Linux Interprocess Communication (IPC), signals are used to notify a process that a particular event has occurred. They are asynchronous , meaning they can arrive at any time, regardless of what the process is doing.

mcqs.question_en: What does the getche() function do in C/C++?
mcqs.question_ur: سی آر سی پلس پلس میں گیٹ سی ایچ () فنکشن کیا کرتا ہے؟
options: It will display the character on the screen that user has entered
It reads a character from the keyboard without displaying it on the screen
It reads a string from the user
mcqs.correct_answer: It will display the character on the screen that user has entered
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The getche() function in C/C++ (from the <conio.h> library) performs two actions: Reads a single character from the keyboard (immediately, without waiting for Enter). Echoes (displays) the character on the screen.

mcqs.question_en: Consider a laser printer task on a network. This printer cannot be taken away from one process to another process in the middle of printing job. This scenario is called _____?
mcqs.question_ur: کسی نیٹ ورک پر لیزر پرنٹر ٹاسک پر غور کریں۔  اس پرنٹر کو پرنٹنگ کی نوکری کے وسط میں ایک عمل سے دوسرے عمل میں نہیں لیا جاسکتا۔  اس منظر کو _____ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A non-preemptive resource cannot be forcibly taken from a process once it has been allocated — like a printer mid-task . The resource is released only when the current process finishes using it.

mcqs.question_en: If you want to connect two nearby situated buildings then which of the following type of network you will use?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ قریب کی دو عمارتوں کو جوڑنا چاہتے ہیں تو آپ مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا نیٹ ورک استعمال کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation LAN is ideal for connecting computers in closely located buildings , such as within a campus or office block. It offers high speed and cost-effective connectivity over short distances.

mcqs.question_en: If you have to remove some error from PROM (Programmable Read-Only Memory), which of the following technique you will use?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ کو پی روم (صرف پڑھنے کے قابل میموری) سے کچھ غلطی ختم کرنا ہے تو ، آپ مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی تکنیک استعمال کریں گے؟
options: Errors cannot be removed from PROM.
Turn off and restart the computer.
mcqs.correct_answer: Errors cannot be removed from PROM.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PROM is Programmable Read-Only Memory , which can be written only once and cannot be modified or erased . If an error occurs , the chip must be replaced, not corrected or reformatted .

mcqs.question_en: If ASCII code of a = 97, what will be ASCII code for y?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ASCII codes for lowercase letters are consecutive; since ‘ a ’ = 97 , ‘ y ’ is the 25th letter after ‘a’, so 97 + 24 = 121 .

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is/are an example of a Procedural programming language?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا طریقہ کار پروگرامنگ زبان کی مثال ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Procedural languages are also known as third-generation languages (3GLs). Examples of third-generation languages include C, C++, Java, FORTRAN, and PASCAL.

mcqs.question_en: Normally boot sector virus is typically attached with _____?
mcqs.question_ur: عام طور پر بوٹ سیکٹر وائرس عام طور پر _____ کے ساتھ منسلک ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Boot sector viruses often spread through .exe files , which are executable and can run malicious code when opened. These files can infect the boot sector when the system starts , making them a common carrier for such viruses.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following option is a drawback of using a batch processing system?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا آپشن بیچ پروسیسنگ سسٹم کو استعمال کرنے کی خرابی ہے؟
options: Individual time slots are allocated to each task of CPU.
Undesired commands are executed by the CPU.
mcqs.correct_answer: Undesired commands are executed by the CPU.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In batch processing systems , all tasks are executed without user interaction, so incorrect or undesired commands may run unnoticed. This can lead to errors or wasted resources , making it a key drawback of the system.

mcqs.question_en: If you want to perform mathematical calculations whose value is an integer and is greater than 66.000 then which of the following data type you will use for storing numbers?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ ریاضی کے حساب کتاب کو انجام دینا چاہتے ہیں جس کی قیمت ایک عدد ہے اور 66.000 سے زیادہ ہے تو آپ مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ڈیٹا ٹائپ اسٹور کرنے کے لئے استعمال کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Integer data type stores whole numbers without decimals, ideal for values like 67, 100, etc. It supports a range that easily includes numbers greater than 66.000 and doesn’t require decimal precision like float.

mcqs.question_en: If you you use Star Topology in your office, then which of the following is the main advantage of using this topology?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ اپنے دفتر میں اسٹار ٹوپولاجی استعمال کرتے ہیں تو پھر اس ٹوپولوجی کو استعمال کرنے کا بنیادی فائدہ مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ہے؟
options: A single computer failure does not bring down the whole network.
It required connections with a hub.
mcqs.correct_answer: A single computer failure does not bring down the whole network.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Star Topology , each device is connected independently to a central hub, so failure of one device doesn’t affect the others. This makes the network more reliable and easier to manage compared to other topologies.

mcqs.question_en: What is one use of a Report generated with reference to DBMS?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈی بی ایم ایس کے حوالے سے تیار کردہ رپورٹ کا کیا استعمال ہے؟
options: It is used to manipulate relational database
It provides an on screen document from the database
It is used to execute SQL query
mcqs.correct_answer: It provides an on screen document from the database
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A report in DBMS presents formatted data retrieved from the database in a readable , often printable form. It is mainly used for viewing and analyzing data.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is an example of a transmission medium?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ٹرانسمیشن میڈیم کی مثال ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A transmission medium is a channel through which data is transmitted — satellite systems are used to transmit signals over long distances. LED TV or video camera are devices, not mediums for data transmission.

mcqs.question_en: If you open a file in "R+" mode, what does it mean?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ "آر+" وضع میں فائل کھولتے ہیں تو ، اس کا کیا مطلب ہے؟
options: Opening a file for both reading and writing
Opening a file for writing only
Opening a file for reading only
mcqs.correct_answer: Opening a file for both reading and writing
mcqs.explanation: Explanation " R+" mode opens an existing file for both reading and writing . The file must already exist ; it does not create a new file if one doesn’t exist .

mcqs.question_en: What do you understand from Concurrency control in databases?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ ڈیٹا بیس میں ہم آہنگی کے کنٹرول سے کیا سمجھتے ہیں؟
options: It is a situation in which only one admin can enter data in database.
It is a situation in which two or more users access the same record simultaneously.
It is a situation where one user enters data without validation in the database.
mcqs.correct_answer: It is a situation in which two or more users access the same record simultaneously.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Concurrency control manages simultaneous access to data in a database to prevent conflicts or data inconsistency. It ensures data integrity when multiple users perform read/write operations at the same time.

mcqs.question_en: If you have to connect various computers of a University then, which of the following network topologies will you use?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ کو کسی یونیورسٹی کے مختلف کمپیوٹرز کو جوڑنا ہے تو ، آپ مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا نیٹ ورک ٹوپولوجی استعمال کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation LAN is ideal for connecting computers within a limited area like a university campus or building. It offers high speed and cost-effective communication among multiple systems in close proximity.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is a main advantage of Spooling?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون اسپولنگ کا بنیادی فائدہ ہے؟
options: Multiple buses can communicate at the same time
CPU is not involved in heavy data transfer
mcqs.correct_answer: CPU is not involved in heavy data transfer
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Spooling allows peripheral devices (like printers) to handle data independently , reducing CPU involvement in data transfer. This frees the CPU to perform other tasks, improving overall system efficiency.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following modulation techniques is NOT interrupted by thunderstorms?
mcqs.question_ur: گرج چمک کے ساتھ مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی ماڈیولیشن تکنیک میں خلل نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation FM is not easily affected by amplitude variations caused by thunderstorms , making it more resistant to noise. In contrast, Amplitude Modulation (AM) is highly susceptible to static and noise from electrical storms.

mcqs.question_en: Excel sometimes does not recalculate when a formula is updated because ______?
mcqs.question_ur: جب کسی فارمولے کو اپ ڈیٹ کیا جاتا ہے تو ایکسل کبھی کبھی دوبارہ گنتی نہیں کرتا ہے کیونکہ ______؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation When Excel is set to manual calculation mode , formulas do not update automatically after changes. Users must press F9 or switch to automatic calculation to recalculate formulas.

mcqs.question_en: How does the “Animation Pane” in PowerPoint improve slide presentations?
mcqs.question_ur: پاورپوائنٹ میں "حرکت پذیری پین" سلائیڈ پریزنٹیشنز کو کس طرح بہتر بناتا ہے؟
options: It manages animation order and timing
mcqs.correct_answer: It manages animation order and timing
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Animation Pane in PowerPoint allows users to control the sequence and timing of animations on a slide . It helps in customizing how and when objects appear , enhancing the clarity and flow of presentations.

mcqs.question_en: The “Master Slide” layout in PowerPoint is beneficial because _____?
mcqs.question_ur: پاورپوائنٹ میں "ماسٹر سلائیڈ" کی ترتیب فائدہ مند ہے کیونکہ _____؟
options: It applies animations across all the slides
It allows for unique slide formatting across slides
It makes it easier to apply consistent formatting across slides
mcqs.correct_answer: It makes it easier to apply consistent formatting across slides
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Master Slide controls the overall design and layout for all slides in a presentation. It ensures uniform fonts, colors, and styles , saving time and improving consistency.

mcqs.question_en: The “Find and Replace” feature enhances document analysis by _____?
mcqs.question_ur: فائینڈ اور رپلیس خصوصیت _____ کے ذریعہ دستاویز کے تجزیے میں اضافہ کرتی ہے؟
options: Identifying and changing specific text quickly
mcqs.correct_answer: Identifying and changing specific text quickly
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The " Find and Replace " feature helps locate specific words or phrases in a document. It allows users to replace them instantly, saving time and ensuring consistency.

mcqs.question_en: A ______ is a powerful tool to calculate, summarize, and analyze data that lets you see comparisons, patterns, and trends in your data.
mcqs.question_ur: اعداد و شمار کا حساب لگانے ، خلاصہ اور تجزیہ کرنے کا ایک طاقتور ٹول ہے جس کی مدد سے آپ اپنے ڈیٹا میں موازنہ ، نمونوں اور رجحانات کو دیکھنے کی اجازت دیتے ہیں۔ ______
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A PivotTable helps you calculate, summarize, and analyze data efficiently. It lets you spot comparisons, patterns, and trends within large datasets.

mcqs.question_en: In Excel, a trendline can be added to a ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل میں ، ایک ٹرینڈ لائن کو ______ میں شامل کیا جاسکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A trendline is added to a chart to show patterns or trends in the data. It helps in analyzing data over time or predicting future values .

mcqs.question_en: _____ provides visual cues to help you quickly make sense of your data?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ کو اپنے ڈیٹا کو جلدی سے سمجھنے میں مدد کے لئے بصری اشارے فراہم کرتا ہے؟ _____
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Conditional Formatting highlights data based on rules, making patterns easy to spot. It provides visual cues like colors or icons to quickly understand data trends.

mcqs.question_en: Microsoft Excel can ______ text so it appears on multiple lines in a cell.
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ ایکسل ______ متن کرسکتا ہے لہذا یہ ایک سیل میں متعدد لائنوں پر ظاہر ہوتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Wrap feature allows text to appear on multiple lines within a single Excel cell . It improves readability without expanding the cell width.

mcqs.question_en: In order to use mail merge to send bulk email messages, a MAPI-compatible email program like ______ needs to be installed.
mcqs.question_ur: بلک ای میل پیغامات بھیجنے کے لئے میل انضمام کو استعمال کرنے کے ل ____ ، ______ جیسے ایم اے پی آئی کے مطابق ای میل پروگرام کو انسٹال کرنے کی ضرورت ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Mail merge requires a MAPI-compatible email client to send bulk emails. Programs like Outlook support MAPI; Gmail can be configured through compatible clients.

mcqs.question_en: Suppose you are working on page 5 and you want to start a new text on page 6. Which is the best way to move to the next page?
mcqs.question_ur: فرض کریں کہ آپ صفحہ 5 پر کام کر رہے ہیں اور آپ صفحہ 6 پر ایک نیا متن شروع کرنا چاہتے ہیں۔ اگلے صفحے پر جانے کا بہترین طریقہ کون سا ہے؟
options: Use a page break at page 6
Keep pressing the “Enter” key until you reach page 6
Use a page break at page 5
mcqs.correct_answer: Use a page break at page 5
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Inserting a page break at page 5 moves the cursor directly to page 6. This method keeps formatting clean and avoids unnecessary blank lines.

mcqs.question_en: Hyphenation is used to ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ہائفینیشن ______ کے لئے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
options: Decrease the number of paragraphs in a document
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Hyphenation breaks words at the end of lines to reduce large gaps. This helps create a cleaner, more compact text layout, saving space.

mcqs.question_en: In order to remove page numbers, if the “Remove Page Numbers” button is not available or if some page numbers are still there _____?
mcqs.question_ur: صفحہ نمبروں کو ہٹانے کے لئے، اگر صفحہ نمبرز کو ہٹا دیں بٹن دستیاب نہیں ہے یا اگر کچھ صفحہ نمبر اب بھی موجود ہیں تو؟
options: Double-click in the header or footer, select the page number, and press Delete
mcqs.correct_answer: Double-click in the header or footer, select the page number, and press Delete
mcqs.explanation: Explanation If " Remove Page Numbers " is unavailable, you can manually remove them by accessing the header/footer area. Double-clicking the header/footer , then selecting and deleting the page number, removes it from that section.

mcqs.question_en: While converting text to a table, if you have commas in your text, use ______ for your separator characters.
mcqs.question_ur: متن کو کسی ٹیبل میں تبدیل کرتے وقت ، اگر آپ کے متن میں کوما ہیں تو ، اپنے جداکار کے کرداروں کے لئے ______ استعمال کریں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Tabs are commonly used as separator characters when converting text to a table in Word. If commas are already in use, replacing them with tabs ensures proper column separation.

mcqs.question_en: What does “show/hide” display in the current document?
mcqs.question_ur: موجودہ دستاویز میں "دیکھانا/چھپانا" کیا ڈسپلے کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Show/Hide button displays formatting marks like spaces, tabs, paragraph marks, and breaks. It helps in editing by revealing elements that are usually hidden .

mcqs.question_en: Web Layout view is designed to show you what your document would look like if you intend to publish it as a ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ویب لے آؤٹ ویو آپ کو یہ بتانے کے لئے ڈیزائن کیا گیا ہے کہ اگر آپ اسے ______ کے طور پر شائع کرنے کا ارادہ رکھتے ہیں تو آپ کی دستاویز کیسی ہوگی؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Web Layout view displays the document as it would appear in a web browser . It is useful when preparing content for online publication .

mcqs.question_en: How can we make sure that Track Changes is ON?
mcqs.question_ur: ہم یہ کیسے یقینی بناسکتے ہیں کہ ٹریک میں تبدیلیاں جاری ہیں؟
options: The button will appear lighter than the rest of the ribbon when Track Changes is turned off
The button will appear darker than the rest of the ribbon when Track Changes is turned on
The button will appear darker than the rest of the ribbon when Track Changes is turned off
mcqs.correct_answer: The button will appear darker than the rest of the ribbon when Track Changes is turned on
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A darker button indicates an active feature like Track Changes . This visual cue confirms that changes are being tracked in the document.

mcqs.question_en: To open the Navigation pane, press ______?
mcqs.question_ur: نیویگیشن پین کھولنے کے لئے ، ______ دبائیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Pressing Ctrl+F opens the Navigation Pane in most word processors. It allows users to search text and browse document headings quickly.

mcqs.question_en: Once a table of contents is created, there are some changes in the text, now the created table of content ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک بار مشمولات کی میز پیدا ہونے کے بعد ، متن میں کچھ تبدیلیاں آتی ہیں ، اب مواد کی تخلیق کردہ جدول ______؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A table of contents can be easily updated to reflect changes. Use the “ Update Table ” option to refresh headings or page numbers.

mcqs.question_en: For a correct table of contents, the appropriate use of ______ is helpful.
mcqs.question_ur: مواد کی صحیح میز کے لئے، ______ کے مناسب استعمال میں مددگار ہے.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Styles (Heading 1, Heading 2, etc.) are essential for creating an automated Table of Contents (TOC) in word processors like Microsoft Word. By applying consistent heading styles , the TOC can be generated and updated automatically when document changes occur.

mcqs.question_en: This makes sure the document needs special treatment regarding modification of its content?
mcqs.question_ur: اس سے یہ یقینی بناتا ہے کہ دستاویز کو اپنے مواد میں ترمیم کے سلسلے میں خصوصی علاج کی ضرورت ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A watermark (like "Confidential" or "Draft") signals special handling. It informs readers about the document’s status or restrictions .

mcqs.question_en: Which is NOT true about headers and footers?
mcqs.question_ur: ہیڈر اور فوٹر کے بارے میں کون سا سچ نہیں ہے؟
options: Headers and footers can be removed
Headers and footers cannot be changed for different sections
Headers and footers can be changed for different sections
Headers and footers can be edited
mcqs.correct_answer: Headers and footers cannot be changed for different sections
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Headers and footers cannot be changed for different sections This is not true because headers and footers can be customized for different sections using section breaks. Word processors allow unique headers/footers in each section for flexibility.

mcqs.question_en: To remove a hyperlink but keep the text as it is ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ہائپر لنک کو دور کرنے کے لئے لیکن متن کو ______ کی طرح رکھیں؟
options: Select the text and press Delete
Right-click the hyperlink and click Remove Hyperlink
Right-click the hyperlink and click Delete
mcqs.correct_answer: Right-click the hyperlink and click Remove Hyperlink
mcqs.explanation: Explanation This action removes the link but keeps the text unchanged. It’s the standard method in most text editors.

mcqs.question_en: What is the function of "Save as" in Microsoft Office?
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ آفس میں "سیو ایز" کا کام کیا ہے؟
options: To ask the file name and store data in the desired location
To send the file via email
mcqs.correct_answer: To ask the file name and store data in the desired location
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The function of "Save As" in Microsoft Office is to ask the file name and store data in the desired location . It allows you to save a copy of the document with a new name or in a different location, without overwriting the original file.

mcqs.question_en: Which is anti-virus software?
mcqs.question_ur: اینٹی وائرس سافٹ ویئر کون سا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Avast and NAV a re anti-virus software *** Symantec's Norton Group launched Norton AntiVirus 1.0 (NAV) for PC and compatible computers. *** Avast's free antivirus software detects and blocks all types of malware in real-time to prevent them from infecting your computer. Kaspersky, Norton, and Avast are anti-virus software Linux i s an operating system, not an anti-virus Anti virus

mcqs.question_en: The main window in a computer spreadsheet is called?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر اسپریڈ شیٹ میں مین ونڈو کو کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The main window in a computer spreadsheet is called a workbook while The title bar in MS Excel displays the name of the worksheet ** In Excel, when we create a new document, we always select a blank workbook, as you already have done in the previous chapter. When this blank workbook opens up, an interface you see is called a workbook window.

mcqs.question_en: The diameter of the compact disc (CD) usually _____ inches.
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیکٹ ڈسک (سی ڈی) کا قطر عام طور پر _____ انچ۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A standard compact disc (CD) is 120 mm ( 12 cm ) ( 4.75 inches ) in diameter and 1.2 mm ( 0.05 inch ) thick. This size is widely used for storing data, music, or video.

mcqs.question_en: In POWERPOINT, multimedia presentations consist of _____?
mcqs.question_ur: پاورپوائنٹ میں ، ملٹی میڈیا پریزنٹیشنز _____ پر مشتمل ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PowerPoint multimedia presentations consist of slides, animations , and can include slide shadows for effects. These elements combine to create dynamic and engaging presentations.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word, Thesaurus is used to search _____ words.
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں ، تھیسورس _____ الفاظ تلاش کرنے کے لئے استعمال ہوتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Thesaurus in MS Word helps search for similar or synonym words . It provides alternative words to enhance writing or avoid repetition.

mcqs.question_en: Operating system is considered as _____ of computer.
mcqs.question_ur: آپریٹنگ سسٹم کو کمپیوٹر کا _____ سمجھا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Operating System (OS) is the core component that manages hardware and software resources. It acts as the bridge between user and hardware, enabling all system functions .

mcqs.question_en: File Manager is _____ program.
mcqs.question_ur: فائل مینیجر _____ پروگرام ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation File Manager helps users manage files and folders ( copy, move, delete, etc .). It is a utility program that supports the operating system's functionality.

mcqs.question_en: Which device(s) can't work properly without driver?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا آلہ ڈرائیور کے بغیر صحیح طریقے سے کام نہیں کرسکتا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Devices like mouse, printer, and network adapters need specific drivers to communicate with the operating system. Without drivers , the OS can't recognize or control these devices properly.

mcqs.question_en: Android operating system is used in ______?
mcqs.question_ur: اینڈروئیڈ آپریٹنگ سسٹم ______ میں استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Android OS is specifically designed for mobile devices like smartphones and tablets. It is a touchscreen-based operating system developed by Google .

mcqs.question_en: The ____ error cannot be detected by a computer.
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کے ذریعہ ____ غلطی کا پتہ نہیں چل سکتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Logical errors occur when the program runs without crashing but gives incorrect output. These errors are due to wrong logic and cannot be detected by the computer automatically.

mcqs.question_en: The comparison between two values is performed by _____ operator.
mcqs.question_ur: دو اقدار کے مابین موازنہ _____ آپریٹر کے ذریعہ کیا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Relational operators (like >, <, ==) are used to compare two values. They return true or false based on the comparison result.

mcqs.question_en: In BASIC programming, _____ command is used to clear screen.
mcqs.question_ur: بیسک پروگرامنگ میں ، _____ کمانڈ اسکرین کو صاف کرنے کے لئے استعمال ہوتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In BASIC programming, CLS stands for " Clear Screen ". It is used to erase all output from the screen and start fresh.

mcqs.question_en: A computer cannot function without _____?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر _____ کے بغیر کام نہیں کر سکتا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A computer cannot function without an Operating System (OS) . As it manages hardware and software . It providing a platform for applications to run. The OS facilitates essential tasks like file management, memory allocation, and user interaction with the device.

mcqs.question_en: Columns in MS Excel are called?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں کالم کہلاتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation All important questions about " MS EXCEL" Microsoft Excel is a spreadsheet application launched in 1985 by the Microsoft Corporation. MS-Excel uses the _____ function when creating a data table. spreadsheet **** Which of the following functions in Microsoft Excel is used to count items in a cell range? Count *** In MS Excel, which function automatically total a column or row of values? SUM *** MS Excel's function arguments are always written in----------? Parenthesis *** In MS Excel, which function automatically totals a column or row of values? SUM **** Columns in MS Excel are called? Fields *** Constant value in excel also called? Number *** Ctrl +D in MS Excel? Fill down in the selection *** Ctrl+R is used in Excel too? Fill the selection with active cells to the right *** MOD () function is used in MS Excel to get Remainder **** ND30-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: Header and Footer command are located on the _______ tab in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: ہیڈر اور فوٹر کمانڈ ایم ایس ورڈ کے کس ٹیب پر واقع ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation On the Insert tab, in the Text group, click Header & Footer. Headers and footers Purpose is to appear only in: print layout view print preview printed documents. دستاویز میں ہیڈر اور فوٹر داخل کرنے کا مقصد صفحہ کے ہیڈر اور فوٹر کو دستاویز کے پرنٹ ہونے پر ظاہر ہونے کی اجازت دینا ہے۔

mcqs.question_en: Which wavy line shows that the word is repeated in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی لہراتی لائن سے پتہ چلتا ہے کہ ایم ایس لفظ میں یہ لفظ دہرایا گیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word, a blue wavy l i ne indicates a grammar problem . Blue Wavy Line: Repeated word or phrase. Red Wavy Line: Potential spelling error. Green Wavy Line: Possible grammatical error. Purple Dotted Line: Suggests a contextual refinement for style or clarity.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel, _____ function calculates the square root of a number.
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں ، _____ فنکشن کسی تعداد کے مربع جڑ کا حساب لگاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Excel , the SQRT(number) function is used to calculate the square root of a given number. Example : = SQRT (25) will return 5.

mcqs.question_en: Unauthorized copying and resale of software for business purpose is called _____?
mcqs.question_ur: کاروباری مقصد کے لئے سافٹ ویئر کی غیر مجاز کاپی اور دوبارہ فروخت _____ کہلاتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Software piracy is the illegal copying, distribution, or use of software without proper licensing. It especially refers to unauthorized commercial resale or use of software for profit.

mcqs.question_en: In data transmission, Crosstalk can be reduced by _____ copper wire.
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا ٹرانسمیشن میں ، کراس ٹاک کو _____ تانبے کے تار سے کم کیا جاسکتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Twisting copper wires (as in twisted pair cables) helps cancel out electromagnetic interference from external sources and reduces crosstalk between adjacent wires. This method improves signal quality in data transmission .

mcqs.question_en: Bluetooth is a _______ technology for short range communication.
mcqs.question_ur: بلوٹوتھ مختصر رینج مواصلات کے لئے _______ ٹکنالوجی ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Bluetooth is a Personal Area Network (PAN) technology designed for short-range communication. It typically connects devices like phones, laptops, and wireless headsets within about 10 meters.

mcqs.question_en: Dividing a number by zero is an example of _____ error.
mcqs.question_ur: کسی نمبر کو صفر سے تقسیم کرنا _____ غلطی کی ایک مثال ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Dividing a number by zero is a logical error because the program may compile successfully but give a runtime error or unexpected behavior. It represents a flaw in the program's logic.

mcqs.question_en: In _____ topology, data is communicated in one direction from node to node.
mcqs.question_ur: کس ٹوپولوجی میں ، اعداد و شمار کو نوڈ سے نوڈ تک ایک سمت میں بتایا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Ring topology , each computer is connected to two others, forming a circle. Data travels in one direction (or sometimes both, in a dual ring) from node to node until it reaches its destination.

mcqs.question_en: A _____ is the example of full-duplex transmission mode.
mcqs.question_ur: ایک _____ مکمل ڈوپلیکس ٹرانسمیشن موڈ کی مثال ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A telephone line supports full-duplex transmission, meaning both parties can talk and listen simultaneously. Unlike half-duplex (e.g., walkie-talkie ). Full-duplex allows two-way communication at the same time.

mcqs.question_en: Which connects two or more computers in a same network?
mcqs.question_ur: جو ایک ہی نیٹ ورک میں دو یا زیادہ کمپیوٹرز کو جوڑتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A switch connects two or more computers within the same local area network (LAN). It intelligently forwards data only to the specific device intended , improving network efficiency.

mcqs.question_en: Which supports rate from 100 Kbps to 4 Mbps?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا 100 کے بی پی ایس  سے 4 ایم بی پی ایس سے شرح کی حمایت کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Infrared communication supports data transfer rates typically ranging from 100 Kbps to 4 Mbps . It is used in short-range, line-of-sight applications like remote controls and some wireless devices.

mcqs.question_en: The data transmission speed in _____ cable is from 10 Mbps to 200 Mbps.
mcqs.question_ur: کس کیبل میں ڈیٹا ٹرانسمیشن کی رفتار 10 ایم بی پی ایس سے 200 ایم بی پی ایس تک ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Coaxial cables typically support data transmission speeds between 10 Mbps to 200 Mbps , used in cable TV and internet . They are shielded and suitable for medium-speed data over longer distances than twisted-pair cables.

mcqs.question_en: In ______ transmission, a parity bit sometimes included at the end of each byte for error checking.
mcqs.question_ur: کس ٹرانسمیشن میں، کبھی کبھی ایک باری بٹی کبھی کبھی ہر بائٹ کے اختتام پر غلطی کی جانچ پڑتال کے لئے شامل ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In asynchronous transmission, data is sent one byte at a time with start and stop bits , and often a parity bit for error checking. It's commonly used in serial communication , like keyboards and older modems.

mcqs.question_en: The first Graphical User Interface (GUI) computer was developed by which company?
mcqs.question_ur: پہلا گرافیکل یوزر انٹرفیس کمپیوٹر کس کمپنی کے ذریعہ تیار کیا گیا تھا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The first successful GUI -based computer was the Apple Lisa , developed by Apple Inc. in 1983 . It introduced a mouse-driven interface with icons and windows, paving the way for modern operating systems .

mcqs.question_en: The software that is available free of charge is called _____?
mcqs.question_ur: سافٹ ویئر جو مفت دستیاب ہے اسے _____ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Freeware is software that is completely free to use without any cost, though it is usually copyrighted. Unlike shareware , freeware doesn’t expire or require payment after trial.

mcqs.question_en: The types of expansion slots are _____?
mcqs.question_ur: توسیع سلاٹ کی اقسام _____ ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Expansion slots like AGP (Accelerated Graphics Port), PCI (Peripheral Component Interconnect), and ISA (Industry Standard Architecture) are used to add extra hardware ( graphics cards, sound cards, etc. ) to a computer. These slots enhance the computer’s capabilities by allowing external components to be connected directly to the motherboard.

mcqs.question_en: The ____ directs and coordinates most of the operations in the computer.
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کے کس پارٹ میں زیادہ تر کارروائیوں کی ہدایت اور ان کو مربوط کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Control Unit (CU) directs and coordinates most operations of the computer by managing the flow of data and instructions. It tells the ALU, memory, and I/O devices how to respond to instructions.

mcqs.question_en: Based on speed, size and performance digital computers are classified into _____ types.
mcqs.question_ur: رفتار کی بنیاد پر ، سائز اور کارکردگی ڈیجیٹل کمپیوٹرز کو _____ اقسام میں درجہ بندی کیا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Digital computers are commonly classified into four types: Supercomputers, Mainframe computers, Minicomputers, and Microcomputers . This classification is based on their speed, size, and performance capabilities .

mcqs.question_en: The third generation computers could carry out instructions in ______ of a second.
mcqs.question_ur: تیسری نسل کے کمپیوٹر ایک سیکنڈ کے ______ میں ہدایات انجام دے سکتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Third generation computers (1960s–70s) used integrated circuits (ICs), enabling them to execute instructions in millionths of a second. This marked a significant improvement in speed and processing over earlier generations.

mcqs.question_en: Internet address which identifies a website is called _____?
mcqs.question_ur: انٹرنیٹ ایڈریس جو کسی ویب سائٹ کی نشاندہی کرتا ہے اسے _____ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation URL (Uniform Resource Locator) is the internet address used to identify and access a specific website. It typically includes the protocol (like http:// or https://) and the domain name (like www.example.com).

mcqs.question_en: In C language, compound operator contains _____ operator and assignment operator.
mcqs.question_ur: سی زبان میں ، کمپاؤنڈ آپریٹر میں _____ آپریٹر اور اسائنمنٹ آپریٹر ہوتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In C language, a compound operator combines an arithmetic operator with an assignment operator, e.g., +=, -=, *=, /= . These are used to simplify expressions, like x += 5 means x = x + 5.

mcqs.question_en: Karnaugh map (K-map) method was introduced in _____?
mcqs.question_ur: کس سال میں کرنوگ نقشہ (کے میپ) کا طریقہ متعارف کرایا گیا تھا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Karnaugh map (K-map) method was introduced by Maurice Karnaugh in 1953 . It is used for simplifying Boolean algebra expressions visually.

mcqs.question_en: Which is capable to accept a string with white space characters?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا وائٹ اسپیس کرداروں کے ساتھ تار قبول کرنے کے قابل ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation gets() can accept a full string including white space characters until a newline is encountered. In contrast, getch() and getche() only accept a single character input.

mcqs.question_en: Which tag is used to create a hyperlink in a webpage?
mcqs.question_ur: ویب پیج میں ہائپر لنک بنانے کے لئے کون سا ٹیگ استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The tag is used to create a hyperlink in an HTML webpage . It uses the href attribute to define the link destination (e.g., Link ).

mcqs.question_en: In HTML, the _____ tags are used for creating an unordered list.
mcqs.question_ur: ایچ ٹی ایم ایل میں ، _____ ٹیگ غیر منظم فہرست بنانے کے لئے استعمال ہوتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation:
Explanation The
    tags in HTML are used to create an unordered list. Inside these tags, individual list items are defined using
  • tags.

mcqs.question_en: The gate whose output is 0 when all the inputs are 1 is called _____ gate.
mcqs.question_ur: گیٹ جس کی پیداوار 0 ہوتی ہے جب تمام آدانوں کو 1 ہوتا ہے _____ گیٹ کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A NAND gate gives output 0 only when all inputs are 1; otherwise, it outputs 1 . It is the inverse ( NOT ) of the AND gate .

mcqs.question_en: Which statement shifts the control back to the beginning of the loop?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا بیان کنٹرول کو واپس لوپ کے آغاز پر بدل دیتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The continue statement skips the remaining code inside the loop for the current iteration. It then shifts control back to the beginning of the loop for the next iteration.

mcqs.question_en: High-level programming languages are classified into ______ categories.
mcqs.question_ur: اعلی سطحی پروگرامنگ زبانوں کو ______ زمرے میں درجہ بندی کیا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation High-level programming languages are commonly classified into three categories: procedural, object-oriented, and functional. These categories are based on different programming paradigms that define how programmers structure and write code.

mcqs.question_en: A table in a database must have ______?
mcqs.question_ur: کسی ڈیٹا بیس میں ایک ٹیبل میں ______ ہونا ضروری ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A primary key uniquely identifies each record (row) in a database table. It ensures data integrity by preventing duplicate and null entries in the key column.

mcqs.question_en: In C programming, the symbol used for logical AND operator in a statement is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: سی پروگرامنگ میں ، ایک بیان میں منطقی اور آپریٹر کے لئے استعمال ہونے والی علامت _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In C programming, && is the logical AND operator , used to evaluate whether both conditions are true. It differs from & , which is a bitwise AND operator.

mcqs.question_en: In a C language program, the statement terminator is ______?
mcqs.question_ur: سی زبان کے پروگرام میں ، بیان ٹرمینیٹر ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In C language, each statement ends with a semicolon (;) to indicate the end of an instruction. This helps the compiler understand where one statement ends and the next begins.

mcqs.question_en: A program that combines different library files to object files to generate executable file is called ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک پروگرام جس میں مختلف لائبریری فائلوں کو یکجا کرنے کے لئے فائلوں کو اعتراض کرنے کے لئے یکجا فائل _____ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A linker combines object files and library files into a single executable file. It resolves references between different modules and links external libraries needed for execution.

mcqs.question_en: A person who is responsible for the design, implementation, maintenance and repair of entire database is called ______ administrator.
mcqs.question_ur: ایک شخص جو پورے ڈیٹا بیس کے ڈیزائن ، عمل درآمد ، بحالی اور مرمت کے ذمہ دار ہے اسے ______ ایڈمنسٹریٹر کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Database Administrator (DBA) is responsible for the design, implementation, maintenance, and repair of a database. They ensure that the database operates efficiently, securely, and reliably.

mcqs.question_en: In order to create tables, storing, retrieving or updating data in a database the specific language used is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: کسی ڈیٹا بیس میں ڈیٹا کو ذخیرہ کرنے ، بازیافت کرنے یا اپ ڈیٹ کرنے کے لئے مخصوص زبان استعمال کی گئی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation SQL is the specific language used to create tables, store, retrieve, and update data in a relational database. It is designed for managing and manipulating structured data in relational databases.

mcqs.question_en: A database model that has a general appearance like an organizational chart is called ______ model.
mcqs.question_ur: ایک ڈیٹا بیس ماڈل جس میں عمومی شکل ہوتی ہے جیسے تنظیمی چارٹ کی طرح اسے ______ ماڈل کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The hierarchical model organizes data in a tree-like structure, similar to an organizational chart, where each record has a single parent and can have multiple children. It represents relationships between data in a parent-child hierarchy .

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is NOT an objective of a database?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون ڈیٹا بیس کا مقصد نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Data acquisition refers to the process of collecting data, not a primary objective of a database. The main objectives of a database include Data Independence, Data Integration, and Data Integrity , which focus on organizing, managing, and ensuring the accuracy of data.

mcqs.question_en: Collection of logically related data sets or files is called _______?
mcqs.question_ur: منطقی طور پر متعلقہ ڈیٹا سیٹ یا فائلوں کا مجموعہ _______ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A database is a collection of logically related data sets or files that are organized for efficient storage, retrieval, and management. It allows easy manipulation and querying of data through systems like SQL .

mcqs.question_en: The main processing unit of a CPU is _______?
mcqs.question_ur: سی پی یو کا مرکزی پروسیسنگ یونٹ _______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The ALU is the main processing unit of a CPU, responsible for performing all arithmetic and logical operations. It works alongside other components like registers and cache to execute instructions efficiently.

mcqs.question_en: Flash memory is a specific type of ______?
mcqs.question_ur: فلیش میموری ایک مخصوص قسم کی _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Flash memory is a type of EEPROM that can be electrically erased and reprogrammed in blocks. It is widely used in USB drives, SSDs, and memory cards for non-volatile data storage.

mcqs.question_en: The encoding path on optical disks is ______ most track.
mcqs.question_ur: آپٹیکل ڈسکوں پر انکوڈنگ کا راستہ ______ سب سے زیادہ ٹریک ہے۔
options: Spiral extending from outermost to innermost
Spiral extending from innermost to outermost
Concentric circles extending from innermost to outermost
mcqs.correct_answer: Spiral extending from innermost to outermost
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Optical disks like CDs and DVDs store data in a spiral track that starts from the innermost part and moves outward . This spiral path allows continuous reading of data as the disk spins.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is NOT an optical disk?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون آپٹیکل ڈسک نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A floppy disk is a magnetic storage device, not an optical disk . CD, DVD, and Blu-ray Disc are all optical storage media, read using laser technology.

mcqs.question_en: DDR3, SDRAM reads or writes ______ words of data per clock cycle.
mcqs.question_ur: ڈی ڈی آر 3 ، ایس ڈی آر اے ایم ہر گھڑی کے چکر کو ______ کے اعداد و شمار کے الفاظ پڑھتا ہے یا لکھتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DDR3 SDRAM (Double Data Rate 3 Synchronous Dynamic RAM) can read or write 8 words of data per clock cycle due to its 8n-prefetch architecture . This allows higher data transfer rates compared to earlier DDR versions .

mcqs.question_en: L3 cache is ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایل تھری کیشے ______ ہے؟
options: Slower than L2 cache but faster than RAM
The fastest memory in a computer system after CPU registers
The slowest memory in a computer system
Faster than L2 cache but slower than RAM
mcqs.correct_answer: Slower than L2 cache but faster than RAM
mcqs.explanation: Explanation L3 cache is a level of CPU cache memory that is slower than L1 and L2 , but still faster than main RAM. It helps improve overall CPU performance by storing frequently accessed data shared across cores.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is NOT a characteristic of magnetic memory?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون مقناطیسی میموری کی خصوصیت نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Magnetic memory (like hard drives and magnetic tapes) is read-write, not read-only — data can be both read and modified. It is also non-volatile, reliable, and relatively cheap for storing large amounts of data.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is an example of non-impact printers?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا غیر اثر پرنٹرز کی مثال ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Laser jet printers are non-impact printers because they print without physically striking the paper. They use laser technology and toner to produce high-quality prints quietly and quickly.

mcqs.question_en: The main memory of a computer can also be called ______?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کی مین میموری کو ______ بھی کہا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The main memory of a computer is also known by several names, including: Primary storage Internal memory Primary memory Main storage Random Access Memory (RAM) All these terms refer to the computer's volatile memory , which temporarily stores data and programs that are currently being used or processed by the CPU (Central Processing Unit). RAM is a primary memory. ROM is a secondary memory . RAM stands for : Random Access Memory ROM stands for : Read Only Memory

mcqs.question_en: The number of heading tag levels in Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ہائپر ٹیکسٹ مارک اپ لینگویج میں ہیڈنگ ٹیگ کی سطح کی تعداد _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation HTML provides 6 levels of heading tags: < h1 > to < h6 >, with <h1> being the largest and most important. These tags are used to define headings and organize content hierarchically on web pages.

mcqs.question_en: Every web server is accessed through _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ہر ویب سرور تک _____ کے ذریعے رسائی حاصل کی جاتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Every web server is accessed using its IP address , which uniquely identifies the server on the internet. The domain name (like www.example.com) is often used to refer to an IP address via the Domain Name System (DNS).

mcqs.question_en: In Karnaugh Maps, for simplification _____?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Karnaugh Maps , 1's are grouped in powers of two (1, 2, 4, 8, etc.) horizontally or vertically to simplify Boolean expressions. The goal is to minimize the number of terms by forming the largest possible groups of adjacent 1's.

mcqs.question_en: A logic gate that performs logical multiplication is called a ______ gate.
mcqs.question_ur: ایک منطق کا گیٹ جو منطقی ضرب کو انجام دیتا ہے اسے ______ گیٹ کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The AND gate performs logical multiplication, outputting 1 only when all its inputs are 1. It is also known as a conjunction gate in digital logic.

mcqs.question_en: The statement, when used inside the body of a loop, causes termination of the loop without terminating the program is _______?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The break statement , when used inside a loop, immediately exits the loop and transfers control to the statement following the loop. It does not terminate the entire program, only the current loop.

mcqs.question_en: Suppose z is an integer while z and y are long variables. If you write z = z + y; in your C program, which of the following will happen?
options: z will be converted to long and z will be calculated as long
y will be converted to int and z will be calculated as int
z will be converted to long and z will be calculated as int
mcqs.correct_answer: y will be converted to int and z will be calculated as int
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In z = z + y;, since z is an int and y is long , y is converted to int (if possible) to match the type of z due to usual type conversion rules. The result is calculated as an int, and this may cause data loss if y exceeds int range.

mcqs.question_en: In C programming, the loop that is executed at least once (even if the condition is false) is called ______ loop.
mcqs.question_ur: سی پروگرامنگ میں ، لوپ جو کم از کم ایک بار انجام دیا جاتا ہے (یہاں تک کہ اگر حالت غلط ہے) کو ______ لوپ کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In a do-while loop , the body executes first, and the condition is checked afterward, ensuring it runs at least once. This differs from for and while loops , which check the condition before executing.

mcqs.question_en: In C Language, the function getchar() _____?
mcqs.question_ur: سی زبان میں ، فنکشن گیٹچار () _____؟
options: Reads a character from the keyboard without echo
Requires pressing the "Enter" key after entering the character
Reads a string until the user presses the "Enter" key
Reads a character from the keyboard with echo
mcqs.correct_answer: Requires pressing the "Enter" key after entering the character
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In C, getchar() reads a single character from standard input but requires pressing "Enter" to submit the input. The input is buffered, meaning it waits for the newline (n) before processing the character.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is TRUE for a variable defined with the keyword const and initialized to a value in C language?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا متغیر کے لئے صحیح ہے جو مطلوبہ الفاظ کے ساتھ بیان کیا گیا ہے اور سی زبان میں کسی قدر سے شروع کیا گیا ہے؟
options: Can be overwritten within the scope of the variable
Does not differ from the variable that is declared without const and initialized
Cannot be changed within the scope of the variable during execution of the program
Can be changed within the scope of the variable
mcqs.correct_answer: Cannot be changed within the scope of the variable during execution of the program
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A variable declared with the const keyword in C becomes read-only and its value cannot be modified after initialization. Attempting to change a const variable will result in a compile-time error.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following does NOT qualify to be the name of a variable in C language?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی زبان میں متغیر کا نام بننے کے اہل نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation " define " is a reserved keyword in C, used in preprocessor directives (e.g., #define ) and cannot be used as a variable name. Variable names like " address ", " name ", and " age " are valid as they follow C naming rules and aren't reserved.

mcqs.question_en: In C programming, preprocessor directives start with _____ character.
mcqs.question_ur: سی پروگرامنگ میں ، پری پروسیسر ہدایات _____ کردار سے شروع ہوتی ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In C programming, preprocessor directives (like #include or #define ) begin with the # symbol . These directives are processed before the actual compilation of code starts.

mcqs.question_en: Deep knowledge of the internal structure of a computer hardware is required to write programs in a ______?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر ہارڈ ویئر کے اندرونی ڈھانچے کے بارے میں گہری معلومات ______ میں پروگرام لکھنے کی ضرورت ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Low-level languages (like assembly language) are close to machine code and require deep understanding of hardware structure. They offer more control over hardware but are complex and hardware -specific.

mcqs.question_en: A set of programs containing instructions to coordinate all the activities of a computer is called ______?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کی تمام سرگرمیوں کو مربوط کرنے کے لئے ہدایات پر مشتمل پروگراموں کا ایک مجموعہ ______ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An Operating System (OS) is a set of programs that manages computer hardware and software resources and coordinates tasks such as running applications. It provides essential services like memory management, task scheduling, and file management for smooth computer operation.

mcqs.question_en: Loss of energy of a signal as it travels outward is called ______?
mcqs.question_ur: جب یہ باہر کی طرف سفر کرتا ہے تو سگنل کی توانائی کا نقصان ______ کہلاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Attenuation refers to the loss of signal strength as it travels through a medium, causing the signal to weaken over distance. It is commonly seen in electrical signals , where the energy diminishes due to resistance or interference .

mcqs.question_en: A program that controls a particular type of device that is attached to a computer is called ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک ایسا پروگرام جو کسی خاص قسم کے آلے کو کنٹرول کرتا ہے جو کمپیوٹر سے منسلک ہوتا ہے اسے ______ کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A device driver is a program that controls and manages a specific type of device attached to a computer, such as a printer, mouse, or keyboard. It allows the operating system and other software to communicate with the hardware effectively.

mcqs.question_en: In a communication system, low Signal-to-Noise means ______?
mcqs.question_ur: مواصلات کے نظام میں ، کم سگنل ٹو شور کا مطلب ______ ہے؟
options: Noise strength is good as compared to signal
Signal strength is good as compared to noise
Neither noise nor signal strength is good
Both noise and signal strength are good
mcqs.correct_answer: Noise strength is good as compared to signal
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A low Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) means that noise is stronger than the signal, leading to poor clarity and potential distortion in communication. A higher SNR indicates a stronger signal relative to noise, resulting in clearer communication.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is NOT a productivity software?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا پیداواری سافٹ ویئر نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Audio/Video players are media software, not productivity software. Productivity software includes tools like spreadsheets, word processing, and databases, which help users create, manage, and analyze data.

mcqs.question_en: One Gigabyte is equal to ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک گیگا بائٹ ______ کے برابر ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation One Gigabyte (GB) is equal to 2^30 bytes, which is 1,073,741,824 bytes . The size of information in the computer is measured in Kilobytes (KB), Megabytes (MB), Gigabytes (GB), and Terabytes (TB). 1 Kilobyte (KB) = 1024 bytes One Megabyte (MB) = 1 024 Kilobytes (KB One Gigabyte (GB) = 1 024 Megabytes MB One Terabyte (TB)= 1024 gigabytes (GB).

mcqs.question_en: L1 cache is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایل ون کیشے _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation L1 cache (Level 1 cache) is the fastest and smallest cache memory , integrated directly into the processor. It stores frequently accessed data and instructions to speed up processing.

mcqs.question_en: In order to detect movement of the mouse, a mechanical mouse uses a ______ ball.
mcqs.question_ur: ماؤس کی نقل و حرکت کا پتہ لگانے کے لئے ، ایک مکینیکل ماؤس ______ بال کا استعمال کرتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A mechanical mouse uses a rubber ball to detect movement as it rolls on a surface. The movement of the ball turns internal rollers that track the cursor’s direction and speed.

mcqs.question_en: A person who researches problems, plans solutions, recommends software and systems and coordinates development to meet requirements is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک شخص جو مسائل کی تحقیق کرتا ہے ، حل کرتا ہے ، حل کرتا ہے ، سافٹ ویئر اور سسٹم کی سفارش کرتا ہے اور تقاضوں کو پورا کرنے کے لئے ترقی کو مربوط کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A system analyst studies and analyzes business problems and designs efficient information systems to solve them. They act as a bridge between users and developers , planning solutions and coordinating software/system development.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is NOT a computer operation?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون کمپیوٹر آپریشن نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Thinking is not a computer operation because computers do not possess consciousness or reasoning like humans . Computers perform Input, Processing, Storage, and Output , but they follow pre-defined instructions.

mcqs.question_en: Track of location of all files stored in a system is kept by _____?
mcqs.question_ur: سسٹم میں محفوظ تمام فائلوں کے مقام کا ٹریک _____ کے ذریعہ رکھا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Operating System (OS) keeps track of the location, names, and structure of all files stored on a computer. It manages the file system , ensuring users and programs can access and organize data efficiently.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is NOT true about ROM?
mcqs.question_ur: روم کے بارے میں مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا سچ نہیں ہے؟
options: It is burnt at the time of manufacturing
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ROM (Read-Only Memory) is non-volatile . This meaning it retains data even when the power is turned off . RAM is volatile.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following computer generation uses concept of artificial intelligence?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی کمپیوٹر نسل مصنوعی ذہانت کا تصور استعمال کرتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In the fifth generation of computers, artificial intelligence was used. Artificial Intelligence came into use in fifth-generation computing devices. Fifth-generation computing devices were faster and more efficient. Using high-speed logi c, and memory chips help in using Artificial Intelligence. The period of fifth-generation was 1980-onwards . ULSI-based microprocessors were used. ****

mcqs.question_en: One of the first mechanical calculator was ______?
mcqs.question_ur: پہلے مکینیکل کیلکولیٹر میں سے ایک ______ تھا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Pascaline was one of the first mechanical calculators. It was invented by Blaise Pascal in 1642 to perform basic arithmetic operations . It used gears and wheels to add and subtract numbers mechanically.

mcqs.question_en: A computer that processes information in trillions of instructions per second is called ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک ایسا کمپیوٹر جو کھربوں ہدایات میں فی سیکنڈ میں معلومات پر کارروائی کرتا ہے اسے ______ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A supercomputer is designed to perform trillions of instructions per second, making it the fastest type of computer for complex computations . It is used in areas like climate modeling, scientific simulations, and cryptography.

mcqs.question_en: What is the report object in MS Access used for?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس  رسائی میں رپورٹ آبجیکٹ کس کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The MS Access report object is primarily used to display and print formatted data from tables or queries in an organized and visually appealing manner. It's not used for data entry or editing l ike forms.

mcqs.question_en: The Network Control Protocol (NCP) was replaced by which protocol?
mcqs.question_ur: نیٹ ورک کنٹرول پروٹوکول  کو کس پروٹوکول سے تبدیل کیا گیا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation NCP was the original networking protocol used on th e ARPANET. NCP (Network Control Protocol) TCP/IP (Transmission Control Protocol/Internet Protocol) However, it was superseded by TCP/IP due to its greater flexibility and reliability.

mcqs.question_en: In C++ the body of the function is enclosed which?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In C++, the body of a function is enclosed within curly braces: {}. This structure contains the instructions that will b e executed when the function is called.

mcqs.question_en: Memory management helps to improve the?
mcqs.question_ur: میموری مینجمنٹ کو بہتر بنانے میں مدد ملتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Memory management primarily improves the Main Memory by allocating and managing its space efficiently. It also helps to ensure that the CPU can a ccess data and instructions quickly.

mcqs.question_en: Which key is used to select the whole document?
mcqs.question_ur: پوری دستاویز کو منتخب کرنے کے لیے کون سی کلید استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation "Select All" shortcut ( "Ctrl+A" ) by associating the letter "A" with the word "All". Ctrl + R = used for aligning selected text to the right. Ctrl + E = used for aligning selected text to the center. Ctrl + J = use for Justify paragraph alignment. Ctrl + L = used for aligning selected text to the left. Ctrl + Q = used to Align the s elected paragraph to the left.

mcqs.question_en: Select the Odd one from the following: Assembler, Operating system, Interpreter, Compiler
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Assembler, Interpreter, and Compiler are all language processors used to convert code written in programming languages into machine code. Operating system is not a language processor; it's system software that manages hardware and software resources.

mcqs.question_en: 4K resolutions is _________?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation 4K resolution is a display resolution of 4096×2160 pixels. It is four times the resolution of Full HD (1920×1080 pixels).

mcqs.question_en: Ctrl + W Shortcut is used in Microsoft Word to _____?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Alternatively referred to as Control W and C-w, Ctrl+W is a shortcut key most often used to close a program, window, tab, or document.

mcqs.question_en: Which device is required for the internet connection?
mcqs.question_ur: انٹرنیٹ کنکشن کے لیے کون سا آلہ درکار ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The modem is short for "Modulator-Demodulator." A modulator-demodulator or modem is a computer hardware device A modulator-demodulator or modem converts data from a digital format into a format .

mcqs.question_en: Footnotes, endnotes, and indexes are all inserted as _______?
mcqs.question_ur: فوٹ نوٹس ، اینڈ نوٹس اور اشاریہ جات سب کو _______ کے طور پر داخل کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Word fields are special codes in Microsoft Word that act as placeholders for data that can change (like footnotes, endnotes, indexes ). These fields update automatically . They are used to manage references and formatting efficiently.

mcqs.question_en: _________ are attempts by individuals to obtain confidential information from you by falsifying their identity?
mcqs.question_ur: کیا افراد کی طرف سے ان کی شناخت کو غلط بنا کر آپ سے خفیہ معلومات حاصل کرنے کی کوششیں ہیں؟ ______
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Phishing scams are fraudulent attempts to get sensitive data like passwords or credit card details by pretending to be a trustworthy entity (e.g., bank or service provider). These scams often use fake emails, websites, or messages to trick users into revealing personal information.

mcqs.question_en: Bit is the most famous basic unit in computing which stands for?
mcqs.question_ur: بٹ کمپیوٹنگ میں سب سے مشہور بنیادی اکائی ہے جس کا مطلب ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A bit is the smallest unit of data in a computer. A bit has a single binary value, either 0 or 1.

mcqs.question_en: Which one is the complete information about the database?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا بیس کے بارے میں کون سی مکمل معلومات ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A record is complete information about a database. The database is Consist of many different files linked with each other for the retrieval of information .

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is the key to close a run dialog box in the window?
mcqs.question_ur: ونڈو میں رن ڈائیلاگ باکس کو بند کرنے کے لیے درج ذیل میں سے کون سی کلید ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Pressing the ESC key closes the Run dialog box in Windows. ESC is a standard key for canceling or closing windows and dialog boxes. Other related keys: Enter : Confirms and runs the command Tab : Moves the cursor between fields Shift : Used for modifying selections or keyboard shortcuts Alt + F4 : Closes the current window or dialog box

mcqs.question_en: Which tab displays the content of slides in normal view?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا ٹیب عام منظر میں سلائیڈز کے مواد کو دکھاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The outline/slides tab displays the presentation text in the form of an outline. The outline tab is used to organize and develop the content of your presentation.

mcqs.question_en: Press ______ to repeat recent find in PowerPoint.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In PowerPoint (and other Office apps), Shift + F4 repeats the most recent Find action . Ctrl + F4 is used to close the current window.

mcqs.question_en: How to select multiple slides in a presentation?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک پریزنٹیشن میں ایک سے زیادہ سلائیڈز کا انتخاب کیسے کریں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To select multiple slides, p ress and hold Ctrl while you click each slide that you want to move, and then drag them as a group to the new location. ND27-7-2023

mcqs.question_en: What will you do if you want to insert something that stays at the same position in every slide?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ کوئی ایسی چیز داخل کرنا چاہتے ہیں جو ہر سلائیڈ میں ایک ہی پوزیشن پر رہے تو آپ کیا کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Slide Master allows you to insert elements (like logos, headers, or footers ) that appear in the same position on every slide. It ensures uniformity and consistency across the presentation.

mcqs.question_en: Which symbol is used for division in Excel?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل میں تقسیم کے لئے کون سی علامت استعمال کی جاتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Microsoft Excel, the divide symbol is a forward slash (/).

mcqs.question_en: Where do the negative numbers appear in the accounting style?
mcqs.question_ur: اکاؤنٹنگ کا انداز منفی نمبروں کو ظاہر کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The accounting style shows negative numbers in PARENTHESES . When working with financial data and creating accounting reports , one common number format that needs to be used is to show negative numbers in brackets (parentheses ) .

mcqs.question_en: MS-Excel uses the _____ function when creating a data table.
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل ڈیٹا ٹیبل بناتے وقت _____ فنکشن استعمال کرتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation All important questions about " MS EXCEL" Microsoft Excel is a spreadsheet application launched in 1985 by the Microsoft Corporation. MS-Excel uses the _____ function when creating a data table. spreadsheet **** Which of the following functions in Microsoft Excel is used to count items in a cell range? Count *** In MS Excel, which function automatically total a column or row of values? SUM *** MS Excel's function arguments are always written in----------? Parenthesis *** In MS Excel, which function automatically totals a column or row of values? SUM **** Columns in MS Excel are called? Fields *** Constant value in excel also called? Number *** Ctrl +D in MS Excel? Fill down in the selection *** Ctrl+R is used in Excel too? Fill the selection with active cells to the right *** MOD () function is used in MS Excel to get Remainder **** SH31-07-23 ND30-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: A function inside another function in called _____?
mcqs.question_ur: کسی دوسرے فنکشن کے اندر ایک فنکشن جسے _____ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A function inside a function is called a Nested function . Function Definition Round Function This function rounds a number to a specified number of digits. Switch Function It returns a value (if matched), after matching it with other values in the list. Nested Function A function tucked inside a function

mcqs.question_en: What was the purpose of autocorrect originally?
mcqs.question_ur: آٹو کریکٹ کا مقصد کیا تھا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Autocorrect is a word-processing feature that identifies misspelled words. It uses algorithms to identify the words most likely to have been intended, and edits the text accordingly .

mcqs.question_en: Page up key is used to move ______?
mcqs.question_ur: پیج اپ کلید ______ کو منتقل کرنے کے لئے استعمال کی جاتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Using navigation keys Page Up: Move the cursor or page up one screen Ctrl + Home: Move to the top of a document Ctrl + End : Move to the bottom of a document Page Down: Move the cursor or page down one screen

mcqs.question_en: What Power point feature will you use to apply motion effects to different objects of a slide ?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک سلائیڈ کی مختلف اشیاء پر موشن ایفیکٹ لگانے کے لیے آپ پاور پوائنٹ کی کون سی خصوصیت استعمال کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The "Animation Objects" feature in PowerPoint allows you to specifically add motion effects

mcqs.question_en: For which purpose do we convert a Word document to PDF format?
mcqs.question_ur: ہم کس مقصد کے لیے ورڈ دستاویز کو پی ڈی ایف فارمیٹ میں تبدیل کرتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PDF files are often used because they preserve the formatting and prevent easy editing, making them ideal for sharing documents that need to remain unchanged.

mcqs.question_en: What is true about a master document?
mcqs.question_ur: ماسٹر دستاویز کے بارے میں کیا سچ ہے؟
options: It includes data from all documents
It is a single document with no links to other files
It is a type of image file
mcqs.correct_answer: It includes data from all documents
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A master document is a tool in word processing software (like Microsoft Word) That allows you to manage and link several documents or subdocuments into one central document . It helps in organizing and working with large documents by combining smaller, individual files.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is used to organize files and documents in a computer, often referred to as a "container" for files, and can have nested levels for organization?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In a computer's file system, a folder is used to organize files and documents. Folders can contain files and other folders, creating a hierarchical structure that can go many levels deep (nested folders).

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word, which tab is used for citation and bibliography?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں حوالہ اور کتابیات کے لیے کون سا ٹیب استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The References tab in MS Word allows users to add citations, manage sources, insert a bibliography , and work with footnotes and endnotes, making it essential for academic and research documents.

mcqs.question_en: Which Excel function is used to add the current system date?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To insert the current date into an Excel cell, use the TODAY() function. Simply type =TODAY() in the cell and press Enter.

mcqs.question_en: Which one can be used for creating a document?
mcqs.question_ur: دستاویز بنانے کے لیے کون سا استعمال کیا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS Word can be used for creating a document . Microsoft Word is a word processor developed by Microsoft . It was first released on October 25, 1983 .

mcqs.question_en: How to create presentation package in power point?
mcqs.question_ur: پاور پوائنٹ میں پریزنٹیشن پیکج کیسے بنایا جائے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To create a presentation package in PowerPoint, you would use th e Export function.

mcqs.question_en: In the context of animations, what is a trigger?
mcqs.question_ur: متحرک تصاویر کے تناظر میں، محرک کیا ہے؟
options: An action button that is to next slide
An item on the slide that performs an action when clicked
The name of a motion path
mcqs.correct_answer: An item on the slide that performs an action when clicked
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A trigger initiates an animation effect when clicked on a specific object within a slide, allowing for controlled and interactive animations

mcqs.question_en: How we set a slide timing?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To set slide timing in Microsoft PowerPoint, you follow these steps: Go to the "Slide Show" tab on the ribbon. Click on "Rehearse Timings" or " Set Up Slide Show". Additional information Slide Sorter : Helps arrange slides but not timing File Menu : For opening, saving, e tc., not slide timing.

mcqs.question_en: What is the function of the Caps Lock key?
mcqs.question_ur: کیپس لاک کلید کا کام کیا ہے؟
options: It capitalizes all letters until turned off
mcqs.correct_answer: It capitalizes all letters until turned off
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Caps Lock makes all typed letters uppercase without holding the Shift key . It stays active until you press it again to turn it off.

mcqs.question_en: When was Deepseek launched?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیپیسیک کو کب لانچ کیا گیا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation About Deepseek Founded: May 2023 Founder: Liang Wenfeng , a prominent figure in hedge fund and AI industries Location: Hangzhou, China Operation: Independent AI research lab Affiliation: Under High-Flyer , a quantitative hedge fund co-founded by Liang Wenfeng

mcqs.question_en: NVIDIA is famous for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: نویڈیا _____ کے لئے مشہور ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation NVIDIA is globally known for designing Graphics Processing Units (GPUs) used in gaming, AI, and data processing . Their GeForce and RTX series are popular among gamers and professionals.

mcqs.question_en: Voice recording is done by ______?
mcqs.question_ur: صوتی ریکارڈنگ ______ کے ذریعہ کی گئی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A microphone captures sound waves and converts them into audio signals. It is the primary device used for voice recording on computers and other digital systems.

mcqs.question_en: Schedule event in MS Outlook by _______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس آؤٹ لک میں شیڈول ایونٹ بذریعہ _______؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Outlook , the Calendar feature is used to schedule events, meetings, and reminders. It helps manage appointments and coordinate with others efficiently.

mcqs.question_en: Mouse is used for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ماؤس _____ کے لئے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A mouse helps users select items and point to objects on the computer screen. It is a primary input device for graphical user interfaces.

mcqs.question_en: Diskette is also known as _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈسکیٹ _____ کے نام سے بھی جانا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A diskette is the older name for a floppy disk , a magnetic storage medium used in the past. It was commonly used in computers before USB drives and CDs became popular.

mcqs.question_en: Computer memory that needs its data to be refreshed otherwise it losses data is?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر میموری جس کو اپنے ڈیٹا کو ریفریش کرنے کی ضرورت ہوتی ہے بصورت دیگر اس سے ڈیٹا ضائع ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DRAM memories need a refresh . Dynamic Random Access Memory (DRAM). DRAM must be refreshed many times per second to store information, otherwise, it will lose what it is holding . DRAM is the most common type of memory in use today. ND18-4-2023
