mcqs.question_ur: ہدایات اور میموری ایڈریس کی نمائندگی _____؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Computers work with binary code . This means they use only two digits: 0 and 1. Everything inside a computer, from the simplest instruction to the location of data ( memory address ). It is represented using combinations of these 0s and 1s.

mcqs.question_en: A common use of a computer in office is for ______?
mcqs.question_ur: دفتر میں کمپیوٹر کا عام استعمال ______ کے لیے ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A common use of computer in office is for Word processing. Creating, editing, saving and printing documents. Copying, pasting, moving and deleting text within a document. Formatting text, such as font type, bolding, underlining or italicizing.

mcqs.question_en: MS Word is a type of?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ ایک قسم ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS Word is a widely used word processor developed by Microsoft. It was first released on October 25, 1983 . MS Word is an example of application software. It allows users to type and save documents. It is helpful too for making documents.

mcqs.question_en: The list of coded instructions is called?
mcqs.question_ur: کوڈڈ ہدایات کی فہرست کو کیا کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The list of coded instructions is called a Computer program. A computer program is a s equence or set of instructions in a programming language for a computer to execute. ** agm.04.03.23

mcqs.question_en: Which one of the following is the most powerful computer?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا کمپیوٹر سب سے طاقتور ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Supercomputers were introduced in the 1960s as the world's most advanced computer. A supercomputer is a powerful computer that can process a large amount of data and computation very quickly. Supercomputers perform immense amounts of mathematical calculations. Super Computers are also known as Number Crunching . Supercomputers are used for areas related to: Science Engineering Education Defense Aerospace

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not a Windows version?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ونڈوز ورژن نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows 8 and Windows 10 are the windows operating system versions. Windows 9 never released. Microsoft company released Windows 10 OS directly after Windows 8 OS.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following shortcut key is used to close a tab on a browser?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی شارٹ کٹ کلید براؤزر پر ٹیب کو بند کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The keyboard shortcut to close a tab on a browser is Ctrl + W. Here are some other keyboard shortcuts for browsers: Ctrl + T : Opens a new tab Ctrl + N : Opens a new window Ctrl + Shift + W : Closes the current window and all tabs Ctrl + Q : Closes the current window Alt + Right arrow : Opens the next page from your browsing history in the current tab Ctrl + F4 : Closes the current tab Alt + F4 : Closes the active window Alt + Space then n : Minimizes the current window

mcqs.question_en: To store data in the form of circles is called ____?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا کو دائروں کی شکل میں ذخیرہ کرنے کو ____ کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Sector refers to a subdivision of a track on a circular storage medium. Data is stored in a circular or pie-shaped section, often on a disk or hard drive.

mcqs.question_en: A/an ___ contain information like text, image or music?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A file is an item that contains information for example , text or images or music

mcqs.question_en: Animation schemes can be applied to ___ in the presentattion.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In presentation software like Microsoft PowerPoint , animation schemes can be applied to: All slides : You can apply the animation scheme to every slide in the presentation simultaneously. Selected slides : You can choose specific slides and apply the animation only to those. Current slide : You can apply the animation scheme to just the slide you are currently working on.

mcqs.question_en: In MS PowerPoint ____ contain pre defined
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Theme is a combination of colours, fonts, and visual effects that you may use to give your slides

mcqs.question_en: The page orientation can be in ___ style ?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The two basic types of page orientation are portrait (vertical) and landscape (horizontal) Click PAGE LAYOUT > Orientation. Click Portrait or Landscape.

mcqs.question_en: Software that assists you, or acts on your behalf, to perform repetitive computer-related tasks is a(n):
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An intelligent agent is a type of software designed to assist users by automating repetitive tasks or performing tasks on their behalf.

mcqs.question_en: The word Pentium is related to?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Pentium is a brand name used by Intel for its family of microprocessors , which are central to the functioning of computers. These processors were widely used in personal computers starting in the 1990s and are part of Intel's line of x86 architecture CPUs. The other options do not relate directly to Pentium: Hard Disk : Storage device. DVD : Optical storage medium. Printer : Peripheral device for printing documents.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel you can sort data in ?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Sorting is one of the most common tools for data management. In Excel, you can sort your table by one or more columns, by ascending or descending order , or do a custom sort.

mcqs.question_en: Which is called the physical part of computer?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کا جسمانی حصہ کسے کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The physical part of a computer is called hardware . Hardware refers to all the tangible parts of a computer that contribute to its functionality. Some examples of hardware include: Motherboard, RAM, CPU, Mouse, Keyboard, CD, DVD, Hard disk, Monitor, and Case. In contrast, software is the intangible part of a computer that helps it perform its functions. Software is made up of programs, procedures, and routines that run the computer system.

mcqs.question_en: You want to insert a paragraph of text from one document into another document while still keeping it in the first document, you will do it by doing the following:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Copy and paste : Duplicates the text, allowing it to remain in the first document while also inserting it into the second document.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word, when we apply Drop Cap  on a word then, by default, first character of this word drops to:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word, when you apply the Drop Cap feature to a word's first letter, the first character drops to cover 3 lines of text by default. You can customize the number of lines the drop cap spans by modifying the settings in the " Drop Cap Options" dialog box. Go to Insert > Text > Drop Cap to apply or adjust a drop cap .

mcqs.question_en: Dot matrix is a type of ____?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈاٹ میٹرکس ____ کی ایک قسم ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A dot matrix printer (DMP) is a type of printer which uses pins impacting an ink ribbon to print. These printers are generally considered outdated, as they cannot create high-quality prints and are costly as well. Therefore, they are mostly used in places where multipart forms are required. A dot matrix printer is also known as an impact matrix printer.

mcqs.question_en: What appears at the bottom of the MS Word Page?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ صفحہ کے نیچے کیا نظر آتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Footer is the text that appears at the bottom of every page of the document. In Microsoft Word, the top margin of a page is called its header , and the bottom margi n is called the footer ND10-3-2023

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word and Excel, to combine two or more cells into one is called?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ اور ایکسل میں دو یا دو سے زیادہ سیلز کو ملا کر ایک کرنے کو کیا کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The process of combining two or more cells into a single cell in MS Word or Excel is called " merging ." This is commonly used for formatting tables or organizing data.

mcqs.question_en: In CPU, all devices are attached with _____?
mcqs.question_ur: سی پی یو میں، تمام آلات _____ کے ساتھ منسلک ہوتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Main Circuit Board : The motherboard connects the CPU, RAM, and other components. Electrical Connections : Facilitates communication between the system's components. Buses : Circuits on the motherboard link the CPU to other components.

mcqs.question_en: Borders can be applied to _______?
mcqs.question_ur: سرحدوں کو کہاں پر لاگو کیا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Text : Borders can be applied to words, lines, or paragraphs in MS Word. Cells : Used in Excel to highlight or separate cell ranges. Pages : Borders can frame individual pages in MS Word. Tables : Add borders around tables for better structure. Pictures : Borders enhance images in MS Word.

mcqs.question_en: The circular device used for storage is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ذخیرہ کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہونے والا سرکلر ڈیوائس _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A disk is a circular storage device used for saving data, such as hard disks, CDs, and DVDs. It stores data magnetically or optically. It allows easy retrieval and rewriting (in most cases).

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following can be used to open your account?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ کا اکاؤنٹ کھولنے کے لیے درج ذیل میں سے کون سا استعمال کیا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation " Log in " is the correct term used to access an account. It involves entering credentials like a username and password.

mcqs.question_en: The valid data type in MS Excel is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں ڈیٹا کی درست قسم _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Boolean is a valid data type in MS Excel. It representing TRUE or FALSE values. Tupal and Dictionary are not valid data types in MS Excel.

mcqs.question_en: In PowerPoint, the dotted areas in an empty slide are called?
mcqs.question_ur: نقطہ دار بارڈر والا باکس کیا ہے جو سلائیڈ پر مواد کے لیے جگہ رکھتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The dotted areas in an empty slide in PowerPoint are called placeholders . Placeholders are containers on slide layouts that hold content like text, images, videos, and more. They are pre-formatted to make it easier to format slides consistently.

mcqs.question_en: In Excel, to perform addition, the function used is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل میں، اضافہ کرنے کے لیے، استعمال کیا جانے والا فنکشن _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Excel, the function used to perform addition is =SUM() . It calculates the total of the specified numbers or range of cells.

mcqs.question_en: The first network that initiated internet was _____?
mcqs.question_ur: پہلا نیٹ ورک جس نے انٹرنیٹ شروع کیا تھا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ARPANET is the first network that was initiated by the internet. It was first used in 1969 and finally decommissioned in 1989 . ARPANET's main use was for academic and research purposes.

mcqs.question_en: Which is an example of a formula?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا فارمولہ کی مثال ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Performs a calculation : The expression "=A1 + A2" performs a calculation by adding the values in cells A1 and A2. Uses cell references : The formula uses cell references (A1 and A2) to specify the values to be used in the calculation.

mcqs.question_en: An excel workbook is a collection of __________?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل ورک بک کس کا مجموعہ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A workbook is a collection of one or more spreadsheets and charts in a single file.

mcqs.question_en: The keyboard Shortcut key to decrease font size by one point is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: فونٹ کے سائز کو ایک پوائنٹ تک کم کرنے کے لیے کی بورڈ شارٹ کٹ کی _____  ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + Shift + > - increase the font size. Ctrl + Shift + < - Decrease the font size. Ctrl + ] -Increase the font size by 1 point. Ctrl + [ -Decrease the font size by 1 point. MS Word Minimum font size : 8 Maximum font size : 72 Standard font size : 12 MS Word manually font size (1-1638) Ctrl + Shift + P is used to change the font size. To increase the font size, press Ctrl + ]. To decrease the font size, press Ctrl + [.

mcqs.question_en: What is the shortcut key create subscript in MS-Word?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں شارٹ کٹ کی تخلیق سب اسکرپٹ کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Superscript & subscript are known as Font effects . Superscript is used to create small letters above the line of text. Subscript is used to create small letters below the line of text Subscript shortcut key: Ctrl, Shift + Plus sign (+) Superscript shortcut key: Ctrl, Shift, and the Plus sign (+) at the same time.

mcqs.question_en: Which tab of MS-Word contains the shapes option
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ کا کون سا ٹیب شکلوں کا آپشن رکھتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Step 1: On the navigation menu click on the insert option. Step 2: In the illustration section select the shapes option as shown in the figure: Step 3: A list of shapes will pop up on the screen where you can select different types of shapes.

mcqs.question_en: Single spacing in MS-Word document causes ____ point line spacing?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ دستاویز میں سنگل اسپیسنگ ____ پوائنٹ لائن اسپیسنگ کا سبب بنتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The point unit represents the size of the font and space between lines; 1 point equals 1/72 of an inch. The default line spacing in Word is 1.15 .

mcqs.question_en: Which is the largest hardware company in the world?
mcqs.question_ur: دنیا کی سب سے بڑی ہارڈ ویئر کمپنی کون سی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Apple is the world's largest hardware company by market capitalization. It's also the world's largest tech company.

mcqs.question_en: Which is not an input device?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا ان پٹ ڈیوائس نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A plotter is an output device. It is used to produce high-quality graphical prints , not for input. Mouse and keyboard are input devices. They are used to interact with and provide data to the computer.

mcqs.question_en: By selecting a paragraph we can apply _____?
mcqs.question_ur: پیراگراف کو منتخب کرکے ہم درخواست دے سکتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Indent adjusts the space at the beginning of a paragraph. Line spacing modifies the vertical space between lines. Both formatting options can be applied by selecting the paragraph in tools like MS Word.

mcqs.question_en: Which key deletes the character to the right of the cursor in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی کلید ایم ایس ورڈ میں کرسر کے دائیں طرف کے کردار کو حذف کرتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl-D deletes all characters to the right of the cursor (including the character under it). This is called ` Delete to end of the line'. ***** The cursor is a Thin Blinking Line In Microsoft Word and other word processors, pressing Ctrl + End moves the cursor to the end of the document. Move the cursor to the top of the next page. Ctrl+Page down Move the cursor to the top of the previous page. Ctrl+Page up *** You need to jump to the next column breaking the current column right at the cursor position. How can you break the column? Break command from the Insert menu SH4-9-2023

mcqs.question_en: In MS Office a feature that saves the document automatically after certain intervals is called?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس آفس میں ایک ایسی خصوصیت جو کچھ وقفوں کے بعد دستاویز کو خود بخود محفوظ کر لیتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS Office is Application Software Microsoft Office is an example of Horizontal market software. A feature of MS Word that saves the document automatically after certain interval is available on Save tab on Options dialog box is called Auto Recove ***** RY17012023 ND10-3-2023

mcqs.question_en: How can you apply exactly the same formatting you did to another text?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ بالکل وہی فارمیٹنگ کیسے لاگو کر سکتے ہیں جو آپ نے کسی دوسرے ٹیکسٹ پر کی تھی؟
options: Select the text then click on Format Painter and select the new text
Copy the text and paste in new location. Then type the new text again
Copy the text and click on Paste Special tool on new place
mcqs.correct_answer: Select the text then click on Format Painter and select the new text
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Format Painter allows you to copy formatting from one part of the text and apply it to another with ease. It saves time by avoiding manual formatting and ensures consistency in design or style.

mcqs.question_en: To edit the Header & Footer in MS Word 2016, which option is used?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ 2016 میں ہیڈر اور فوٹر میں ترمیم کرنے کے لیے کون سا آپشن استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To edit the Header/Footer in MS Word 2016 , you would typically use the "Header & Footer" option located under the "Insert" tab on the ribbon. This option allows you to add, edit, or remove headers and footers in your document.

mcqs.question_en: Which Alignment is used to change the text to align in both left and right hand side?
mcqs.question_ur: متن کو بائیں اور دائیں دونوں طرف سیدھ میں لانے کے لیے کون سی الائنمنٹ استعمال کی جاتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Justify Text - When you justify text, space is added between words so that both edges of each line are aligned with both margins. Alignment determines the appearance and orientation of the edges of the paragraph: left-aligned text, right-aligned text, centered text, or justified text , which is aligned evenly along the left and right margins. Select the text you want to justify. On the Home tab, in the Paragraph group, click Justify To align it on either side , Select the text that you want to align. On the Home tab, in the Paragraph group, click Align Left Button image or Align Right Button image.

mcqs.question_en: What does the .exe extension represent?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The .exe extension stands for executable file. It contains programs or applications that can be run directly by the computer. These files are commonly used in Windows operating systems to launch software.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is used to edit a chart in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ ورڈ میں چارٹ میں ترمیم کرنے کے لیے مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To edit a chart in MS Word, you should double-click on the chart.

mcqs.question_en: How do you select an entire column?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ پورے کالم کو کیسے منتخب کرتے ہیں؟
options: Select Edit > Select > Column from the menu
Hold down the shift key as you click anywhere in the column
Hold down the Ctrl key as you click anywhere in the column
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To select an entire column in MS-EXCEL : Click the column heading letter. Press CTRL + Space Bar key.

mcqs.question_en: Modern computer compared to earlier computer are?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Modern computers are significantly faster due to advancements in processing power, memory, and overall efficiency.

mcqs.question_en: Which hardware is required to enable a network in a computer?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر میں نیٹ ورک کو فعال کرنے کے لیے کون سے ہارڈ ویئر کی ضرورت ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Network Interface Card (NIC) is necessary for connecting a computer to a network. It allowing data communication . It enables wired or wireless network connections for internet access or local network communication.

mcqs.question_en: A row in an MS Access (database) table is called?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسیس (ڈیٹا بیس) ٹیبل میں ایک قطار کو کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS Access, columns in a table are called fields . It store specific types of data for each record. Rows in an MS Access table are called Records . It representing individual entries or data points within the table.

mcqs.question_en: How to edit chart in ppt presentation?
mcqs.question_ur: پی پی ٹی پریزنٹیشن  چارٹ میں ترمیم کیسے ھوتی ھے
options: Click and drag the chart object
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: Computer spreadsheet cell that is highlighted with a heavy border is a ______?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر اسپریڈشیٹ سیل جو بھاری بارڈر کے ساتھ ہائی لائٹ ہوتا ہے ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The current active cell can be identified as being the one that has a darker black border around it.

mcqs.question_en: What is a database?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا بیس کیا ہے؟
options: Consist of many different files linked with each other for the retrieval of information
mcqs.correct_answer: Consist of many different files linked with each other for the retrieval of information
mcqs.explanation: Explanation It is defined as an organized collection of data or information for easy access, updating, and management in a computer. ********* RY 13-12-202

mcqs.question_en: A character that is raised and smaller above the baseline is known as ____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک کردار جو بیس لائن کے اوپر اوپر اور چھوٹا ہو اسے ____ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Superscript is a character that is set slightly above the normal line. A superscript is a number, figure, symbol, or indicator that is smaller than the normal line of type and is set slightly above it. ND11-2-2023 ND4-4-20234 AGM 02.05.2023

mcqs.question_en: In an Excel sheet the active cell is indicated by ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل شیٹ میں فعال سیل کو ______ سے ظاہر کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In an Excel worksheet, the active cell is indicated by a dark, wide border . The active cell is the cell that is currently selected and receives user interaction. It is the cell that you type into when you begin working on a spreadsheet. You can select any cell as the active cell by clicking on it.

mcqs.question_en: What is the first slide called in Microsoft PowerPoint?
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ پاورپوائنٹ میں پہلی سلائیڈ کو کیا کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A title slide in PowerPoint can take on many different definitions, but in most cases, it is the first slide in the slide deck and appears in the PowerPoint workspace when that presentation is opened. By default in PowerPoint , the title slide offers two text boxes for a title and subtitle.

mcqs.question_en: Which one of the following is not a valid memory unit?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ایک درست میموری یونٹ نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation XB is not a valid memory unit. As standard memory units include KB (Kilobyte), MB (Megabyte), GB (Gigabyte), and so on. Memory units follow binary prefixes and progressions. But XB does not exist in this system.

mcqs.question_en: Which device has the highest memory capacity?
mcqs.question_ur: کس ڈیوائس میں میموری کی صلاحیت سب سے زیادہ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation the Device having the largest storage capacity is Hard Disk. hard disk has a capacity from 5 MB to 100 TB while The CD has a capacity of 700 MB DVD has a capacity o f 4.8 GB to 8.5 GB ND5-07-2023

mcqs.question_en: What is an attribute?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک وصف کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An attribute defines a property or characteristic of an entity , such as name, age, or color. It is commonly used in databases to describe the details of an entity.

mcqs.question_en: What is an entity?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک ہستی کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An entity refers to a single object, person, or concept that can be distinctly identified. It often used in databases . Examples include a customer, product, or employee in an organizational context.

mcqs.question_en: Word, Excel, Access, PowerPoint are called?
mcqs.question_ur: ورڈ، ایکسل، ایکسس، پاورپوائنٹ کیا کہلاتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS Office is a suite of productivity software that includes: Word for documents Excel for spreadsheets Access for databases PowerPoint for presentations It is widely used for professional and academic purposes.

mcqs.question_en: By which can you write in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ ایم ایس ورڈ میں کس کے ذریعے لکھ سکتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation You can write in MS Word using both the mouse and the keyboard. While the keyboard is essential for inputting text, the mouse is used for selection and navigation, And keyboard shortcuts offer a way to work more efficiently.

mcqs.question_en: Which keyboard shortcut is used to cut text in MS Office?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس آفس میں ٹیکسٹ کاٹنے کے لیے کون سا کی بورڈ شارٹ کٹ استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Frequently used shortcuts Copy the selected content to the Clipboard. Ctrl+C Paste the contents of the Clipboard. Ctrl+V Select all document content. Ctrl+A Apply bold formatting to text. Ctrl+B *** ND27-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: The shortcut for copy command in MS Word is ____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں کاپی کمانڈ کا شارٹ کٹ ____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Important Short cut keys Copy: Ctrl+C Cut: Ctrl+X Paste: Ctrl+V ND22-6-2023

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is a graphical representation of data?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ڈیٹا کی گرافیکل نمائندگی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A chart is a graphical representation of data. It typically used to visualize information clearly and concisely.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel which bar is used for formula and data writing?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں فارمولا اور ڈیٹا رائٹنگ کے لیے کون سا بار استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Excel, the formula bar is used for writing, editing, and displaying formulas or data entered into a cell. It is located above the worksheet and below the ribbon . It providing a convenient way to input or modify cell content.

mcqs.question_en: You can use the format painter multiple times before you turn it off by ____?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ فارمیٹ پینٹر کو _____ تک بند کرنے سے پہلے اسے متعدد بار استعمال کر سکتے ہیں؟
options: You can use the format painter button on ly one time when you click it
Double clicking the format painter button
Pressing the Ctrl key and clicking the format painter button
Pressing the Alt key and clicking the format painter button
mcqs.correct_answer: Double clicking the format painter button
mcqs.explanation: Explanation We can use the format painter multiple times before we turn it off by double clicking the format painter button.

mcqs.question_en: What is a Light Pen?
mcqs.question_ur: لائٹ قلم کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Light pen is an optical input device. A light pen is a computer input device in the form of a light-sensitive wand used in conjunction with a computer's cathode-ray tube (CRT) display.

mcqs.question_en: In Microsoft Word, when the user is reading a document on the screen and want to hide all other screen elements we choose:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Full-Screen Reading View in Microsoft Word is designed for easier reading By hiding toolbars and other s creen elements It provides a clean i nterface, focusing solely o n the document content. This mode is ideal for reading long documents on the screen.

mcqs.question_en: Personal logs or journal entries posted on the web are known as
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Blogs are personal logs, journal entries, or articles that individuals or organizations post on the web. They often contain: Text Images Videos Links These are typically updated regularly to share thoughts, ideas, or information with an audience

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word Ctrl+U is used as an alternate of?
options: Right click on the selected text and select U
mcqs.explanation: Explanation On MS Word, the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+U is used to apply an underline to the selected text, This is an alternative to clicking the underline icon ( U ) in the toolbar or ribbon.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel, we can add chart from__ tab.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Insert tab in MS Excel contains the options to add charts, including: Bar charts Line charts Pie charts You can find the "Charts" group to create and customiz e visual data representations under this tab.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel, a formula that looks for a value in the leftmost column of a table and then returns a value in the same row for a specific column is called:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The VLOOKUP (Vertical Lookup) function in MS Excel searches for a value in the leftmost column of a table and returns a value in the same row from a specified column. For example This is one of the most commonly used functions for finding and retrieving data in structured tables.

mcqs.question_en: The view that displays the slides of a presentation as miniature representations of the slides is called:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The "Slide Sorter" view in MS PowerPoint displays all the slides in a presentation as small thumbnails. This view is useful for rearranging, duplicating, or deleting slides efficiently.

mcqs.question_en: In MS PowerPoint record slide show can record
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PowerPoint automatically records the time you spend on each slide Including any animation steps that occur, and the use of any triggers on each slide

mcqs.question_en: The first operating system was developed in _____?
mcqs.question_ur: پہلا آپریٹنگ سسٹم _____ میں تیار کیا گیا تھا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The first operating system, known as GM-NAA I/O , was developed in 1950 for IBM computers. It was designed to simplify the execution of programs by managing hardware and software resources.

mcqs.question_en: Which is included in a desktop computer?
mcqs.question_ur: جو ڈیسک ٹاپ کمپیوٹر میں شامل ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A desktop computer includes a hard disk for storage , a CPU (Central Processing Unit) for processing data , and a motherboard that connects all the components together. All of these components are essential for the basic functioning of a desktop computer.

mcqs.question_en: With which view you can see how texts and graphics appear on the printed page?
mcqs.question_ur: کس نقطہ نظر سے آپ دیکھ سکتے ہیں کہ پرنٹ شدہ صفحہ پر متن اور گرافکس کیسے ظاہر ہوتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word , With the help of Print Layout view can you see how text and graphics will appear on the printed page . Your document opens showing the entire page , just the way it will appear when it is printed on a sheet of paper . You can make changes while text formatting, images, and page layout are visible.

mcqs.question_en: The best technology to save data on a disk is ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈسک پر ڈیٹا محفوظ کرنے کی بہترین ٹیکنالوجی ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Laser technology is used in optical disks (like CDs and DVDs). It allowing for precise data storage and retrieval.

mcqs.question_en: The capacity of a compact disk is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیکٹ ڈسک کی گنجائش _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A CD (Compact Disc) is an optical disk format that can store sound, pre-recorded text, graphics, and other digital data. It is widely used for audio playback, software distribution, and data storage. Standard CDs hold up to 700 MB of data or 80 minutes of audio. CDs are read using a laser in a CD drive , which interprets the stored data.

mcqs.question_en: Which is not a multitasking operating system?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا ملٹی ٹاسکنگ آپریٹنگ سسٹم نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DOS (Disk Operating System) is a single-tasking operating system, meaning it can only run one program at a time. Windows and Linux are multitasking operating systems, capable of running multiple programs simultaneously.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following keystroke update a bibliography field?
mcqs.question_ur: درج ذیل میں سے کون سا کلیدی اسٹروک کتابیات کے فیلڈ کو اپ ڈیٹ کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The F9 key is used in MS Word to update fields, including the bibliography field, ensuring the latest changes are reflected. It refreshes all selected fields , making it a crucial shortcut for dynamic content.

mcqs.question_en: What is to be used to add text in slide?
mcqs.question_ur: سلائیڈ میں ٹیکسٹ شامل کرنے کے لیے کیا استعمال کیا جائے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Text box is used to add and format text directly on a slide in presentation software like MS PowerPoint. It allows customization of size, position, and style to fit the slide's content design.

mcqs.question_en: Reusable optical storage will typically have acronym?
mcqs.question_ur: دوبارہ قابل استعمال آپٹیکل اسٹوریج کا مخفف عام طور پر ہوگا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The acronym RW stands for " Rewritable. " It indicating that the optical storage , such as CD-RW or DVD-RW . It can be written, erased, and reused multiple times. It is commonly used for storing data that may need updating or modification.

mcqs.question_en: A/an _____ appearing on a webpage opens another document which clicked?
mcqs.question_ur: ویب صفحہ پر ظاہر ہونے والا ایک ________  اور دستاویز کھولتا ہے جس پر کلک کیا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Hyperlink appearing on a webpage opens another document that is clicked. In computing, a hyperlink, or simply a link, is a reference to data that the user can follow by clicking or tapping . ND7-5-2023

mcqs.question_en: Your _____ files stores various versions of running programs?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ کی _____ فائلیں چلنے والے پروگراموں کے مختلف ورژن محفوظ کرتی ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Cache stores temporary files and various versions of running programs to speed up access and improve performance. It helps in retrieving frequently used data or instructions quickly without reloading them from the main storage.

mcqs.question_en: Clipboard function in MS-PowerPoint is ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس پاورپوائنٹ میں کلپ بورڈ کا فنکشن ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Clipboard function in MS-PowerPoint is used to copy . It temporarily store text, images, or objects for pasting elsewhere. It facilitates easy duplication and transfer of content within or between slides.

mcqs.question_en: Dictionary used in MS-Office is ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس آفس میں استعمال ہونے والی ڈکشنری ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Thesaurus in MS-Office provides synonyms and antonyms to help enhance vocabulary and improve writing. It can be accessed from the Review tab or by right-clicking a word.

mcqs.question_en: Which alignment choice spreads the data across the width of the cell?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی صف بندی کا انتخاب ڈیٹا کو سیل کی چوڑائی میں پھیلاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Distributed alignment spreads data evenly across the entire width of a cell, creating equal spacing between characters. It is commonly used for improving the readability of text in cells with fixed dimensions.

mcqs.question_en: In MS PowerPoint we can go to next slide by ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس پاورپوائنٹ میں ہم ______ تک اگلی سلائیڈ پر جا سکتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS PowerPoint , you can advance to the next slide using: Mouse : By clicking the mouse button Enter button : By pressing the Enter key on your keyboard Space bar : By pressing the Space bar on your keyboard Additionally, you can also use other methods such as: Using the arrow keys (→ or ↓) Using the Page Down key Using the mouse wheel Using the presentation remote (if you have one)

mcqs.question_en: MS Word Automatically save document after every _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ ہر _____ کے بعد دستاویز کو خود بخود محفوظ کریں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS Word's AutoRecover feature automatically saves documents at regular intervals. The default interval is 10 minutes , but this can be adjusted in Word's settings.

mcqs.question_en: What is The maximum Zoom percentage in MS PowerPoint?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس پاورپوائنٹ میں زوم کا زیادہ سے زیادہ فیصد کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ZOOM Percentage MS Word (minimum) 10% MS Word (maximum) 500% MS Power Point(minimum) 10% MS PowerPoint(maximum) 400% MS Excel (maximum) 400% MS Excel (minimum) 10%

mcqs.question_en: Mail Merge tab is in _____?
mcqs.question_ur: میل مرج ٹیب _____ میں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Mail Merge tab is found under the Mailing tab in Microsoft Word. It provides tools for creating and managing mail merge documents. It including combining documents with recipient lists to send customized emails, letters, or labels.

mcqs.question_en: Clipboard in home is used for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: گھر میں کلپ بورڈ _____ کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Clipboard in the Home tab is used for copying and pasting text or data between different parts of a document or between different applications. It temporarily stores data that has been cut or copied, allowing it to be pasted elsewhere.

mcqs.question_en: How many types of page orientations?
mcqs.question_ur: صفحہ کی سمت بندی کی کتنی اقسام ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Page orientation refers to the way a page is aligned or rotated for printing or display. There are two main types of page orientation: Portrait (vertical) Landscape (horizontal) Landscape is an example of page orientation, where the page is rotated to have a wider width than height.

mcqs.question_en: Default name of a newly created MS Word File is?
mcqs.question_ur: نئی بنائی گئی ایم ایس ورڈ فائل کا ڈیفالٹ نام کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The default name of a newly created MS Word file is: Document1 This is the placeholder name until the file is saved with a different name by the user.

mcqs.question_en: To fix values in an excel we use _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل میں اقدار کو ٹھیک کرنے کے لیے ہم _____ استعمال کرتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Excel, an absolute reference (e.g., $A$1 ) is used to fix a cell's value, Ensuring it does not change when copied or dragged to other cells. It is achieved by adding dollar signs ( $ ) before the column and row in the cell reference.

mcqs.question_en: Which of following show document name and information?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا دستاویز کا نام اور معلومات دکھاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Title Bar displays the document name and application information at the top of the window. It helps identify the open file and often includes controls like minimize, maximize, and close.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word 2016, the Screenshot is in the?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ 2016 میں، اسکرین شاٹ موجود ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following allow you to select more than one slide in a presentation?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون آپ کو ایک پریزنٹیشن میں ایک سے زیادہ سلائیڈ منتخب کرنے کی اجازت دیتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Holding Ctrl and clicking on individual slides allows you to select multiple non-consecutive slides in a presentation. This is useful for applying changes or moving selected slides as a group.

mcqs.question_en: To set indent, to change Margins and to set tabs show under?
mcqs.question_ur: انڈینٹ سیٹ کرنے کے لیے، مارجن کو تبدیل کرنے کے لیے اور ٹیبز کو سیٹ کرنے کے لیے نیچے دکھائے جاتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Ruler in word processing software like MS Word is used to set indents, change margins, and adjust tab stops. It provides a visual guide for formatting and aligning text on the page.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following can be renamed?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کس کا نام تبدیل کیا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In spreadsheet software like Microsoft Excel, both a worksheet ( individual sheet ) and a workbook ( entire file ) can be renamed for better organization. Worksheets are renamed by double-clicking the tab, and workbooks are renamed by saving the file with a new name.

mcqs.question_en: Illustration group is in which tab?
mcqs.question_ur: السٹریشن گروپ کس ٹیب میں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Illustrations group contains tools for creating drawings and illustrations, including: Pictures, Clip Art, Shapes, SmartArt, and Screenshot. The Illustrations group can be used to enhance the appearance and layout of a document.

mcqs.question_en: Analog signal is measured in _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ینالاگ سگنل _____ میں ماپا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The amplitude of an analog signal is measured in volts (V) , representing the signal's strength or intensity . The frequency of an analog signal is measured in hertz (Hz) , indicating the number of cycles the signal completes per second.

mcqs.question_en: What is the function of the shortcut key Ctrl+Shift+C?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The shortcut key Ctrl+Shift+C is used to copy formatting in mos t text editing software

mcqs.question_en: What is the fastest way of data transmission?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا کی ترسیل کا تیز ترین طریقہ کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Optical fiber provides the fastest data transmission by using light signals to transmit data at high speeds. It offers significantly higher bandwidth and lower latency compared to copper or coaxial cables.

mcqs.question_en: What is the process of converting simple language to machine language called?
mcqs.question_ur: سادہ زبان کو مشینی زبان میں تبدیل کرنے کے عمل کو کیا کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A compiler translates high-level programming language (simple language) into machine language (binary code) that a computer can understand and execute. Additional information A modem is used to modulate and demodulate signals for internet communication, not for converting languages. An interpreter performs similar functions to a compiler but translates code line-by-line at runtime.

mcqs.question_en: What is the technique by which passwords and usernames can be stolen?
mcqs.question_ur: وہ کونسی تکنیک ہے جس کے ذریعے پاس ورڈ اور صارف نام چوری کیے جا سکتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Phishing A social engineering technique where hackers trick people into revealing their passwords by sending fake emails or messages. The emails may appear to be from a reputable company or a friend May include links to malicious websites or attachments

mcqs.question_en: Which keyboard shortcut Italic selected text?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا کی بورڈ شارٹ کٹ اٹالک متن کو منتخب کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To put the selected text in italics , press the Ctrl + I keys. text bold using Ctrl B text underlined using Ctrl U

mcqs.question_en: Printer is an example of?
mcqs.question_ur: پرنٹر کس کی ایک مثال ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Hard copy output devices are plotters and printers. *** Hard copies example includes: books , official letters , notes, newspapers, magazines ** Soft copies example includes: ebooks, pdf files, word documents, presentation files, scanned copy. ND23-2-2023

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not a type of chart?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا چارٹ کی قسم نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A T-graph , commonly known as a T-chart , is a graphic organizer used to compare two aspects of a topic, such as pros and cons or facts and opinions. Common types of charts include Bar charts, Line charts, Pie charts, Area charts, Scatter plots, and Histograms , but T-graph is not among them.

mcqs.question_en: Photo editor is found in _____?
mcqs.question_ur: فوٹو ایڈیٹر _____ میں پایا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS PowerPoint includes a photo editor with tools for basic image adjustments, such as cropping, resizing, and adding effects. These features are designed to enhance presentations by allowing users to modify images directly within the application.

mcqs.question_en: Two are more computers connected to each other for sharing information from a _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک _____ سے معلومات کے اشتراک کے لیے دو مزید کمپیوٹرز ایک دوسرے سے جڑے ہوئے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation When two or more computers are connected together so they can communicate with one another, they form a network. The computer connected to the server is called Workstation. **** ND04-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following helps to reduce spelling errors in a document being typed?
mcqs.question_ur: درج ذیل میں سے کون سی دستاویز ٹائپ کی جا رہی ہے اس میں املا کی غلطیوں کو کم کرنے میں مدد کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation AutoCorrect helps to reduce spelling errors in a document by automatically correcting misspelled words as you type. AutoCorrect is a software feature commonly found in word processing programs, such as Microsoft Word .

mcqs.question_en: In an email account, ______ contains a list of names and email addresses.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The address book contains a list of names and email addresses for easy reference and sending emails. It allows users to quickly select recipients without manually entering email addresses each time.

mcqs.question_en: Sorting can be done by ______?
mcqs.question_ur: چھانٹنا ______ کی طرف سے کیا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Sorting in software like Excel can be done by Date and Time, Alphabetical order, or Numerical values based on the data type. It allows organizing data efficiently to analyze or present information effectively.

mcqs.question_en: Which is widely used for transmitting streaming videos data on the internet?
mcqs.question_ur: جو انٹرنیٹ پر اسٹریمنگ ویڈیوز کے ڈیٹا کو منتقل کرنے کے لیے بڑے پیمانے پر استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MP4 (MPEG-4 Part 14) is a widely used container format for transmitting streaming videos online. It supports various codecs, including H.264, which is known for its efficient compression and compatibility with most devices. Why other options are incorrect: AVI (Audio Video Interleave): While AVI is a common video format, it's not as optimized for streaming as MP4. It can be larger and less efficient for online delivery. WMA (Windows Media Audio) : WMA is primarily an audio format, not designed for video streaming. WAV: WAV is a pure audio format used for high-quality recordings. It's not suitable for streaming video.

mcqs.question_en: What feature will you use to apply motion effects in between a slide exits and another enters?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک سلائیڈ سے باہر نکلنے اور دوسری داخل ہونے کے درمیان حرکت کے اثرات کو لاگو کرنے کے لیے آپ کون سی خصوصیت استعمال کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Slide transitions are the effects that occur when you move from one slide to the next during a presentation. You can control the speed, add sound, and customize the properties of transition effects.

mcqs.question_en: When you insert a comment in a document, the comment appears in a ________?
mcqs.question_ur: جب آپ کسی دستاویز میں تبصرہ داخل کرتے ہیں تو تبصرہ ________ میں ظاہر ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Microsoft Word, when you insert a comment in a document, it appears in a " Balloon " on the side of the document. This allows the comment to be easily seen without disrupting the main text. Shortcut key to add a comment: Alt + ctrl + M

mcqs.question_en: In Microsoft Window 7, _______ can give you information about weather.
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ ونڈو 7 میں، ______ آپ کو موسم کے بارے میں معلومات دے سکتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Microsoft Windows 7, Gadgets are small applications that can display information. Such as the weather, time, and system performance on your desktop. They provide quick access to data without needing to open a full application

mcqs.question_en: In PowerPoint 2007 an orderly display information using different media elements is known as?
mcqs.question_ur: پاورپوائنٹ 2007 میں میڈیا کے مختلف عناصر کا استعمال کرتے ہوئے ایک منظم ڈسپلے معلومات کو کیا کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Multimedia presentations are widely used in education, business, and entertainment for effective communication. Animation : Refers to visual effects applied to objects or text in slides. Transition : Describes effects used when moving between slides.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is Not one of Excel’s “what-if’ function?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون ایکسل کے "اگر-مگر" فنکشن میں سے ایک نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation " Auto Outline " is not a "what-if" analysis function; it is used for grouping and summarizing data in Excel. The " what-if" analysis functions include Goal Seek, Scenario Manager, and Data Tables , which help analyze different outcomes based on variable changes.

mcqs.question_en: What is a computer virus?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر وائرس کیا ہے؟
options: A type of insect that harms computer
A type of program that harms computer
A type of hardware that harms computer
A type of firmware that harms computer
mcqs.correct_answer: A type of program that harms computer
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A computer virus is: deliberately created A virus can remain dormant in our computer, without showing any sign or symptom. Other Questions Related to "COMPUTER VIRUS" *** Computer Virus operates by: Dormancy and Replication *** From where a computer can get a virus? Email and in internet *** Which is the first computer virus in World? Creeper *** First, ever computer virus was created from -------: Pakistan ND11-3-2023

mcqs.question_en: A type of malware often disguised as legitimate software is _____?
mcqs.question_ur: میلویئر کی ایک قسم جو اکثر جائز سافٹ ویئر کے طور پر بھیس میں آتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Trojan Horse is a type of malware that disguises itself as legitimate software . A Virus is a type of malware that inserts itself into another program. A worm is similar to a virus, except that it does not need a program in order to run.

mcqs.question_en: Which type of mode takes place in both the directions at the same time?
mcqs.question_ur: دونوں سمتوں میں ایک ہی وقت میں کس قسم کا موڈ ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Full duplex mode allows communication in both directions simultaneously. In contrast, half duplex mode permits communication in both directions , but not at the same time Simplex mode allows communication only in one direction.

mcqs.question_en: Rows in Microsoft Excel are labeled as _____?
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ ایکسل میں قطاروں پر _____ کا لیبل لگا ہوا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In an Excel worksheet, the first cell is labeled as A1 due to the following reasons: Grid System : Excel uses a grid to organize cells, with rows and columns. Rows Labeled by Numbers : Rows are labeled using numbers (1, 2, 3, etc.). Columns Labeled by Letters : Columns are labeled using letters (A, B, C, etc.). First Cell Location : The first cell is located at the intersection of row 1 and column A, hence labeled A1.

mcqs.question_en: When creating a new table which method can be used to choose fields from standard databases and tables?
mcqs.question_ur: نیا ٹیبل بناتے وقت معیاری ڈیٹا بیس اور ٹیبلز سے فیلڈز کا انتخاب کرنے کے لیے کون سا طریقہ استعمال کیا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The " Create Table using Wizard " method allows users to select fields from standard databases and tables, simplifying the process. It provides step-by-step guidance to create a new table by choosing pre-defined fields efficiently.

mcqs.question_en: The default language of Microsoft Word is ______?
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ ورڈ کی ڈیفالٹ زبان ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The default language of Microsoft Word is set to USA English unless changed by the user. This setting applies to spelling, grammar checks, and formatting in the document.

mcqs.question_en: Who is called the Father of Internet?
mcqs.question_ur: انٹرنیٹ کا باپ کسے کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Vinton Gray Cerf , born on June 23, 1943. He is an American Internet pioneer known as the " Father of the Internet ." In 1997 , President Bill Clinton awarded him the U.S. National Medal of Technology.

mcqs.question_en: In E-mail address, name of the email service provider comes after _______ sign.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In an email address, the " @ " symbol separates the local part (username) from the domain part (service provider's name). For example, in " user@example.com ", "user" is the local part, and " example.com " is the domain part, indicating the email service provider.

mcqs.question_en: Which data type allows alphanumeric characters and special symbols in MS-Access?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسیس میں کس ڈیٹا کی قسم حروف نمبری حروف اور خصوصی علامتوں کی اجازت دیتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation TEXT data type contains all types of text data type. It comprises more than single-byte character that is supported by the system.

mcqs.question_en: The thin black cross-shaped pointer in MS Excel is used to _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں سیاہ کراس کی شکل کا پتلا پوائنٹر کس لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Excel, the thin black cross-shaped pointer, known as the Fill Handle . It is used to automatically fill adjacent cells with data, formulas, or patterns. By dragging the Fill Handle, users can extend sequences, such as numbers, dates, or custom lists, efficiently across selected cells.

mcqs.question_en: Who invented the Qwerty keyboard?
mcqs.question_ur: کویٹری کی بورڈ کس نے ایجاد کیا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation QWERTY refers to the first six letters on the upper row of the keyboard. The QWERTY layout was devised and created in the early 1870s The key arrangement was devised by Christopher Latham Sholes 104 buttons or keys in a QWERTY keyboard The QWERTY keyboard is also known as the Sholes keyboard ND18-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: Slide ______ of the effects that determine how a slide moves in and out of the view in the slideshow.
mcqs.question_ur: ان اثرات کی سلائیڈ ______ جو اس بات کا تعین کرتی ہے کہ سلائیڈ شو میں کس طرح ایک سلائیڈ منظر کے اندر اور باہر جاتی ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Slide Show view means you can see your presentation graphics, animated effects, and transition effects, etc. on full screen. To start the Slide show view , Press F5 . To exit the Slide Show view , press ESC . ****** ND30-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: The function of a ____ is similar to that of a mouse.
mcqs.question_ur: کس کا فنکشن ماؤس کی طرح ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A joystick sometimes called a flight stick. The joystick is an input device consisting of a stick that pivots on a base and reports its angle or direction to the device it is controlling. ND18-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: What is the shortcut key for Help in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں مدد کے لیے شارٹ کٹ کی کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation F2 : Used to move or rename text. F3 : Inserts AutoText entries if available. F4 : Repeats the last action performed. F5 : Opens the "Find and Replace" dialog box with the "Go To" tab active.

mcqs.question_en: In Windows operating system _____ is known as a file manager.
mcqs.question_ur: ونڈوز آپریٹنگ سسٹم میں _____ کو فائل مینیجر کے طور پر جانا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation File Explorer , previously known as Windows Explorer. is a file manager application that is included with releases of the Microsoft Windows operating system from Windows 95 onwards. It provides a graphical user interface for accessing the file systems. ****** ND30-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Add Now Hardware option exists in _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ابھی شامل کریں ہارڈ ویئر کا آپشن _____ میں موجود ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Control Panel provides access to hardware settings and options. Users can manage and configure hardware devices, such as printers, sound cards, and graphics cards. Additional points: Device Manager : Manages and troubleshoots hardware devices System Properties : Displays system information and settings Settings App : Provides access to system settings, including hardware options (in Windows 10 and later)

mcqs.question_en: An electronic copy of data such as a Tile viewed on a computer’s display is called?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا کی الیکٹرانک کاپی جیسے کمپیوٹر کے ڈسپلے پر دیکھی جانے والی ٹائل کو کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A soft copy is an electronic version of data, such as a file or document, stored digitally. Soft copies are typically viewed on a computer or mobile device screen.

mcqs.question_en: Information on a hard disk is usually backed up using _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ہارڈ ڈسک پر معلومات کا بیک اپ عام طور پر _____؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Information on a hard disk is usually backed up using a backup storage device. Such as a CD-ROM, SSD, HDD, optical disk, or tape system. The type of medium used depends on how quickly the data needs to be restored.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word 2007, which of the following is used to extend a selection of one character to the right side?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ 2007 میں، مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ایک حرف کے انتخاب کو دائیں طرف بڑھانے کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word 2007, SHIFT+RIGHT ARROW is used to extend the selection of text one character to the right. SHIFT+LEFT ARROW is used to extend the selection of one character to the left side.

mcqs.question_en: Getting data from a cell located in a different sheet is called?
mcqs.question_ur: مختلف شیٹ میں موجود سیل سے ڈیٹا حاصل کرنا کیا کہلاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Getting data from a cell located in a different sheet is called Cell reference . There are Three types of Cell reference in Excel Relative Absolute Mixed **** RY17-012-23

mcqs.question_en: The actual working area of the Computer's Microsoft Excel is?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کے مائیکروسافٹ ایکسل کا اصل ورکنگ ایریا کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The actual working area of the Computer's Microsoft Excel is a worksheet. The title bar in MS Excel displays the name of the workbook. The main window in a computer spreadsheet is called a workbook.

mcqs.question_en: Which is used as first generation language?
mcqs.question_ur: جس کو پہلی نسل کی زبان کے طور پر استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Machine language , or machine code, is a low-level language comprised of binary digits (1 and 2). Since computers are digital devices, they only recognize binary data.

mcqs.question_en: To send an email which of the following is necessary?
mcqs.question_ur: ای میل بھیجنے کے لیے درج ذیل میں سے کون سا ضروری ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation E-mail stands for: Electronic Mail Father of E-mail: Ray Tomlinson First E-mail sent: 1971 @ is used to divide an email into: two parts SMTP helps to send: E-mails SMTP stands for: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol Received email is saved: inbox Sent email is saved in: sent box Maximum attachment size in Yahoo Email: 25 MB G-mail stands: Google Mail Email spam also called: junk email To close email account click: sign out To create new E-mail: Sign Up Email hacking means: Illegal access to open email accounts of others Junk email is also called: Spam At sign ( @ ): always a part of email address Sending an E-mail is similar to: writing a letter A allows us to access our e-mail from anywhere: Webmail interface Bookmark :  is associated with Internet E-mail

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following holds data and processing instructions temporarily until the CPU needs it?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون ڈیٹا اور پروسیسنگ ہدایات کو عارضی طور پر رکھتا ہے جب تک کہ سی پی یو کو اس کی ضرورت نہ ہو؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Primary storage, also known as main storage or memory. It is the area in a computer in which data is stored for quick access by the computer's processor. The terms random access memory (RAM) and memory are often as synonyms for primary or main storage.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not a high-level programming language?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی اعلیٰ سطحی پروگرامنگ زبان نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Machine language is a low-level language It consists of binary code (0s and 1s) that is directly executed by a computer's CPU. High-level languages like C, Java, and Fortran are designed to be more user-friendly and abstracted from machine code.

mcqs.question_en: We can check our email using inbox mail ?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Inbox in an email system is the folder where incoming emails are stored, allowing users to check and read their emails.

mcqs.question_en: Junk mail is also known as spam mail?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Spam is another name for junk Email junk email refers to unsolicited email messages, usually sent in bulk to a large list of recipients.

mcqs.question_en: What is the term for the process of converting data into a code to prevent unauthorized access?
mcqs.question_ur: غیر مجاز رسائی کو روکنے کے لیے ڈیٹا کو کوڈ میں تبدیل کرنے کے عمل کی اصطلاح کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Encryption is the process of converting plaintext data into a coded, unreadable form to protect it from unauthorized access. The primary purpose of encryption is to ensure the confidentiality and security of sensitive information.

mcqs.question_en: By default we can save the file in ______?
mcqs.question_ur: پہلے سے طے شدہ طور پر ہم فائل کو ______ میں محفوظ کر سکتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation By default, most operating systems save files in the " My Documents " folder for easy access and organization. My documents is the default location of saving and opening the files in windows operating system. This location can be changed manually based on user preferences or software settings.

mcqs.question_en: Which is the largest hardware company of computers?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کی سب سے بڑی ہارڈویئر کمپنی کون سی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation According to the options, B is correct; the largest computer hardware company is HP (Hewlett-Packard). Otherwise The largest computer hardware company in the world, by market capitalization, is Apple Inc.

mcqs.question_en: MS Word and MS Excel are ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ اور ایم ایس ایکسل ______ ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Application software , such as MS Word and MS Excel , is designed to perform specific tasks, like word processing and spreadsheet analysis. Application software runs on top of operating systems, such as Windows or macOS, and provides users with a interface to interact with the computer.

mcqs.question_en: Which is the default text editor for Microsoft Windows?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Notepad is a basic text-editing program which enables computer users to create documents. Notepad is a basic text editor used to create and edit plain text files without formatting.

mcqs.question_en: How much free storage does Google Drive offer?
mcqs.question_ur: گوگل ڈرائیو کتنا مفت اسٹوریج پیش کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Google Drive offers 15 GB of free storage per Google account. This storage is shared across Google Drive, Gmail, and Google Photos.

mcqs.question_en: Who developed the first compiler?
mcqs.question_ur: پہلا کمپائلر کس نے تیار کیا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Grace Hopper is credited with inventing the first compiler , which she called A-0, in 1952. Hopper's A-0 compiler was operational on the Univac computer .

mcqs.question_en: 10. Which one of the following is not browser? . Google. Internet explorer. Firefox. Unix
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Unix is not a browser, but Google, Internet Explorer, and Firefox are: Unix: Not a browser Google: A search engine, not a browser Internet Explorer: A web browser Firefox: A free, open-source web browser developed by the Mozilla Foundation and Mozilla Corporation

mcqs.question_en: Who invented the microprocessor?
mcqs.question_ur: مائکرو پروسیسر کس نے ایجاد کیا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Marcian Edward "Ted" Hoff Jr. is one of the inventors of the microprocessor. In 1980 , Hoff was named the first Intel Fellow, which is the highest technical position in the company. He stayed in that position until 1983 when he left for Atari.

mcqs.question_en: Who invented email?
mcqs.question_ur: ای میل کس نے ایجاد کی؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Email was first introduced by Ray Tomlinson . Email is a digital message sent from an author to one or more recipients. Ray Tomlinson sent the first e-mail message as QWERTYUIOP in 1971 . Unwanted emails received in a folder is called Spam. Gmail is a famous email service provided by Google. The latest email systems technologies are based on a store-and-forward model . Charles Babbage is considered the " father of the computer ". Antonio Meucci developed a voice-communication apparatus that several sources credit as the first telephone.

mcqs.question_en: Who develop the idea for universal turing machines which become the basis for the first computer?
mcqs.question_ur: یونیورسل ٹیورنگ مشینوں کا خیال کون تیار کرتا ہے جو پہلے کمپیوٹر کی بنیاد بنتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Turing's most notable work today is as a computer scientist. In 1936 , he developed the idea for the Universal Turing Machine , the basis for the first computer. He developed a test for artificial intelligence in 1950 , which is still used today.

mcqs.question_en: CD is an optical disk format that is used to hold _____?
mcqs.question_ur: سی ڈی ایک آپٹیکل ڈسک فارمیٹ ہے جو _____ رکھنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A CD (Compact Disc) is an optical disk format that can store sound, pre-recorded text, graphics, and other digital data. It is widely used for audio playback, software distribution, and data storage. Standard CDs hold up to 700 MB of data or 80 minutes of audio. CDs are read using a laser in a CD drive , which interprets the stored data.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following files have an 'mpg' extension?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی فائل میں 'ایم پی جی' ایکسٹینشن ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation .mpg is a file extension for video files compressed using the MPEG (Moving Picture Experts Group) standard. It is commonly used for digital video distribution due to its efficient compression while maintaining good video quality. Variants of the format include MPEG-1 (used in CDs) and MPEG-2 (used in DVDs and broadcasting).

mcqs.question_en: Which object is the output of the database application?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا بیس ایپلی کیشن کا آؤٹ پٹ کون سا اعتراض ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A report is the output of a database application, designed to present data in a readable format. Reports summarize and analyze data from tables or queries . This making it easy for users to interpret the information.

mcqs.question_en: Short cut key to saving any document in MS Office is?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس آفس میں کسی بھی دستاویز کو محفوظ کرنے کی شارٹ کٹ کلید ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Short cut key to saving any document in MS office is Ctrl+S. *** Basic Office keyboard shortcuts · CTRL + C - copy selection. · CTRL + V - paste selection. · CTRL + X - cut selection. · CTRL + Z - undo action. · CTRL + Y - repeat action . · CTRL + B - bold text. · CTRL + I - italicize text. · CTRL + U - underline text . SH4-9-2023

mcqs.question_en: Which material is used in making of Computer Chips?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر چپس بنانے میں کون سا مواد استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Silicon is the primary material used in making computer chips. Due to its excellent semiconductor properties. They are essential for controlling electrical currents.

mcqs.question_en: To move to the previous cell in a table inserted in a document, press?
mcqs.question_ur: کسی دستاویز میں داخل کردہ ٹیبل میں پچھلے سیل پر جانے کے لیے، دبائیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To move to the previous cell in a table, press Shift + Tab . This allows you to navigate backward within the table. To move to the next cell , press The Tab Key. This advances the cursor to the following cell in the table.

mcqs.question_en: What is the shortcut key used for Ctrl + Shift + M?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The keyboard shortcut Ctrl + Shift + M removes a paragraph indent in Microsoft Word . Here are some other keyboard shortcuts for formatting paragraphs in Microsoft Word: Ctrl + M: Indents a paragraph Ctrl + R: Aligns a paragraph to the right Ctrl + T: Creates a hanging indent

mcqs.question_en: Scanner is a/an _______?
mcqs.question_ur: سکینر ایک ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A scanner scans images, printed text, handwriting or an object and converts it to a digital image. Scanner is an in put device. Scanner founder: Russell Kirsch Russell Kirsch belongs to USA . agm.5.3.23

mcqs.question_en: You can create a new presentation by completing all of the following except ______?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ ______ کے علاوہ مندرجہ ذیل میں سے سبھی کو مکمل کرکے ایک نئی پیشکش بنا سکتے ہیں؟
options: Clicking the new button on the standard toolbar
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Clicking "File" > "New" (or Ctrl + N) creates a new presentation. Clicking the "New" button on the Standard toolbar also creates a new presentation. Pressing Ctrl + N is a shortcut to create a new presentation. However, clicking "File" > "Open" is used to open an existing presentation, not create a new one.

mcqs.question_en: Who invented Java programming?
mcqs.question_ur: جاوا پروگرامنگ کس نے ایجاد کی؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Java programming was developed by James Gosling at Sun Microsystems in 1995. James Gosling is well known as the father of Java. 2. ... The first version of Java was released: on 23 May 1995 Java Designed by: James Gosling ( Canadian computer scientist )

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel, to view a cell comment ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں، سیل کمنٹ دیکھنے کے لیے ______؟
options: Click the edit comment command on the insert menu
Position the mouse pointer over the cell
Click the display comment command on the window menu
mcqs.correct_answer: Position the mouse pointer over the cell
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Excel, cell comments are displayed when you hover over the cell containing the comment. The comment appears in a small box , providing additional information or context about the cell's contents.

mcqs.question_en: "Disk Cleanup" is a/an _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈسک کی صفائی ایک _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Disk Cleanup is a built-in utility program in Windows that helps users free up space by removing unnecessary files , such as temporary files and system cache. It improves system performance by cleaning up unused and redundant data from the hard drive.

mcqs.question_en: Which menu should we used, if we want to add Clip Art?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر ہم کلپ آرٹ شامل کرنا چاہتے ہیں تو ہمیں کون سا مینو استعمال کرنا چاہئے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS PowerPoint and MS Word , the " Insert " menu provides options for adding various elements, including clip art. Clip art is a collection of images, sounds, and animations that can be inserted into documents and presentations. The " Insert " menu also offers options for adding tables, charts, shapes, and other multimedia elements. Clip art can be used to enhance the visual appeal and illustrate key points in presentations and documents.

mcqs.question_en: How do you apply bold formatting to text in Word?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ ورڈ میں متن پر بولڈ فارمیٹنگ کیسے لاگو کرتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To apply bold formatting to text in Microsoft Word, you can press Ctrl + B on your keyboard. This shortcut makes the selected text bold. Ctrl + I is used to italicize text. Ctrl + U is used to underline text. Ctrl + S is used to save the document.

mcqs.question_en: To ensure that a graphic that you insert in a document is not distorted when you resize it, select ____?
mcqs.question_ur: اس بات کو یقینی بنانے کے لیے کہ آپ کسی دستاویز میں جو گرافک داخل کرتے ہیں اس کا سائز تبدیل کرتے وقت اسے مسخ نہیں کیا جاتا، منتخب کریں ____؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Locking the aspect ratio ensures that the graphic's proportions remain the same when resized. This prevents the graphic from becoming distorted or stretched.

mcqs.question_en: In word processing, what does an I-beam facilitate?
mcqs.question_ur: ورڈ پروسیسنگ میں، آئی-بیم کیا سہولت فراہم کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The I-beam cursor appears in word processing to indicate where text can be selected or dragged . In word processing, an I-beam pointer , also known as an I-cursor . It allows users to select, edit, and insert text.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not a MS Powerpoint View?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ایم ایس پاورپوائنٹ ویو نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation "Orientation View" is not a MS PowerPoint View. The correct views in Microsoft PowerPoint are: Slide View (also known as Normal View) Slide Sorter View Notes Page View Reading View Slide Show View (full-screen presentation mode) **** RY12-02-23

mcqs.question_en: What category of functions is used in this formula? = PMT (C10/12, CB, C9, 1)
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The PMT function in Excel calculates the payment for a loan based on constant interest rates and payments, categorizing it under financial functions. It uses inputs like rate (C10/12) , number of periods ( CB ), and loan amount ( C9 ) to compute the payment.

mcqs.question_en: "Quick Time" is a ______?
mcqs.question_ur: کوئیک ٹائم ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation QuickTime is a multimedia framework developed by Apple, primarily used for playing video, audio, and image files. It supports various formats and was widely used for media playback on macOS and Windows.

mcqs.question_en: Which PowerPoint feature allows the user to create a simple presentation quickly?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا پاورپوائنٹ فیچر صارف کو ایک سادہ پریزنٹیشن تیزی سے بنانے کی اجازت دیتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PowerPoint has an AutoContent Wizard to help you create a presentation. The wizard provides several slides with different content guides.

mcqs.question_en: What is Internet2?
mcqs.question_ur: انٹرنیٹ 2 کیا ہے؟
options: A research consortium for advanced internet research and development
A unit of Internet Society that promotes technical coordination of internet operations
mcqs.correct_answer: A research consortium for advanced internet research and development
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Internet2 is a non-profit consortium of universities, research institutions, and industry partners. It aims to develop and deploy advanced network technologies to support research and education.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word, to replace straight quotes with smart quotes as you type, which feature will you use?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں، ٹائپ کرتے وقت براہ راست اقتباسات کو سمارٹ اقتباسات سے بدلنے کے لیے، آپ کون سا فیچر استعمال کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Autocorrection It is also known as text replacement , is an automatic data validation function used in word processors and text editing interfaces AutoFormat This feature automatically formats a document as you type it by applying the associated styles to text Auto format feature is used to replace straight quotes with smart quotes while typing Smart Tags It is used for creating actions associated with words or phrases in Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, and Internet Explorer 6. For example, when Smart Tags are enabled in a document, Word may recognize certain phrases (such as names or dates). Smart tags are no longer is in use.

mcqs.question_en: "Yahoo" is a _____?
mcqs.question_ur: یاہو ایک _____ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Yahoo started as a search engine and directory of web pages in 1994 . Over time, Yahoo expanded to include news, finance, and other content , becoming a popular news website.

mcqs.question_en: Twitter is a ______?
mcqs.question_ur: ٹویٹر ایک ______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Twitter is a social network service that allows users to share short messages , known as tweets , and interact with others globally. Twitter was created in March 2006 by Jack Dorsey, Noah Glass, Biz Stone, and Evan Williams and launched in July of that year.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following operators take only integer operands in MS Excel?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سے آپریٹرز ایم ایس ایکسل میں صرف انٹیجر آپرینڈز لیتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The modulus operator (%) in MS Excel returns the remainder of an integer division operation. It requires both operands to be integers .

mcqs.question_en: The short cut key Ctrl + C in MS Word is used for ____?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + C in MS Word is used for the Copy command Ctrl + V  used for = Past Ctrl + C  used for = Copy Ctrl + Z  used for = Undo Ctrl + X used for = Cut Ctrl + Y used for = Redo **** ND10-1-2023 AGM 30.4.23

mcqs.question_en: "Ctrl + Left Arrow" is used to?
options: Moves the cursor beginning of the Line
Moves the cursor one word left
Moves the cursor one paragraph up
Moves the cursor one paragraph down
mcqs.correct_answer: Moves the cursor one word left
mcqs.explanation: Explanation "Ctrl + Left Arrow" is used to: Moves the cursor one word left. "Ctrl + Right Arrow" is used to: Moves the cursor one word right .

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following style properties do you use to specify italic text in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں اٹالک ٹیکسٹ کی وضاحت کے لیے آپ درج ذیل میں سے کون سی اسٹائل پراپرٹیز استعمال کرتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word, the " Font-style " property is used to specify the style of the font, including italic, regular, and oblique. To apply italic text , select the text and choose " Italic " from the " Font-style " options in the Font group of the Home tab. Additional points : You can also use the keyboard shortcut " Ctrl + I " to apply italic formatting. The " Font " dialog box also provides an option to select italic font style.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following Search Engine is developed by Microsoft?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا سرچ انجن مائیکروسافٹ نے تیار کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Bing is a search engine developed by Microsoft. It is launched in 2009 as a successor to its previous search engines like MSN Search and Live Search.

mcqs.question_en: Following combination of keys is used to maximize or restore a selected window?
mcqs.question_ur: منتخب کردہ ونڈو کو زیادہ سے زیادہ یا بحال کرنے کے لیے مندرجہ ذیل چابیاں کا مجموعہ استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To maximize or restore a selected window press CTRL+F10. Press Space to make selections, such as placing a checkmark in a check box. With the object highlighted, press Shift + F10 (Function key F10). Press the arrow keys to move through the menu.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not used to access the web?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ویب تک رسائی کے لیے استعمال نہیں ہوتا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ISDN (Integrated Services Digital Network) is a circuit-switched telephone network system that transmits both data and voice over a digital line. Additional Points : Modem : Converts digital signals to analog for internet access. HTTP/HTTPS : Protocols specifically designed for accessing web pages. TCP : Works alongside UDP but is more reliable for web communications.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word 2007, which shortcut key is used for "Go to a page, bookmark, footnote, table, comment, graphic or other location"?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ 2007 میں، "صفحہ، بک مارک، فوٹ نوٹ، ٹیبل، تبصرہ، گرافک یا دوسرے مقام پر جائیں" کے لیے کون سی شارٹ کٹ کلید استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word 2007, CTRL + G opens the "Go To" dialog box, allowing navigation to a specific page, bookmark, footnote, table, comment, or other locations in the document. It is a quick way to move around large documents without manual scrolling. Other Useful Shortcuts in MS Word 2007 : CTRL + H : Opens the "Find and Replace" dialog box. CTRL + S : Saves the document. CTRL + P : Opens the print dialog box. CTRL + Z : Undoes the last action.

mcqs.question_en: How do you delete a column in MS Excel?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ ایم ایس ایکسل میں کالم کو کیسے حذف کرتے ہیں؟
options: Right-click the column heading you want to delete and select delete from the shortcut menu
