mcqs.explanation: Explanation In simplex transmission mode , communication is unidirectional. It meaning that data flows only from the sender to the receiver.

mcqs.question_en: A twisted wire pair is an example of _____?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک بٹی ہوئی تار کی جوڑی _____ کی ایک مثال ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Twisted wire pairs are commonly used in Ethernet cables for network communications. It providing a balance of cost and performance.

mcqs.question_en: A server used to store recently visited websites and web pages in its database is called a?
mcqs.question_ur: حال ہی میں دیکھی گئی ویب سائٹس اور ویب پیجز کو اپنے ڈیٹا بیس میں محفوظ کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہونے والے سرور کو کہا ____ جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A cache server stores copies of web pages and websites that users have recently visited. It helps in reducing loading times and bandwidth usage.

mcqs.question_en: The IP address 198.168.10.0 belongs to which class?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation IP addresses from 192.0.0.0 to 223.255.255.255 belong to Class C. The address 198.168.10.0 falls within this range.

mcqs.question_en: How many layers does the OSI model have?
mcqs.question_ur: او۔ایس۔آئی ماڈل میں کتنی پرتیں ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The OSI ( Open Systems Interconnection ) model has 7 layers, which are: Physical Data Link Network Transport Session Presentation Application

mcqs.question_en: Elon Musk pulled out 44 billion dollars deal to buy:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Elon Musk pulled out of $44bn deal to buy Twitter on 8 July 2022. Twitter deal signed on: 25 April 2022 Elon Musk is also: CEO of SpaceX (rocket developer) Twitter messages are called: Tweets Logo of Twitter is: Blue Bird Twitter was launched: 2006 Twitter founders : Evan Williams, Jack Dorsey & Biz Stone Twitter CEO is: Parag Agrawal Most followed person on Twitter: Barack Obama (former US president)

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following bar is not available in MS word
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا بار ایم ایس ورڈ میں دستیاب نہیں ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Following bars available in ms word

mcqs.question_en: What does the maximize button do in Microsoft Word?
options: Maximizes the document to fill the Word window
Restores the document to its previous size
mcqs.correct_answer: Maximizes the document to fill the Word window
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The maximize button in Microsoft Word fills the screen with the Word window.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is an Application Protocol____?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ایپلیکیشن پروٹوکول ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation HTTP is a protocol for fetching resources such as HTML documents. HTTPS provides secure communication over a computer network. HTTP can also be used to fetch parts of documents to update Web pages on demand. https://www.google.com is called the URL

mcqs.question_en: If a computer beeps while turning on, or doesn't turn on, what is likely to happen?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر کمپیوٹر آن کرتے وقت بیپ کرتا ہے، یا آن نہیں ہوتا ہے، تو کیا ہونے کا امکان ہے؟
options: It will display a detailed error message
It will boot normally without issues
It will display a BIOS or UEFI error message
mcqs.correct_answer: It will display a BIOS or UEFI error message
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Beeps or failure to boot can indicate a hardware or firmware issue, which is typically reported by the BIOS (Basic Input/Output System) or UEFI (Unified Extensible Firmware Interface) firmware during the boot process.

mcqs.question_en: For high data transfer, what would work best?
mcqs.question_ur: اعلیٰ ڈیٹا کی منتقلی کے لیے، کیا بہتر کام کرے گا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation USB 3.0 is a high-speed connection standard that can transfer data at speeds of up to 5 Gbps ( gigabits per second ), making it ideal for high data transfer.

mcqs.question_en: If you are told to update Windows, what should you do?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ کو ونڈوز کو اپ ڈیٹ کرنے کے لیے کہا جائے تو آپ کو کیا کرنا چاہیے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation When updating Windows, it's recommended to use the recommended settings to ensure a smooth and successful update process. This option allows Windows to automatically handle the update process and install any necessary updates.

mcqs.question_en: What does a microprocessor take input from?
mcqs.question_ur: مائکرو پروسیسر کس چیز سے ان پٹ لیتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A microprocessor takes input from various input devices, including both mouse and keyboard. These two devices are the primary input devices used to interact with a computer and provide input to the microprocessor.

mcqs.question_en: We can send data and text by which server?
mcqs.question_ur: ہم کس سرور سے ڈیٹا اور ٹیکسٹ بھیج سکتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation We can send data and text by Mail Server. It manages and distributes email, allowing us to send data and text to others. It enables email communication via protocols like SMTP, POP3, and IMAP.

mcqs.question_en: What was IBM founded in?
mcqs.question_ur: آئی بی ایم کس سال میں قائم ہوا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation IBM (International Business Machines) was founded on June 16, 1881 , as Tabulating Machine Company, later renamed IBM in 1924. It has since become a well-known technology company.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is a real computer virus?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے اصلی کمپیوٹر وائرس کون سا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Mortar, Cacrus, and Milosous are not real computer viruses. They are likely fictional or made-up names, and are not recognized or known viruses.

mcqs.question_en: What is font size measured by?
mcqs.question_ur: فونٹ کا سائز کس چیز سے ماپا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Font size is measured in points (pt), which is a unit of measurement equal to 1/72 inch. Points dictate the height of the lettering. There are approximately 72 points in one inch or 2.54 cm.

mcqs.question_en: What connects two different connections of distinct networks?
mcqs.question_ur: الگ الگ نیٹ ورکس کے دو مختلف کنکشن کو کیا جوڑتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A router is a device that connects two or more packet-switched networks or subnetworks. It serves two primary functions : Managing traffic between these networks by forwarding data packets to their intended IP addresses. Allowing multiple devices to use the same Internet connection.

mcqs.question_en: What type of code is used by programmers?
mcqs.question_ur: پروگرامرز کس قسم کا کوڈ استعمال کرتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Programmers use Source code, which is: Human-readable and written in a programming language. Compiled or interpreted to create machine-readable code. Used to develop software , apps, and websites. Essential for programming and software development.

mcqs.question_en: What is the most frequently used graphics software?
mcqs.question_ur: سب سے زیادہ استعمال ہونے والا گرافکس سافٹ ویئر کونسا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Adobe Photoshop is the most frequently used graphics software. Photoshop is the industry standard for raster graphics editing, used for photo editing, digital painting, and graphic design. Its versatility and wide range of features make it the go-to choice for professionals and hobbyists alike.

mcqs.question_en: Which technology is used in CD________?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation CD stand for Compact Disk. Laser technology is used in CD.

mcqs.question_en: In Microsoft Word the Superscript, subscript, outline, emboss, and engrave are known as _____?
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ ورڈ میں سپر اسکرپٹ، سب اسکرپٹ، آؤٹ لائن، ایمبوس، اور کندہ کاری کو ________ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Microsoft Word, Superscript, subscript, and strikethrough are known as Font effects. On the Home tab, in the Font group, pick the Font Dialog Box Launcher. On the Font tab, under Effects, select the Superscript or Subscript check box.

mcqs.question_en: What is the syntax for defining a method in Ruby?
mcqs.question_ur: روبی میں طریقہ کی وضاحت کے لیے نحو کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Ruby, the syntax for defining a method is : def method_name(parameters) # method body end The 'def' keyword is used to define a method , followed by the method name and parameters in parentheses. The method body is indented and enclosed by the 'end' keyword.

mcqs.question_en: The basic difference between JavaScript and Java is?
mcqs.question_ur: جاوا اسکرپٹ اور جاوا کے درمیان بنیادی فرق کیا ہے؟
options: Functions are values and there is no hard distinction between methods and fields
mcqs.correct_answer: Functions are values and there is no hard distinction between methods and fields
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The basic difference between JavaScript and Java is that the functions are values, and there is no hard distinction between methods and fields.

mcqs.question_en: Which type of loop is commonly used to iterate through an array in C?
mcqs.question_ur: کس قسم کا لوپ عام طور پر سی میں ایک صف کے ذریعے تکرار کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In C, the For loop is commonly used to iterate through an array because it allows for easy initialization, condition checking , and incrementing/decrementing of the loop counter. The syntax of a For loop is designed to handle array indexing and iteration naturally.

mcqs.question_en: In Prototyping______?
mcqs.question_ur: پروٹو ٹائپنگ میں______؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Prototyping is a software development methodology that involves creating a working model or a mockup of a system or application to test and refine its requirements and design. In prototyping, Fourth-Generation Languages (4GLs) are often used. 4GLs are high-level programming languages that provide a more abstract and visual way of programming, making it easier to quickly build and test prototypes.

mcqs.question_en: Which one of the following kinds of material has the lowest permeability?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا مواد سب سے کم پارگمیتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The material with the lowest permeability among the options listed is a diamagnetic material.

mcqs.question_en: What is the maximum value that can be stored in an "int" data type in C++?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The maximum value that can be stored in an "int" data type in C++ is 2147483647 .

mcqs.question_en: In an intrinsic semiconductor, the number of free electrons?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک اندرونی سیمی کنڈکٹر میں، مفت الیکٹرانوں کی تعداد؟
options: Is less than the number of holes
Is greater than the number of holes
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In an intrinsic semiconductor, at thermal equilibrium, the number of free electrons is equal to the number of holes.

mcqs.question_en: When installing PCI NICS you can check the IRQ availability by looking at?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation When installing PCI NICs (Network Interface Cards), you can check the IRQ (Interrupt Request) availability by looking at the jumper settings. IRQs are essential resources that devices use to communicate with the CPU. Each device requires a unique IRQ to function properly without conflicts.

mcqs.question_en: How communication is established with MySQL?
mcqs.question_ur: مائی ایس کیو ایل کے ساتھ رابطہ کیسے قائم ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Communication with MySQL is established through network calls. MySQL is a client-server system, where clients communicate with the server over a network connection. This communication involves sending queries, commands, and receiving responses over the network.

mcqs.question_en: What SQL command can be used to delete columns from a table?
mcqs.question_ur: ٹیبل سے کالم حذف کرنے کے لیے کون سی ایس کیو ایل کمانڈ استعمال کی جا سکتی ہے؟
options: MODIFY TABLE TableName DROP COLUMN ColumnName
ALTER TABLE TableName DROP COLUMN ColumnName
mcqs.correct_answer: ALTER TABLE TableName DROP COLUMN ColumnName
mcqs.explanation: Explanation This is the standard SQL syntax to drop a column from a table. The ALTER TABLE statement is used to modify the structure of a table, and the DROP COLUMN clause is used to delete a column. An example: ALTER TABLE MyTable DROP COLUMN MyColumn;

mcqs.question_en: What is incorrect about structural design?
mcqs.question_ur: ساختی ڈیزائن کے بارے میں کیا غلط ہے؟
options: Structural design introduced notations and heuristics
Structural design emphasis on procedural decomposition
The advantage is data flow representation
mcqs.correct_answer: The advantage is data flow representation
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The incorrect statement is: " The advantage is data flow representation ". Data flow representation is actually a characteristic of Data Flow Diagrams (DFDs) , which are used in Data Flow Design, a different software design methodology. DFDs show the flow of data through a system , whereas structural design focuses on the hierarchical structure of modules and their interfaces.

mcqs.question_en: What operator tests the column for the absence of data?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا کی عدم موجودگی کے لیے کون سا آپریٹر کالم کی جانچ کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The operator that tests column for the absence of data is an is NULL operator. The NULL operator is used in the database for representing that a particular field is empty. SELECT ‘column_name’ FROM ‘table_name’ WHERE ‘column_name’ IS NULL

mcqs.question_en: What is the primary purpose of a scatter plot in EDA?
mcqs.question_ur: ای ڈی اے میں سکیٹر پلاٹ کا بنیادی مقصد کیا ہے؟
options: To show the distribution of a single variable
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A scatter plot is a type of graph used in Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) to visualize the relationship between two continuous variables. It displays the data points as points on a coordinate grid, with the x-axis representing one variable and the y-axis representing the other. The primary purpose of a scatter plot is to : Show the strength and direction of the relationship between the two variables Identify patterns, correlations, or outliers in the data Help identify potential relationships that may not be immediately apparent from looking at individual variables Scatter plots are particularly useful for: Identifying linear or non-linear relationships Identifying clusters or groups in the data Identifying outliers or anomalies

mcqs.question_en: What is the name of artificial intelligence which allows machines to handle vague information with a deftness that mimics human intuition?
mcqs.question_ur: مصنوعی ذہانت کا کیا نام ہے جو مشینوں کو مبہم معلومات کو مہارت کے ساتھ سنبھالنے کی اجازت دیتی ہے جو انسانی وجدان کی نقل کرتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Fuzzy logic is the AI that mimics human intuition by handling vague information. It allows machines to work with partial truths , thus making more nuanced decisions than traditional binary logic permits.

mcqs.question_en: The user IDs can be added or removed using which of the following fixed roles?
mcqs.question_ur: صارف کی شناخت درج ذیل میں سے کون سے طے شدہ کرداروں کا استعمال کرتے ہوئے شامل یا ہٹائی جا سکتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The db_accessadmin role manages security, but handles access to the database, as the name implies.

mcqs.question_en: Why the following statement is erroneous? SELECT dept_name, ID, avg (salary) FROM instructor GROUP BY dept_name;
options: Dept_id should not be used in group by clause
Group by clause is not valid in this query
mcqs.correct_answer: Dept_id should not be used in group by clause
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The correct answer is : Dept_id should not be used in group by clause (although this is not the case in the given query, as it uses dept_name) The error in the statement is that the ID column is not included in the GROUP BY clause. When using an aggregate function like AVG, all non-aggregated columns in the SELECT clause must be included in the GROUP BY clause.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following should a microcontroller at-least should consist of?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا مائیکرو کنٹرولر کم از کم ہونا چاہیے؟
options: CPU, ROM, I/O ports, and timers
RAM, ROM, I/O ports, and timers
CPU, RAM, I/O ports, and timers
CPU, RAM, ROM, I/O ports, and timers
mcqs.correct_answer: CPU, RAM, ROM, I/O ports, and timers
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A microcontroller at least consists of a processor as its CPU with RAM, ROM, I/O ports and timers. It may contain some additional peripherals like ADC, PWM, etc.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not an example of DBMS?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی ڈی بی ایم ایس کی مثال نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MySQL, Microsoft Access, IBM DB2 are database management systems while Google is a search engine.

mcqs.question_en: What is the total number of quantification available in artificial intelligence?
mcqs.question_ur: مصنوعی ذہانت میں دستیاب مقدار کی کل تعداد کتنی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation There are two ( universal and existential ) types of quantification available in Artificial intelligence.

mcqs.question_en: DOS uses letters of the alphabet to designate disk drive. How many disk drives can DOS address (recognize)?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DOS uses letters of the alphabet (A-Z) to designate disk drives, and it can address up to 26 disk drives . This means that DOS can recognize and assign drive letters from A to Z , allowing for a maximum of 26 disk drives to be connected to a system.

mcqs.question_en: What is a chromatic number?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک رنگین نمبر کیا ہے؟
options: The number of colors required for proper edge coloring of graph
The maximum number of colors required for proper vertex coloring of graph
The minimum number of colors required for proper vertex coloring of graph
The minimum number of colors required for proper edge coloring of graph
mcqs.correct_answer: The minimum number of colors required for proper vertex coloring of graph
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The minimum number of colors required for proper vertex coloring of graph is called chromatic number whereas the minimum number of colors required for proper edge coloring of graph is called chromatic index of a graph.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is a subset of data warehouse focused on a specific functional area?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ڈیٹا گودام کا سب سیٹ ہے جو ایک مخصوص فنکشنل ایریا پر مرکوز ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A data mart is a subset of a data warehouse that is focused on a specific functional area or department, such as marketing, sales, or finance. It contains a subset of the data warehouse's data , but is designed to be more accessible and user-friendly for a specific group of users.

mcqs.question_en: Each time you turn on your computer, it will check on the control file. Choose the option?
mcqs.question_ur: ہر بار جب آپ اپنے کمپیوٹر کو آن کریں گے، یہ کنٹرول فائل کو چیک کرے گا۔  آپشن کا انتخاب کریں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation When you turn on your computer, it will check the control files: (Command.com) (Command Interpreter) io.sys (Input/Output System file) msdos.sys (MS-DOS System file)

mcqs.question_en: What is vertex coloring of a graph?
mcqs.question_ur: گراف کا عمودی رنگ کیا ہے؟
options: A condition where any two vertices having a common edge should not have same color
A condition where any two vertices having a common edge should always have same color
A condition where all vertices should have a different color
A condition where all vertices should have same color
mcqs.correct_answer: A condition where any two vertices having a common edge should not have same color
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Vertex coloring is a way of assigning colors to the vertices of a graph such that: Any two adjacent vertices (connected by an edge) have different colors. The minimum number of colors is used. This is also known as " proper vertex coloring" or "graph coloring ". It's a fundamental concept in graph theory, used to solve various problems in computer science, networking, and other fields.

mcqs.question_en: The Unix shell is both______and______ language.
mcqs.question_ur: یونکس شیل ______ اور______ دونوں زبان ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Unix shell is a: Scripting language : It can execute scripts containing multiple commands. Interpreter language : It interprets commands one at a time, without the need for compilation.

mcqs.question_en: What is the pre-processing time of Rabin and Karp Algorithm?
mcqs.question_ur: رابن اور کارپ الگورتھم کا پری پروسیسنگ کا وقت کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The pre-processing time of Rabin and Karp Algorithm is Theta(m) . The for loop in the pre-processing algorithm runs for m (the length of the pattern) times, hence the pre-processing time is Theta(m). This is the time complexity of the pre-processing phase of the Karp-Rabin algorithm.

mcqs.question_en: Without needing extra______we can simulate non deterministic turning machine using deterministic turning machine.
mcqs.question_ur: اضافی _____ کی ضرورت کے بغیر ہم ڈٹرمنسٹک ٹرننگ مشین کا استعمال کرتے ہوئے نان ڈیٹرمنسٹک ٹیورنگ مشین کی تقلید کر سکتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A deterministic Turing machine can simulate a non-deterministic Turing machine without using extra time, but it may require more space. This is because a deterministic Turing machine can try all possible branches of a non-deterministic Turing machine in parallel, using more space to store the different branches.

mcqs.question_en: The basic components of a machine language program is?
mcqs.question_ur: مشینی زبان کے پروگرام کے بنیادی اجزاء کیا ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Machine language is the lowest-level programming language, consisting of binary code that a computer's processor can execute directly . The basic components of a machine language program are: Instructions : These are the fundamental commands that a computer's processor can execute, such as move data, perform arithmetic operations , jump to a location, etc. Instructions are represented as binary codes, such as 0s and 1s.

mcqs.question_en: What is the term for an endpoint of an inter-process communication flow across a computer network?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر نیٹ ورک میں انٹر پروسیس کمیونیکیشن فلو کے اختتامی نقطہ کی اصطلاح کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A socket is a endpoint for communication between two devices (computer, phone, etc.) in a network. It is a 4-tuple that consists of : Source IP address Source port Destination IP address Destination port

mcqs.question_en: MS access has primary _____ keys
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A primary key is a field or set of fields with values that are unique throughout a table. Values of the key can be used to refer to entire records, because each record has a different value for the key. Each table can only have one primary key.

mcqs.question_en: In Access press SHIFT+F10 to?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Microsoft Access, pressing SHIFT+F10 is used to Display the shortcut menu. The shortcut menu, also known as the context menu , is a menu that provides options related to the selected object or area. It typically contains commands that are relevant to the current context, allowing you to perform various actions without navigating through multiple menus.

mcqs.question_en: The control in SCADA is_________?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The control in SCADA is Supervisory control because SCADA is Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition. It stores information from the remotely located data collection sensors and transducers to support the control of equipment, devices, and automated functions.

mcqs.question_en: What will be result of excel formula =5 + 2 * 3?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The formula =5 + 2 * 3 follows the order of operations (PEMDAS): Multiply 2 and 3: 2 * 3 = 6 Add 5 to the result: 5 + 6 = 11

mcqs.question_en: What was originally called the "imitation game" by its creator?
mcqs.question_ur: اس کے خالق کی طرف سے اصل میں "تقلید کھیل" کو کیا کہا جاتا تھا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The " imitation game " was originally conceptualized and named by its creator, Alan Turing , as a means to assess a machine's ability to exhibit intelligent behavior indistinguishable from that of a human. The test involves a human evaluator engaging in natural language conversations with both a human and a machine, without knowing which is which. If the evaluator cannot reliably distinguish between the human and the machine based on the conversation, the machine is considered to have passed the Turing Test.

mcqs.question_en: The network in which we connect each network node to a central device (hub) is known as?
mcqs.question_ur: وہ نیٹ ورک جس میں ہم ہر نیٹ ورک نوڈ کو ایک مرکزی ڈیوائس (ہب) سے جوڑتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In a Star Network Topology , each network node (computer, printer, etc.) is connected to a central device called a hub or switch. This central device acts as a connection point for all the nodes, and data transmission occurs through it. This topology is called a star topology because the connections resemble a star, with the hub at the center and the nodes at the points.

mcqs.question_en: What layer in the TCP/IP stack is equivalent to the Transport layer of the OSI model?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The four layers of the TCP/IP stack (also called the DoD model) are Application/Process, Host-to-Host, Internet, and Network Access. The Host-to-Host layer is equivalent to the Transport layer of the OSI model.

mcqs.question_en: Point out the correct statement?
mcqs.question_ur: صحیح بیان کی نشاندہی کریں؟
options: Security can be set through passwords, kerberos tickets, or certificates
Secure access to your ec2 amis is controlled by passwords, kerberos, and 509 certificates
Most of the system image templates that amazon aws offers are based on red hat linux
mcqs.explanation: Explanation " Security can be set through passwords, kerberos tickets, or certificates , Secure access to your EC2 AMIs is controlled by passwords, Kerberos, and 509 certificates, and Most of the system image templates that Amazon AWS offers are based on Red Hat Linux ." all are the correct statements.

mcqs.question_en: The logging option to enable binary log index file is _______?
mcqs.question_ur: بائنری لاگ انڈیکس فائل کو فعال کرنے کے لیے لاگنگ کا اختیار _______ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The `--log-bin-index` option is used to enable the binary log index file in MySQL. This option allows you to specify the name of the index file that stores the binary log file names.

mcqs.question_en: Google Language Translator is an example of the application of?
mcqs.question_ur: گوگل لینگویج ٹرانسلیٹر کی درخواست کی ایک مثال ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Google Language Translator is a machine learning -based application that uses artificial intelligence to translate text from one language to another. It is an example of a natural language processing (NLP) application, which is a subfield of machine learning.

mcqs.question_en: SATA stands for
mcqs.explanation: Explanation SATA, in full serial advanced technology attachment, an interface for transferring data between a computer's central circuit board and storage devices.

mcqs.question_en: Short cut key of ctrl + A use for ____.
mcqs.question_ur: کنٹرول پلس اےکی شارٹ کٹ کئ کس کے لیے استعمال کرتے ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Select all of the text in your document or on your screen by holding down the "Ctrl" key and pressing the letter "A". mportant keys Ctrl+N - Create a new document Ctrl+O - Open an existing document Ctrl+S - Save a document F12 - Open the Save As dialog box Ctrl+W - Close a document Ctrl+Z - Undo an action Ctrl+Y - Redo an action Alt+Ctrl+S - Split a window or remove the split view Ctrl+F - Search a document Ctrl + A used for Select All Text "Ctrl + End" is used to move the cursor to the end of the Document .

mcqs.question_en: Business Intelligence (BI) reporting system cannot do which of the following?
mcqs.question_ur: بزنس انٹیلی جنس رپورٹنگ سسٹم مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا کام نہیں کر سکتا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Business Intelligence (BI) reporting system is designed to extract, transform, and present data in a format that supports business decision-making. BI systems typically provide features for : Filtering data (selecting specific data based on criteria) Grouping data (organizing data into categories or aggregations) BI systems are not designed to modify the underlying data itself.

mcqs.question_en: Pivot Table is a feature of which of the following software?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Pivot tables are one of Excel’s most powerful features . A pivot table allows you to extract the significance from a large, detailed data set.

mcqs.question_en: What is the primary purpose of data pipeline in data modeling?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا ماڈلنگ میں ڈیٹا پائپ لائن کا بنیادی مقصد کیا ہے؟
options: To define data attributes and properties
To prepare and transform data for analysis
mcqs.correct_answer: To prepare and transform data for analysis
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A data pipeline is a series of processes that extract data from multiple sources, transform the data into a standardized format, and load it into a target system for analysis. The primary purpose of a data pipeline in data modeling is to prepare and transform data for analysis, making it possible to : Extract data from various sources Clean and preprocess the data Transform the data into a format suitable for analysis Load the data into a data warehouse or analytics platform

mcqs.question_en: The context in which the privilege "CREATE TABLESPACE" applies in?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The 'CREATE TABLESPACE' privilege allows users to create tablespaces at the server level. Tablespaces are used for managing the physical storage of tables and indexes. This privilege falls under the realm of server administration.

mcqs.question_en: The HAVING clause does which of the following?
options: Acts like a WHERE clause but is used for groups rather than rows
Acts like a WHERE clause but is used for columns rather than groups
Acts EXACTLY like a WHERE clause
Acts like a clause but is used for rows rather than columns
mcqs.correct_answer: Acts like a WHERE clause but is used for groups rather than rows
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The HAVING clause is used in SQL to filter groups of rows based on a condition, similar to how the WHERE clause filters individual rows. The HAVING clause is applied after the GROUP BY clause, which groups the rows into sets, whereas the WHERE clause is applied before the GROUP BY clause.

mcqs.question_en: With which network type will OSPF establish route adjacencies but not perform the DR/BDR election process?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation OSPF (Open Shortest Path First) establishes route adjacencies on point-to-point links , but does not perform the DR (Designated Router)/BDR (Backup Designated Router) election process on these links. This is because point-to-point links only have two routers connected, so there is no need for a DR or BDR.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following type of virtualization is found in hypervisor such as Microsoft's Hyper V?
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ کے ہائپر وی جیسے ہائپر وائزر میں درج ذیل میں سے کون سی قسم کی ورچوئلائزیشن پائی جاتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Hyper-V employs para-virtualization , where the guest operating system is aware of the virtualization and can communicate with the hypervisor for optimized performance.

mcqs.question_en: Application machine learning methods to large data base is called?
mcqs.question_ur: بڑے ڈیٹا بیس کو ایپلی کیشن مشین لرننگ کے طریقوں کو کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Data mining refers to the process of automatically discovering patterns, relationships, and insights from large datasets , using various machine learning and statistical techniques. It involves analyzing and extracting valuable knowledge or patterns from large databases, which can be used to make informed decisions or predictions.

mcqs.question_en: Which WAN encapsulations can be configured on an asynchronous serial connection? 1. PPP 2. ATM 3. HDLC 4. SDLC 5. Frame Relay. Choose the correct option?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Asynchronous serial connections typically support PPP (Point-to-Point Protocol) and ATM (Asynchronous Transfer Mode) encapsulations.

mcqs.question_en: What is the administrative distance of OSPF?
mcqs.question_ur: او ایس پی ایف کا انتظامی فاصلہ کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The administrative distance of OSPF is 110 . Administrative distance (AD) or route preference is a number assigned to dynamic routes, static routes and directly-connected routes. The value is used in routers to rank routes from most preferred (low AD value) to least preferred (high AD value).

mcqs.question_en: Which metric is commonly used to evaluate classification models and represents the ratio of correctly predicted positive instances to all positive instances?
mcqs.question_ur: درجہ بندی کے ماڈلز کا اندازہ لگانے کے لیے عام طور پر کون سا میٹرک استعمال کیا جاتا ہے اور تمام مثبت مثالوں کے لیے صحیح پیش گوئی کی گئی مثبت مثالوں کے تناسب کی نمائندگی کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The metric that is commonly used to evaluate classification models and represents the ratio of correctly predicted positive instances to all positive instances is recall . Recall is a measure of a classifier’s completeness , and it is also known as sensitivity, hit rate, or true positive rate (TPR). The formula for recall is the number of true positives divided by the sum of true positives and false negatives.

mcqs.question_en: What is the purpose of Spanning Tree Protocol in a switched LAN?
mcqs.question_ur: سوئچ شدہ ایل۔ای۔این میں اسپیننگ ٹری پروٹوکول کا مقصد کیا ہے؟
options: To provide a mechanism for network monitoring in switched environments
To prevent routing loops in networks with redundant paths
To prevent switching loops in networks with redundant switched paths
To manage the VLAN database across multiple switches
mcqs.correct_answer: To prevent switching loops in networks with redundant switched paths
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Spanning Tree Protocol (STP) is a network protocol that ensures a loop-free topology in a switched LAN (Local Area Network) with redundant paths . Its primary purpose is to prevent switching loops, which can cause network instability, packet duplication, and broadcast storms. STP achieves this by: Creating a spanning tree topology Blocking redundant paths Ensuring a single path for data transmission By preventing switching loops , STP ensures a stable and efficient network operation.

mcqs.question_en: Telnet is a______based computer protocol.
mcqs.question_ur: ٹیل نیٹ ایک ______ پر مبنی کمپیوٹر پروٹوکول ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Telnet is a text-based computer protocol that allows users to remotely access and manage a computer or network device. It uses a command-line interface (CLI) to send and receive text-based commands and responses. Telnet is a client-server protocol , where the user's device acts as the client and the remote device acts as the server. Telnet is typically used for: Remote access to servers, routers, and other network devices Command-line interface (CLI) access to network devices Troubleshooting and debugging network connections Remote execution of commands and scripts

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following commands displays the configurable parameters and statistic of all interfaces on the route?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی کمانڈ روٹ پر موجود تمام انٹرفیس کے قابل ترتیب پیرامیٹرز اور اعدادوشمار کو ظاہر کرتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The " show interfaces " command displays the configurable parameters and statistics of all interfaces on the router, including: Interface status (up or down) IP address and subnet mask Speed and duplex settings Number of packets received and transmitted Number of errors and collision- And other interface-specific settings and statistics

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not Country Code Top level Domain (ccTLD)?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation " .cat " is not a Country Code Top Level Domain (ccTLD). It's actually a sponsored top-level domain intended to promote the Catalan language and culture.

mcqs.question_en: What is the term used for describing the judgmental or common-sense part of problem solving?
mcqs.question_ur: مسئلہ حل کرنے کے فیصلہ کن یا عام فہم حصے کو بیان کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہونے والی اصطلاح کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Heuristics refer to mental shortcuts or rules of thumb that help individuals make judgments, solve problems, and make decisions efficiently and effectively. Heuristics are often based on experience, intuition , and common sense, and are used to simplify complex problems and arrive at a solution that is "good enough" or satisfactory.

mcqs.question_en: Google Chrome is the web browsing software developed in_______by Google Inc.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Google Chrome was developed by Google in 2008 . The first beta version of Chrome was released on September 2, 2008 , for personal computers (PCs) running various versions of Microsoft Corporation’s Windows OS (operating system). Google Chrome is a free web browser used for accessing the internet and running web-based applications.

mcqs.question_en: The strictest transaction isolation level provided by SQL Server is?
mcqs.question_ur: ایس کیو ایل سرور کے ذریعہ فراہم کردہ سب سے سخت ٹرانزیکشن آئسولیشن لیول کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The SERIALIZABLE isolation level is the strictest transaction isolation level provided by SQL Server. It ensures that transactions are executed in a serialized manner, as if they were the only transaction operating on the database. This means that: No other transactions can modify data being read by a transaction . No other transactions can insert new data that would affect the results of a transaction. No other transactions can delete data that a transaction is using.

mcqs.question_en: What is the full form of ICANN?
mcqs.question_ur: آئی سی اے این این کی مکمل شکل کیا ہے؟
options: The Internet Corporation Active Names and Numbers
The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers
The Internet Corporation for Archive Names and Numbers
The Internet Corporation for Assigned Tames and Numbers
mcqs.correct_answer: The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ICANN ( Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers ) is a non-profit organization responsible for coordinating the global domain name system (DNS) , ensuring the stability and security of the internet's infrastructure. It oversees the assignment of IP addresses, domain names , and other internet protocol resources.

mcqs.question_en: The processes are in deadlock when?
mcqs.question_ur: عمل تعطل کا شکار ہیں کب؟
options: The first process locks the first resource at the same time as the second process locks the second resource
All processes try to kill each other
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A deadlock is a situation in which two or more processes are blocked indefinitely , each waiting for the other to release a resource. In this scenario, the processes are said to be in a deadlock because they are unable to proceed due to resource constraints .

mcqs.question_en: What is the meaning of bottleneck in the context of computer hardware?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر ہارڈویئر کے تناظر میں رکاوٹ کا کیا مطلب ہے؟
options: A component that improves the performance of other hardware
A component that limits the potential of other hardware
A component that is unnecessary for the system
A component that is always the fastest in the system
mcqs.correct_answer: A component that limits the potential of other hardware
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In the context of computer hardware, the term "bottleneck" refers to: A component that limits the potential of other hardware

mcqs.question_en: What is a software that is used to detect and remove culprit codes in coding?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک ایسا سافٹ ویئر کیا ہے جو کوڈنگ میں مجرم کوڈز کا پتہ لگانے اور اسے ہٹانے کے لیے استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Antivirus software is designed to detect, prevent, and remove malicious software (malware) from a computer. It scans for and removes culprit codes, such as viruses, worms, and trojans, that can harm a computer system.

mcqs.question_en: What is a piece of hardware or software that reads all data packets in a network?
mcqs.question_ur: ہارڈ ویئر یا سافٹ ویئر کا ایک ٹکڑا کیا ہے جو نیٹ ورک میں تمام ڈیٹا پیکٹ پڑھتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Firewall is a piece of hardware or software that reads all data packets in a network and blocks or allows them based on predetermined security rules. It acts as a barrier between a trusted network and an untrusted network, such as the internet.

mcqs.question_en: Software coded in BIOS is called as?
mcqs.question_ur: بی۔آئی۔اع۔ایس میں کوڈ شدہ سافٹ ویئر کو کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Software that is permanently stored in the BIOS (Basic Input/Output System) of a computer is called Firmware . This type of software is typically used to control and configure the hardware components of a computer , such as the keyboard, display, and storage devices.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is NOT a property of PowerPoint?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا پاورپوائنٹ کی پراپرٹی نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PowerPoint does not have the ability to print writer comments with slides. Writer comments are a feature of Microsoft Word , not PowerPoint.

mcqs.question_en: What is the base of octal numbers?
mcqs.question_ur: آکٹل نمبرز کی بنیاد کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Octal numbers are base 8 , meaning they use 8 distinct symbols : 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is NOT a binary number?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation This is because 101.10111 is a decimal number in scientific notation , whereas the other options (101, 1011, and 0) are all binary numbers. In binary, the only digits used are 0 and 1 , and there is no decimal point or scientific notation.

mcqs.question_en: What is a box that contains multiple hard disk drives called?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک باکس جس میں ایک سے زیادہ ہارڈ ڈسک ڈرائیوز ہوں اسے کیا کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A box that contains multiple hard disk drives is called a Hard disk array. This term is often used to describe a collection of hard disk drives that are combined to provide improved data storage and redundancy.

mcqs.question_en: Which component is necessary to run BIOS?
mcqs.question_ur: بی۔آئی۔او۔ایس کو چلانے کے لیے کون سا جزو ضروری ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The BIOS (Basic Input/Output System) is a firmware that is embedded on the motherboard of a computer. To run BIOS, a motherboard is the only necessary component. The BIOS is responsible for initializing and testing the hardware components, including the CPU, RAM, and hard disk , but it does not require these components to be present to run.

mcqs.question_en: How many elements are in a Boolean set?
mcqs.question_ur: بولین سیٹ میں کتنے عناصر ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Boolean refers to a logical data type that can have only two possible values : True or False. This means that a Boolean set has only 2 elements.

mcqs.question_en: What is the data type of the expression 163.23?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسپریشن 163.23 کی ڈیٹا ٹائپ کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation 163.23 is a decimal number, which represents a floating-point number (Float) in programming and mathematics.

mcqs.question_en: Windows + M key is used to?
mcqs.question_ur: ونڈوز + ایم کی کو استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Windows + M key is used to minimize all windows .

mcqs.question_en: Byte is made up of?
mcqs.question_ur: بائٹ سے بنا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Byte is made up of array of bits.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word, when duplicate words  are added?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں، ڈپلیکیٹ الفاظ کب شامل کیے جاتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word, when duplicate words are added a red line appears.

mcqs.question_en: Computers are used in offices?
mcqs.question_ur: کیا دفاتر میں کمپیوٹر استعمال ہوتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Computers are used in offices to reduce labor and to reduce time consumption.

mcqs.question_en: The software used to open PDF files and surf websites is called?
mcqs.question_ur: پی ڈی ایف فائلوں اور ویب سائٹس کو سرف کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہونے والے سافٹ ویئر کو کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The software used to open PDF files and surf websites is called browser .

mcqs.question_en: The common port used for Apache and web browsing is?
mcqs.question_ur: اپاچی اور ویب براؤزنگ کے لیے استعمال ہونے والی عام بندرگاہ کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The common port used for Apache and web browsing is 80 .

mcqs.question_en: A type of network which is connected by physical switches is called?
mcqs.question_ur: نیٹ ورک کی ایک قسم جو فزیکل سوئچز سے جڑی ہوتی ہے کہلاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A type of network that is connected by physical switches is called a Switched Network.

mcqs.question_en: IP and DNS Routes are working on which layer?
mcqs.question_ur: آئی پی اور ڈی این ایس روٹس کس پرت پر کام کر رہے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation IP and DNS Routes are working on the network .

mcqs.question_en: To open an existing presentation in MS PowerPoint which will be the right choice?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس پاورپوائنٹ میں موجودہ پریزنٹیشن کھولنے کے لیے کون سا صحیح انتخاب ہوگا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To open an existing presentation in MS PowerPoint, the right choice is to press Ctrl + O. This keyboard shortcut opens the " Open" dialog box , allowing you to select and open the presentation file you want to work with.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel, if we want to add a mathematical symbol which can be typed through keyboard, which option will be used?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں، اگر ہم ریاضی کی علامت شامل کرنا چاہتے ہیں جسے کی بورڈ کے ذریعے ٹائپ کیا جا سکتا ہے، تو کون سا آپشن استعمال کیا جائے گا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Excel, if you want to add a mathematical symbol that can be typed through the keyboard, you should use the " Insert => Symbol " option.

mcqs.question_en: If the type incorrect spelling of a word in MS Word, which of the following is option will correct the spelling of words document automatically?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر ایم ایس ورڈ میں کسی لفظ کی غلط ہجے ٹائپ کریں تو درج ذیل میں سے کون سا آپشن ہے جو الفاظ کے ہجے کو خود بخود درست کردے گا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The option that corrects the spelling of words automatically in Microsoft Word is " Auto Correct ."

mcqs.question_en: A handwritten message can be instantly transmitted as such to any part of the world through?
mcqs.question_ur: کیا ہاتھ سے لکھا ہوا پیغام فوری طور پر دنیا کے کسی بھی حصے میں منتقل کیا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Fax machines provide a convenient way to instantly transmit handwritten messages over long distances They scan the handwritten message and convert it into electronic signals. The electronic signals are transmitted via phone lines to the recipient's fax machine . The recipient's fax machine receives the signals, interprets them, and prints out a copy of the handwritten message.

mcqs.question_en: The total amount of time spent by the process from its arrival to its completion is called?
mcqs.question_ur: اس عمل کی آمد سے اس کی تکمیل تک کل وقت کو کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The total amount of time spent by the process from its arrival to its completion is called turnaround time.

mcqs.question_en: Data link layer contains which type of content in the OSI model layer?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا لنک پرت او۔ایس۔آئی ماڈل پرت میں کس قسم کے مواد پر مشتمل ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Data link layer contains frames .

mcqs.question_en: Null pointer can be used as?
mcqs.question_ur: خالی پوائنٹر کے طور پر استعمال کیا جا سکتا ہے؟
options: To stop indirection in a recursive data structure
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Null pointers can be used for various purposes in programming, including as an error value, a sentinel value, and to stop indirection in a recursive data structure.

mcqs.question_en: In Microsoft Word, ____________ can be used to decide on the spacing between lines of a paragraph.
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ ورڈ میں، ____________ کو پیراگراف کی لائنوں کے درمیان فاصلہ طے کرنے کے لیے استعمال کیا جا سکتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Microsoft Word, Line Spacing can be used to decide on the spacing between lines of a paragraph.

mcqs.question_en: In digital signatures, _______ key is known to everyone.
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیجیٹل دستخطوں میں، ______ کلید سب کو معلوم ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In digital signatures, the public key is known to everyone.

mcqs.question_en: Which model involves user reviews throughout the SDLC?
mcqs.question_ur: کس ماڈل میں پورے ایس۔ڈی۔ایل۔سی میں صارف کے جائزے شامل ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The model that involves user reviews throughout the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) is: Agile model.

mcqs.question_en: In which mode does a microprocessor work?
mcqs.question_ur: مائکرو پروسیسر کس موڈ میں کام کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Microprocessor works in parallel mode.

mcqs.question_en: RAD Model has_______?
mcqs.question_ur: ریڈ ماڈل میں________ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation RAD Model consists of five phases namely: Business modeling Data modeling Process modeling Application generation Testing and Turnover

mcqs.question_en: What does RAD stand for?
mcqs.question_ur: آر۔ای۔ڈی کا کیا مطلب ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation RAD stand for Rapid Application Design

mcqs.question_en: Records are referred to in a database as?
mcqs.question_ur: ریکارڈز کو ڈیٹا بیس میں کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Records are referred to in a database as: Rows

mcqs.question_en: Purpose of a software engineer?
mcqs.question_ur: سافٹ ویئر انجینئر کا مقصد؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Purpose of a software engineer includes: Designing and developing software, Managing software projects, Testing and debugging software.

mcqs.question_en: What type of language is C?
mcqs.question_ur: سی کس قسم کی زبان ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation C language is a high-level language .

mcqs.question_en: Which one of the following is the address generated by CPU?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا پتہ سی۔پی۔یو کے ذریعے تیار کیا گیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A logical address is generated by the CPU while a program is running. The logical address is a virtual address as it does not exist physically , therefore, it is also known as a Virtual Address.

mcqs.question_en: What is the formula for the number of possible communication channels in a round table meeting?
mcqs.question_ur: گول میز میٹنگ میں ممکنہ کمیونیکیشن چینلز کی تعداد کا فارمولا کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The formula for the number of possible communication channels in a round table meeting is: n(n-1)/2 .

mcqs.question_en: What does SDLC stand for?
mcqs.question_ur: اس۔ڈی۔ایل۔سی کا کیا مطلب ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation SDLC stands for Software Development Life Cycle.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word, On which toolbar can you find Format Painter tool?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں، آپ کو کس ٹول بار پر فارمیٹ پینٹر ٹول مل سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word, you can find the Format Painter tool on the: Standard Toolbar.

mcqs.question_ur: ورڈ پروسیسر کے لیے گرافکس ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Graphics for word processor is: Clip art

mcqs.question_en: How can you add a hyperlink in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ ایم ایس ورڈ میں ہائپر لنک کیسے شامل کر سکتے ہیں؟
options: Go to the "Insert" tab and click on "Hyperlink"
mcqs.correct_answer: Go to the "Insert" tab and click on "Hyperlink"
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To add a hyperlink in MS Word, you can: Go to the "Insert" tab and click on "Hyperlink".

mcqs.question_en: What is software without any price called?
mcqs.question_ur: بغیر کسی قیمت کے سافٹ ویئر کو کیا کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Software without any price is called: Free software .

mcqs.question_en: What are radio signals?
mcqs.question_ur: ریڈیو سگنل کیا ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Radio signals are: Analog signals.

mcqs.question_en: What is the equivalent of 18-1GB in ROM?
mcqs.question_ur: روم میں اٹھارہ-ایک جی۔بی کے برابر کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation When subtracting 1 GB from 18 GB, you get 17 GB . This is because 18 GB minus 1 GB equals 17 GB.

mcqs.question_en: BIOS cannot work without?
mcqs.question_ur: بی۔آئی۔او۔ایس بغیر کام نہیں کر سکتا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation BIOS cannot work without the: Motherboard .

mcqs.question_en: What does "AGP" stand for?
mcqs.question_ur: "ای۔جی۔پی" کا مطلب کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation "AGP" stands for Advanced Graphics Port. It is a type of interface used to connect graphics cards to a computer's motherboard , specifically designed to enhance graphics performance by providing a high-speed pathway for data transfer between the graphics card and the CPU. It was commonly used in older computer systems before being replaced by newer standards like PCI Express.

mcqs.question_en: How are digital signals represented?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیجیٹل سگنلز کی نمائندگی کیسے کی جاتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Digital signals are represented using binary code , where data is encoded into sequences of 0s and 1s.

mcqs.question_en: How many MBS are in one GB
mcqs.explanation: Explanation One gigabyte (GB) is equal to 1024 megabytes (MB). So, there are 1024 megabytes in one gigabyte. 1024GB is the correct answer

mcqs.question_en: Which is the most searched site in 2023?
mcqs.question_ur: دو ہزار تئیس میں سب سے زیادہ سرچ کی جانے والی سائٹ کون سی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation As of December 2023 , the most visited website in the world is Google . The next most popular websites are YouTube, Facebook, Wikipedia, and Twitter (X).

mcqs.question_en: A ___ is a collection of predefined design elements and color schemes
mcqs.question_ur: A___ پہلے سے طے شدہ ڈیزائن عناصر اور رنگ سکیموں کا مجموعہ ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In computing , a theme is a preset package containing graphical appearance and functionality details. A theme usually comprises a set of shapes and colors for the graphical control elements, the window decoration and the window.

mcqs.question_en: __________ is available to change between lowercase, UPPERCASE, and Capitalize Each Word in Word, PowerPoint and Outlook.

mcqs.explanation: Explanation Move the cursor to the top of the next page: Ctrl+Page down Move the cursor to the top of the previous page: Ctrl+Page up Move cursor from current position to the beginning of the next line: Enter key AGM 08-2-2023

mcqs.explanation: Explanation Clip art is a collection of pictures or images that can be imported into a document or another program The images may be either raster graphics or vector graphics.

mcqs.question_en: which of the following method can insert a new slide in the current presentation?

options: right click on all slide panels and choose a new slide
From Insert Menu choose the new slide
Click on new slide button on the toolbar

mcqs.explanation: Explanation The F1 through F12 FUNCTION keys have specia l alternate commands. These keys are called enhanced function keys. Additional information: The function keys are used to perform specific tasks. They are labeled as: F1, F2, F3, and so on, up to F12.

mcqs.question_en: A user can access files from other computers on the Internet by using?
mcqs.question_ur: کیا صارف انٹرنیٹ پر دوسرے کمپیوٹرز سے فائلوں تک رسائی حاصل کر سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A user can access files from other computers on the Internet by using FTP . FTP stands for File Transfer Protocol

mcqs.question_ur: صارف کی وضاحت کردہ ترتیب کو ترتیب دینے یا بھرنے کے لیےکونسی فہرست استعمال کریں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Use a Custom list to sort or fill in a user-defined order. Excel provides day-of-the-week and month-of-the year built-in lists, but we can also create your own custom list.

mcqs.question_en: You are required to give brief of your role duties, which of the following would you use?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Yes, you can certainly use PowerPoint to give a brief overview of your role duties. You can create slides that outline your main responsibilities, skills, and achievements in a visually engaging manner.

mcqs.question_en: You are said to collect numerical data from different sources and perform different computations on it, which of the following you would use?
mcqs.question_ur: آپ کو مختلف ذرائع سے عددی ڈیٹا اکٹھا کرنے اور اس پر مختلف حسابات کرنے کے لیے کہا جاتا ہے، آپ مندرجہ ذیل میں سےکس کو استعمال کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation If you need to collect numerical data from different sources and perform computations on it, you would typically use spreadsheet software like Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets. These tools are specifically designed for organizing, analyzing, and manipulating numerical data.

mcqs.explanation: Explanation To directly traverse to a particular page in a document, you would typically use features like the "Go To" function or the navigation pane. mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کو دوبارہ شروع کرنے کے لیے کون سی شارٹ کٹ کی استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The combination of keys used for restarting the computer is Ctrl+Alt+Delete while Press Alt + F4 to get the Shutdown Windows screen and select Shut down

mcqs.question_en: When we look at the cost, which of the following computer is the most expensive?
mcqs.question_ur: جب ہم لاگت کو دیکھتے ہیں تو درج ذیل میں سے کون سا کمپیوٹر سب سے مہنگا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A  supercomputer is a computer that performs at a higher level than a general-purpose computer all the world's fastest 500 supercomputers have been running Linux-based operating systems since November 20017 while A personal computer ( PC ) is a multi-purpose computer A mainframe computer , often known as a big iron used largely by large enterprises

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is a way to access secondary memory?
mcqs.question_ur: درج ذیل میں سے کون سا ثانوی میموری تک رسائی کا طریقہ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Transfer method: This refers to the process of moving data between secondary memory (like hard drives or SSDs) and primary memory (RAM). For example , when files are loaded from a hard drive into RAM, data transfer occurs.

mcqs.question_en: Which bar is used for the current cell and its constraint?
mcqs.question_ur: موجودہ سیل اور اس کی رکاوٹ کے لیے کون سا بار استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The formula bar is used for the current cell and its constraint. The formula bar displays the content of the active cell in MS Excel.

mcqs.question_en: Circular division of disks to store and retrieve data is known as _______?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا کو ذخیرہ کرنے اور بازیافت کرنے کے لیے ڈسک کی سرکلر تقسیم کوکیا کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Circular division of disks to store and retrieve data is known as Tracks. A track is a physical division of data in a disk drive.

mcqs.question_en: ___ is used for presenting one own work report or performance.
mcqs.question_ur: ایک اپنی کام کی رپورٹ یا کارکردگی پیش کرنے کے لیے کیا استعمال کیا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Microsoft PowerPoint is a presentation program. It was released on April 20, 1987 , initially for Macintosh computers only. Microsoft acquired PowerPoint for about $14 million three months after it appeared.

mcqs.question_en: The process of breaking down an instruction into a series of smaller steps that can be executed simultaneously is known as?
mcqs.question_ur: کسی ہدایت کو چھوٹے چھوٹے مراحل کی ایک سیریز میں توڑنے کا عمل جسے بیک وقت عمل میں لایا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Pipelining is the process of storing and prioritizing computer instructions that the processor executes.

mcqs.question_en: What is the purpose of the system clock in a computer?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر میں سسٹم کلاک کا مقصد کیا ہے؟
options: Control the execution speed of programs
Synchronize the activities of various components
mcqs.correct_answer: Synchronize the activities of various components
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Computers use an internal clock to synchronize all of their calculations .

mcqs.question_en: The IP address 192.168.1.1 is an example of which type of IP address?
mcqs.question_ur: آئی پی ایڈریس 192.168.1.1 کس قسم کے آئی پی ایڈریس کی ایک مثال ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Manufacturers of home routers use private IP addresses, including 192.168. 1.1 , as the default gateway, allowing users to type http://192.168.1.1 into a web browser to access the router admin panel and change router settings.

mcqs.question_en: Which technology is used to make web pages interactive and dynamic by updating parts of the page without a full page reload?
mcqs.question_ur: کونسی ٹکنالوجی ویب صفحات کو مکمل صفحہ دوبارہ لوڈ کیے بغیر صفحہ کے حصوں کو اپ ڈیٹ کرکے انٹرایکٹو اور متحرک بنانے کے لیے استعمال کی جاتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation AJAX is a technique for creating fast and dynamic web pages.

mcqs.question_en: The SQL command used to retrieve data from a database table is?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا بیس ٹیبل سے ڈیٹا حاصل کرنے کے لیے ایس کیو ایل کمانڈ کا استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In SQL, to retrieve data stored in our tables, we use the SELECT statement.

mcqs.question_en: Which type of join returns all rows from both tables, matching rows from the left table, and NULL values for non-matching rows from the right table?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Left Join: Returns all rows from the left table and the matched rows from the right table. If there is no match, the result is NULL on the side of the right table. In SQL, the syntax for a left join would look like this:

mcqs.question_en: The process of breaking down large database tables into smaller, manageable tables is known as?
mcqs.question_ur: بڑے ڈیٹا بیس ٹیبلز کو چھوٹے، قابل انتظام ٹیبلز میں توڑنے کے عمل کو کیا کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: The process of converting a continuous-tone image into a digital representation is called
mcqs.question_ur: ایک مسلسل ٹون امیج کو ڈیجیٹل نمائندگی میں تبدیل کرنے کے عمل کو کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The process of converting a continuous-tone image into a digital representation is called "quantization."

mcqs.question_en: The programming language used for creating dynamic and interactive web pages is?
mcqs.question_ur: متحرک اور انٹرایکٹو ویب صفحات بنانے کے لیے استعمال ہونے والی پروگرامنگ زبان کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation JavaScript is a programming language that can be used to create interactive websites.

mcqs.question_en: What is the purpose of CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) in web development?
mcqs.question_ur: ویب ڈویلپمنٹ میں سی ایس ایس (کاسکیڈنگ اسٹائل شیٹس) کا کیا مقصد ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: The concept that ensures a website is compatible and accessible across different devices and browsers is called
mcqs.question_ur: وہ تصور جو اس بات کو یقینی بناتا ہے کہ ویب سائٹ مختلف آلات اور براؤزرز میں مطابقت پذیر اور قابل رسائی ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Browser compatibility refers to the ability of a website or web application to function correctly across different web browsers.

mcqs.question_en: What type of database model organizes data in a tree-like structure with parent and child relationships?
mcqs.question_ur: کس قسم کا ڈیٹا بیس ماڈل ڈیٹا کو درخت نما ڈھانچے میں والدین اور بچوں کے تعلقات کے ساتھ ترتیب دیتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A hierarchical database is a data model in which data is stored in the form of records and organized into a tree-like structure, or parent-child structure, in which one parent node can have many child nodes connected through links.

mcqs.question_en: Which memory management technique swaps out entire processes to disk when they are not actively executing?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی میموری مینجمنٹ تکنیک پورے عمل کو ڈسک میں تبدیل کرتی ہے جب وہ فعال طور پر عمل نہیں کر رہے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Memory Swapping is a memory management technique that involves moving some of the contents of RAM to a disk space called a swap space or swap file.

mcqs.question_en: Which networking device operates at the Data Link Layer of the OSI model and forwards data based on MAC address?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا نیٹ ورکنگ ڈیوائس OSI ماڈل کی ڈیٹا لنک لیئر پر کام کرتا ہے اور MAC ایڈریس کی بنیاد پر ڈیٹا کو آگے بھیجتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Network switches can operate at either OSI layer 2 (the data link layer) or layer 3 (the network layer).

mcqs.question_en: What is the purpose of DNS(Domain Name System) in computer networks?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر نیٹ ورکس میں (ڈومین نیم سسٹم) کا مقصد کیا ہے؟
options: Translate domain names to IP addresses
mcqs.correct_answer: Translate domain names to IP addresses
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Domain Name System (DNS) turns domain names into IP addresses , which allow browsers to get to websites and other internet resources. Every device on the internet has an IP address, which other devices can use to locate the device.

mcqs.question_en: Which protocol is commonly used for sending emails?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا پروٹوکول عام طور پر ای میلز بھیجنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation SMTP stands for Simple Mail Transfer Protocol . SMTP is the principal email protocol that is responsible for the transfer of emails between email clients and email servers.

mcqs.question_en: Which memory type is fastest and is typically located inside the CPU?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی میموری کی قسم سب سے تیز ہے اور عام طور پر سی پی یو کے اندر واقع ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Cache memory is the fastest system memory , required to keep up with the CPU as it fetches and executes instructions.

mcqs.question_en: The correct full form of 'AI' is?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Artificial intelligence is intelligence demonstrated by machines , as opposed to natural intelligence displayed by animals including humans. This is used in 5th generation computers

mcqs.question_en: What is called cyber warfare?
mcqs.question_ur: سائبر جنگ کسے کہتے ہیں؟
options: Cyber attacks against an enemy state
Cyber attacks against a friendly state
mcqs.correct_answer: Cyber attacks against an enemy state
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Cyberwarfare is the use of cyber attacks against an enemy state.

mcqs.question_en: Give some example input and output devices
mcqs.question_ur: کچھ مثالیں ان پٹ اور آؤٹ پٹ ڈیوائسز دیں۔
options: see the answer in the detail

mcqs.question_en: Modem is used for _____?
mcqs.question_ur: موڈیم _____ کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A modem's purpose is to convert digital information to analog signals (modulation), and to convert analog signals back into useful digital information (demodulation). MODEM stands for Modulation and Demodulation .

mcqs.question_en: A collection of related data is called _____ .
mcqs.question_ur: متعلقہ ڈیٹا کا مجموعہ _____ کہلاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A collection of related data is called Database . A database is a data structure that stores organized information. Different types of databases are Relational databases No SQL database, Distributed database, Commercial database, End-user database.

mcqs.question_en: The function of microprocessor in computer?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر میں مائکرو پروسیسر کا کام؟
options: regulates all elements of the computer system
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A computer's microprocessor performs: arithmetic and logic operations, provides temporary memory storage, times and regulates all elements of the computer system.

mcqs.question_en: Name the great Muslim scientist who was considered as one of the founders of computers.
mcqs.question_ur: اس عظیم مسلمان سائنسدان کا نام بتائیں جن کا شمار کمپیوٹر کے بانیوں میں ہوتا تھا۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Al Khawarizmi developed the concept of the algorithm in mathematics, which is why some have called him the “grandfather of computer science ”.

mcqs.explanation: Explanation @ Symbol is necessarily used in Gmail.

mcqs.question_en: Crtl + C is used by
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + B = Bold Ctrl+W : Close. Ctrl+A : Select all. Alt+Tab : Switch apps. Alt+F4 : Close apps. Win+D: Show or hide the desktop. Win+left arrow or Win+right arrow : Snap windows. Win+Tab : Open the Task view.

mcqs.question_en: Why do we use the Alt + E key on the keyboard?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Alt + E is a shortcut created on the Keyboard and is used to turn up the Edit file menu if the programs or applications support the file menu.

mcqs.question_en: Shift + del the shortcut used for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Shift + Delete is used to delete the selected item permanently without placing the item in the Recycle Bin. while Ctrl + Shift + Delete - This shortcut will delete the selected cells, columns, or rows and shift the remaining cells down or right.

mcqs.question_en: How many types of alignment
mcqs.explanation: Explanation There are four alignments: right, left , justified, and the center in any system . To align the text left, press Ctrl+L. To align the text right, press Ctrl+R. To center the text, press Ctrl+E.

To insert the copyright symbol , press Ctrl+Alt+C . the copyright notice consists of: "©" or the word "Copyright" or the abbreviation " Copr ."; The Alt code keyboard shortcut for the copyright symbol is Alt+0169 while To insert the trademark symbol, press Ctrl+Alt+T. mcqs.question_en: Crtl +Z is used for?

mcqs.question_en: Crtl + A is the shortcut key used for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Copy the selected content to the Clipboard. Ctrl+C Paste the contents of the Clipboard. Ctrl+V Select all document content. Ctrl+A Apply bold formatting to text. Ctrl+B

mcqs.question_en: Number of default worksheets in MS Excel?

mcqs.question_en: What is the default row height of MS Excel?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Excel, the default row height is 15 (20 pixels) , and the column width is 8.43 (64 pixels) .

mcqs.question_en: Crtl + F5 is used for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl F5: Forced Reload a Webpage in Google Chrome or other Web Browsers. NOTE: F5 reloads the page from the server but uses the browser's cache for page elements like scripts, images, CSS stylesheets , etc But Ctrl+F5 reload s the page from the server and also reloads its contents from the server and doesn't use the local cache at all.

mcqs.question_en: What is balance sheet?
mcqs.question_ur: بیلنس شیٹ کیا ہے؟
options: A report that shows the company income and expenses for specific period
a report that shows the companies assets llabillties and equity at the specific point in time
a report that shows the companies profit in loss for specific
mcqs.correct_answer: a report that shows the companies assets llabillties and equity at the specific point in time
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A balance sheet a report that shows the company assets liabilities and equity at a specific point in time The 3 types of balance sheets are : Comparative balance sheets. Vertical balance sheets. Horizontal balance sheets. The main parts of a balance sheet Current assets. Cash, as well as other assets you expect to turn into cash within the next 12 months. ... Fixed assets. Property or equipment the company owns and uses in its operations to generate income. ... Current liabilities. ... Long-term liabilities. ... Shareholders' equity.

mcqs.question_en: In the database lingo Row called?

mcqs.question_en: Which keyword is used to find the number of values in a column?
mcqs.question_ur: کلیدی لفظ کالم میں قدروں کی تعداد معلوم کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation COUNT keyword is used to find out the number of values in a column.

mcqs.question_en: In the window, the shortcut key to minimize all but the active window is:
mcqs.question_ur: ونڈو میں، فعال ونڈو کے علاوہ باقی سب کو کم کرنے کے لیے شارٹ کٹ کلید ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Windows logo key + Home : Minimize all except the active desktop window (restores all windows on the second stroke). Windows logo key + Shift + Up arrow: S tretch the desktop window to the top and bottom of the screen.

mcqs.question_en: HPCM stands for?

mcqs.question_en: The software that is available free of cost is called _____
mcqs.question_ur: .مفت دستیاب سافٹ ویئر کو _____ کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Freeware is available free cost for use and distributed but is copyrighted by its developer Example: Google, Chrome Adobe PDF reader while Shareware is initially free and can distributed to others but paid for after a stipulated period. Propriety software is the human-readable source code that is available for use, study, re-use, and modification ND11-9-2023

mcqs.question_en: FAX stands for __________?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The full form of FAX is Facsimile It is a telephone transmission , via a phone line, of a scanned copy of images and text printed on paper, transmitted between two people.

mcqs.question_en: 1024 gigabytes (GB) is equal to _________TB?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation One Terabyte (TB)= 1024 gigabytes (GB). The size of information in the computer is measured in Kilobytes (KB), Megabytes (MB), Gigabytes (GB), and Terabytes (TB). 1 Kilobyte (KB) = 1024 bytes One Megabyte (MB) = 1024 Kilobytes (KB) One Gigabyte (GB) = 1024 Megabytes MB ?

mcqs.question_en: What is the most used computer in the world?
mcqs.question_ur: دنیا میں سب سے زیادہ استعمال ہونے والا کمپیوٹر کون سا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The most used computer in the world digital computer. These digital computers are divided into 4 types: Microcomputers Mini computers Mainframe computers supercomputers. Digital computers a re also called electronic computers. Digital computer is based on the counting principle.

mcqs.question_en: Software copyright access illegally?
mcqs.question_ur: غیر قانونی طور پر سافٹ ویئر کاپی رائٹ تک رسائی؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Software copyright access is Piracy Piracy refers to the unauthorized duplication of copyrighted content t hat is then sold at substantially lower prices in the 'grey' market Piracy might seem like a victimless crim e, but it's still considered theft

mcqs.question_en: Software used free for some days

mcqs.question_en: What is the shortcut key to copy the text?
mcqs.question_ur: کاپی کرنے کے لیے شارٹ کٹ کی کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + B = Bold Ctrl+W : Close. Ctrl+A : Select all. Alt+Tab : Switch apps. Alt+F4 : Close apps. Win+D: Show or hide the desktop. Win+left arrow or Win+right arrow : Snap windows. Win+Tab : Open the Task view.

mcqs.question_en: Switching between portrait and landscape modes done by?
mcqs.question_ur: پورٹریٹ اور زمین کی تزئین کے طریقوں کے درمیان سوئچنگ کی طرف سے کیا گیا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Switching between portrait and landscape modes done by Page setup dialog box Portrait and landscape are: Page Orientation **** Portrait and Landscape are examples of page orientation in MS Word. Page orientation is the direction in which a document is displayed or printed. mcqs.question_en: Which is the most common language used in web designing ?
mcqs.question_ur: ویب ڈیزائننگ میں سب سے زیادہ استعمال ہونے والی زبان کونسی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation HTML is the most common language used in web designing. The HyperText Markup Language or HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

mcqs.question_en: Which key is used to create chart from selected data in excel?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل میں منتخب ڈیٹا سے چارٹ بنانے کے لیے کون سی کلید استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The F11 key is a function key found at the top of almost all computer keyboards. The key is used to Enter and exit fullscreen mode in all modern Internet browsers. As mentioned below, F11 also has other uses depending on the computer and program.

mcqs.question_en: When a peripheral device needs immediate attention from the operating system, it generates a(n):
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An "interrupt" is a signal sent by a device to the processor, indicating that it needs immediate attention. This allows the operating system to manage the device's request efficiently .

mcqs.question_en: Different components like ROM, CPU, RAM, PCI slots, USB ports, and other components are connected on ___ part of computer
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The motherboard accommodates the central processing unit (CPU) , random access memory (RAM), expansion slots, heat sink and fan assembly, basic input/output system (BIOS) chip , chipset, and the circuitry that interconnects the motherboard components.

mcqs.question_en: What is a note or annotation that an author or review adds to a document?

mcqs.question_en: An extended ASCII coding system provides ______________ different characters.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ASCII is a coding system which provides 128 different characters. ASCII stand for American Standard Code for Information Interchange. right answer is 256. Previously it was 128. Due to absence of graphical symbols representation 128 bits are added for representing these symbols ASCII uses seven-digit binary numbers—i.e., numbers consisting of various sequences of 0's and 1's. Since there are 128 different possible combinations of seven 0's and 1's, the code can represent 128 different characters.

mcqs.question_en: Which one among the following is called the first generation computer?
mcqs.question_ur: درج ذیل میں سے کس کو پہلی نسل کا کمپیوٹر کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The main electronic component used in first-generation counterparts was Vacuum Tubes and Valves. Leo is called the first-generation computer. The five generations of computers: First Generation (1946-1959 or 1940-1956): Vacuum tube-based technology (e.g., ENIAC). Second Generation (1959-1965 or 1956-1963): Transistor-based technology. Third Generation (1965-1971 or 1964-1971): Integrated circuit -based technology. Fourth Generation (1972-1980): VLSI microprocessor-based technology. Fifth Generation (1980-present): ULSI microprocessor-based technology, with a focus on artificial intelligence.

mcqs.question_en: We can start MS Word by typing ____ in the run Dialogue Box :
mcqs.question_ur: ہم رن ڈائیلاگ باکس میں ____ ٹائپ کرکے ایم ایس ورڈ شروع کر سکتے ہیں
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Command winword.exe is used to start MS Word in the Run Dialog box To quickly access the Run command dialog box, simply press the Windows key + R Useful Run Commands are • Temp - Opens Windows temporary folder • %temp% - Opens the user's temporary folder • PowerPoint - Microsoft PowerPoint • MSpaint- Microsoft Paint • Shutdown - Shutdown Computer

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel ready-made templates are available under ______ tab in new option.

These tables have useful features, like sorting and filtering, to help organize and view data.

mcqs.question_en: The font size of 36 points in MS-Word 2007 is equal to how many inches_?

To decrease the font size, press Ctrl + [ . 36 points = 0.5 inches

mcqs.question_en: In a new workbook in MS Excel, which one appears on the topmost of the screen?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Title Bar is a horizontal bar placed at the top of a window.

options: On the top of vertical scroll bar
On the left of horizontal scroll bar
On the bottom of vertical scroll bar
On the Right of horizontal scroll bar

mcqs.question_en: What do you call a single point on a computer screen

mcqs.question_en: Touch Screen is _____?
