mcqs.explanation: Explanation The touch screen is an Input device and an Output device. Not only is it capable of accepting input, but it also displays the output from the computer.

mcqs.question_en: Title Bar is horizontal area located at the very ___________ of the screen.

mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Title Bar is a horizontal bar placed at the top of a window.

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word, indenting paragraphs allows users to set text within a paragraph at different ________.
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں، پیراگراف کا حاشیہ صارفین کو ایک پیراگراف کے اندر متن کو مختلف ___ پر سیٹ کرنے کی اجازت دیتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word, indenting paragraphs allows users to set text within a paragraph at different margins.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following keyboard shortcuts is used to activate a browser tab to the right of the current tab in a Chrome browser?
mcqs.question_ur: کروم براؤزر میں موجودہ ٹیب کے دائیں جانب براؤزر ٹیب کو فعال کرنے کے لیے درج ذیل میں سے کون سا کی بورڈ شارٹ کٹ استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl+Tab : Switch to the next tab/ the tab on the right Ctrl+Shift+Tab : Switch to the previous tab/the tab on the left Ctrl + Page down : activate a browser tab to the right of the current tab in a Chrome browser

mcqs.question_en: What will be the result of the following MS Excel formula? = FACT(0) + FACT(3) + FACT(5)?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Excel FACT function returns the factorial of a given number. For example, = FACT(3) returns 6, equivalent to 3 x 2 x 1. FACT(0) + FACT(3) + FACT(5) = 1 + 3 x 2 x 1 + 5 x 4 x 3 x 2 x 1 FACT(0) + FACT(3) + FACT(5) = 1 + 6 + 120 FACT(0) + FACT(3) + FACT(5) = 127

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word, the 'watermark' option is available in ______.
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں، 'واٹر مارک' آپشن کہا  دستیاب ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The 'watermark' option is available in design tab watermark used for: Transparent logos, text, or images are placed on documents and photographs

mcqs.question_en: A number or letter that appears little below the normal text in MS-Word 2016 is called
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A subscript is a character, symbol or number set slightly below the normal line of text while Superscript text appears half a character above the normal line and is sometimes rendered in a smaller font. *** ND18-1-2023

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following appears as a part of the 'Editing’ command within Home Menu in MS Word 2016?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Replace option is available on the edit menu which is available in the Home tab.

mcqs.question_en: To change the line height to 1.5 in MS_Word 2016 we use a shortcut key.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl+5 changes to 1.5 line spacing. Pressing Ctrl+2 changes to double line spacing. Pressing Ctrl+1 will give you single-line spacing. *** ND18-1-2023

mcqs.question_en: What will be the result of formula '=16/2^3' in a cell in MS Excel?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Initialize a formula in an excel cell using the = (equals to) sign. The value of 2^3 stands for 23, which results in a value of 8. The 16 is divided by 23, which equals 16/8, and that results in a value of 2 .

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is not a valid 'Change Case' in MS word?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation There are following five change cases in MS word 1. Sentence Case 2. Lowercase 3. Uppercase 4. Title Case 5. Toggle Case Shortcut key of Change Case in MS-Word: Shift + F3

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is a Change Case in MS-Word ?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation There are following five change cases in MS word 1. Sentence Case 2. Lowercase 3. Uppercase 4. Title Case 5. Toggle Case Shortcut key of Change Case in MS-Word: Shift + F3

mcqs.question_en: How many types of Change Cases are there in MS-Word?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation There are following five change cases in MS word 1. Sentence Case 2. Lowercase 3. Uppercase 4. Title Case 5. Toggle Case Shortcut key of Change Case in MS-Word: Shift + F3

mcqs.question_en: _________ key is used to change lowercase letters mode to uppercase and vice versa?

mcqs.explanation: Explanation Change case in MS Word: Shift +F3 Caps Lock is used to change lowercase letters mode to uppercase

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following protocol pushes email messages to the server?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا پروٹوکول ای میل پیغامات کو سرور تک پہنچاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation SMTP pushes email messages to the server . SMTP is part of the application layer of the TCP/IP protocol. SMTP is used for sending emails while POP is used for receiving emails. SMPT: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol POP : Post Office Protocol

mcqs.question_en: SMTP stands for
mcqs.explanation: Explanation SMTP stands for Simple Mail Transfer Protocol SMTP pushes email messages to the server . It is part of the application layer of the TCP/IP protocol. It is used for sending emails, while POP is used for receiving emails. ADDITIONAL INFORMATION POP : Post Office Protocol ******* VU CBT FIA SI ASI PAPER 13-12-2021

mcqs.question_en: SMTP is a _______?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation SMTP pushes email messages to the server . SMTP is part of the application layer of the TCP/IP protocol. SMTP is used for sending emails while POP is used for receiving emails. SMPT: Simple Mail Transfer Protocol POP : Post Office Protocol

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is used to select a paragraph in MS word?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں پیراگراف کو منتخب کرنے کے لیے درج ذیل میں سے کون سا استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Single click on mouse selects an Icon. Double click on mouse selects a word . Triple click on mouse selects an entire paragraph.

mcqs.question_en: _________ clicking on mouse selects the entire paragraph by default.
mcqs.question_ur: ماؤس پر کلک کرنے سے پورا پیراگراف بطور ۔۔۔۔  ڈیفالٹ منتخب ہو جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Single click on mouse selects an Icon. Double click on mouse selects a word . Triple click on mouse selects an entire paragraph.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following protocols is used to transfer files from one host to another over the internet?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا پروٹوکول انٹرنیٹ پر فائلوں کو ایک میزبان سے دوسرے میں منتقل کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation File Transfer Protocol (FTP) FTP is a communications protocol used to send files from computer to computer FTP does not use encryption . FTP is built on a client-server model FTP first Introduction : April 16, 1971 ********* FIA VU CONSTABLE PAST PAPER 2021

mcqs.question_en: DHCP stands for
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DHCP is responsible to remotely assign IP address to the clients connected to the internet. DHCP stands for Domain Host Control Protocol.

mcqs.question_en: Which protocol assigns IP address to the client connected in the internet?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DHCP is responsible to remotely assign IP address to the clients connected to the internet. DHCP stands for Domain Host Control Protocol.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is used to create small letters below the line of text in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں متن کی لائن کے نیچے چھوٹے حروف بنانے کے لیے درج ذیل میں سے کیا استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Superscript & subscript are known as Font effects . Superscript is used to create small letters above the line of text. Subscript is used to create small letters below the line of text Subscript shortcut key: Ctrl, Shift + Plus sign (+) Superscript shortcut key: Ctrl, Shift, and the Plus sign (+) at the same time.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is used to create small letters above the line of text in MS Word?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Superscript & subscript are known as Font effects . Superscript is used to create small letters above the line of text. Subscript is used to create small letters below the line of text Subscript shortcut key: Ctrl, Shift + Plus sign (+) Superscript shortcut key: Ctrl, Shift, and the Plus sign (+) at the same time.

mcqs.question_en: In computer, which memory is both static and non-volatile?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر میں، کون سی میموری جامد اور غیر متزلزل ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ROM is a kind of memory that is both static and non volatile ROM stands for Read Only Memory

mcqs.question_en: In MS-Word, words, lines or paragraphs can be selected by using_____?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Most repeated questions about shortcut key Goes to beginning of current line = Home Goes to beginning of document = Ctrl + Home Goes to end of current line = End Goes to end of document = Ctrl + End Highlights from current position to beginning of line = Shift + Home Highlights from current position to end of line = Shift + End Cut selected item = Shift + Del & Ctrl + X Copy selected item = Ctrl + C Paste selected item = Ctrl + V Paste = Shift + Ins. Words, lines or paragraphs can be selected by using: Ctrl

mcqs.question_en: Select the correct shortcut key mentioned below which is used to "bold" a written paragraph
mcqs.question_ur: نیچے دی گئی صحیح شارٹ کٹ کلید کو منتخب کریں جو تحریری پیراگراف کو \"بولڈ\" کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتی ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Most repeated questions about shortcut key Goes to beginning of current line = Home Goes to beginning of document = Ctrl + Home Goes to end of current line = End Goes to end of document = Ctrl + End Highlights from current position to beginning of line = Shift + Home Highlights from current position to end of line = Shift + End Cut selected item = Shift + Del & Ctrl + X Copy selected item = Ctrl + C Paste selected item = Ctrl + V Paste = Shift + Ins. ********* VU FIA UDC CONSTABLE PAST PAPER 31-12-2021

mcqs.question_en: DRAM stand for
mcqs.question_ur: DRAM کا مطلب ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Dynamic random-access memory (dynamic RAM or DRAM) is a type of random-access semiconductor memory that stores each bit of data in a memory cell, usually consisting of a tiny capacitor and a transistor, both typically based on metal-oxide-semiconductor (MOS) technology. DRAM is a common type of random access memory (RAM) that is used in personal computers (PCs) ND-18-4-2023 ************* VU CBT FIA PAPER 13-12-2021

mcqs.question_en: A class of random access memory that requires periodic servicing in order for, the contents to remain valid is?
mcqs.question_ur: بے ترتیب رسائی میموری کی ایک کلاس جس میں مواد کے درست رہنے کے لیے وقفہ وقفہ سے سروسنگ کی ضرورت ہوتی ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Dynamic random-access memory (dynamic RAM or DRAM) is a type of random-access semiconductor memory that stores each bit of data in a memory cell, usually consisting of a tiny capacitor and a transistor, both typically based on metal-oxide-semiconductor (MOS) technology. ND-18-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following memories needs refresh?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی یادیں تازہ کرنے کی ضرورت ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DRAM memories need a refresh . Dynamic Random Access Memory (DRAM). DRAM must be refreshed many times per second to store information, otherwise, it will lose what it is holding . DRAM is the most common type of memory in use today. ND18-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: What is the place by which data can enter or leave the computer?
mcqs.question_ur: وہ کون سی جگہ ہے جہاں سے ڈیٹا کمپیوٹر میں داخل یا چھوڑا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A port is a virtual point where network connections start and end. A ports is software-based and managed by a computer's operating system.

mcqs.question_en: What is translator called from assembly language to machine language?
mcqs.question_ur: اسمبلی کی زبان سے مشینی زبان میں مترجم کو کیا کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An assembler is a type of computer program that interprets software programs written in assembly language into machine language.

mcqs.question_en: RDBMS stands for__?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation RDBMS stands for Relational Database Management System It is a collection of programs and capabilities that enable IT teams and others to create, update, administer and otherwise interact with a relational database.

mcqs.question_en: Who Invented the First Computer Mouse?
mcqs.question_ur: پہلا کمپیوٹر ماؤس کس نے ایجاد کیا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The computer mouse was invented and developed by Douglas Engelbart , with the assistance of Bill English, during the 1960s . Douglas Engelbart was an American engineer.

mcqs.question_en: Programs stored in ROM are called as
mcqs.question_ur: آر اؤ ایم میں ذخیرہ شدہ پروگراموں کو کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Programs stored in ROM are called Firmware . Firmware is held in non-volatile memory devices such as ROM, EPROM, or flash memory. ND18-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: Where is computer's BIOS stored?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کا بی ائی او یس کہاں محفوظ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation BIOS stands for Basic input/output system. BIOS firmware was stored in a ROM chip on the PC motherboard. In later computer systems, the BIOS contents are stored on flash memory ND18-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: Firewall is used in communication network/system for protection from?
mcqs.question_ur: فائر وال کو مواصلاتی نیٹ ورک/سسٹم میں تحفظ کے لیے  کیا استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A firewall i s a software or firmware that prevents unauthorized acces s to a network. A firewall inspects incoming and outgoing traffi c using a set of rules to identify and block threats. ****

mcqs.question_en: Control unit of a digital computer is often called the ?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیجیٹل کمپیوٹر کے کنٹرول یونٹ کو اکثر ____ کہا جاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Control Unit of the computer is called the nerve center computer. The brain of the computer is called the CPU . CPU stands for Central Processing Unit. The central processing unit is known as the heart of the computer ND11-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: The number of bits processed by the CPU as a unit is called?
mcqs.question_ur: سی پی یو کے ذریعہ ایک یونٹ کے طور پر پروسیس شدہ بٹس کی تعداد کو کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The number of bits processed by the CPU as a unit is called Computer word " Word size " refers to the number of bits processed by a computer's CPU in one go (these days, typically 32 bits or 64 bits ). ND11-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: The time during which a job is processed by the computer is called?
mcqs.question_ur: وہ وقت جس کے دوران کمپیوٹر کے ذریعہ کسی کام پر کارروائی ہوتی ہے اسے کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The execution time or CPU time of a given task is defined as the time spent by the system executing that: the task, including the time spent executing run-time or system services on its behalf. ND11-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: The entire computer system is coordinated by?
mcqs.question_ur: پورے کمپیوٹر سسٹم کو مربوط کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The control unit (CU) coordinates the functions of a computer system. The information stored in the memory unit (e.g. hard disk drive) is extracted and decoded and executed by the control unit to d emand help from ALU whenever required. CPU contains a register where the processing of arithmetic operations of data occurs. ND11-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: What is the responsibility of the logical unit is CPU?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کے سی پی یو میں منطقی یونٹ کی ذمہ داری کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To compare numbers is the responsibility of the logical unit in the CPU of a computer. A logical unit is a device or application program by which an end user (an application program, a terminal user , or an input/output mechanism ) gains access to an SNA network . ND11-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: A computer consists of :
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر پر مشتمل ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A computer system consists of a: computer case , a power supply unit, a motherboard , a central processing unit , main memory, and a hard disk drive. *** while: Input devices include : a keyboard, mouse, microphone, video camera, and image scanner. *** Output devices include: a monitor, speakers, and a printer. ****** VU FIA CONSTABLE PAPER 2021 **** RY 16-01-2023 ND11-4-2023

mcqs.question_en: The first firm to mass-market a microcomputer as a personal computer was
mcqs.question_ur: پرسنل کمپیوٹر کے طور پر مائیکرو کمپیوٹر کو بڑے پیمانے پر مارکیٹ کرنے والی پہلی فرم تھی۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The first firm to mass-market a microcomputer as a personal computer was Radio Shaks Release date : August 3, 1977; 45 years ago The name is an abbreviation of Tandy Radio Shack , Z80 [microprocessor]. It is one of the earliest m ass-produced and mass-marketed retail home computers.

mcqs.question_en: When was the world's first laptop computer introduced in the market and by whom?
mcqs.question_ur: دنیا کا پہلا لیپ ٹاپ کمپیوٹر کب اور کس نے مارکیٹ میں متعارف کرایا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Epson HX-20 (also known as the HC-20) was the first laptop computer. mcqs.question_en: Hardware performance continues to improve exponentially in the:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Parts from four early computers, 1962. From left to right: ENIAC board, EDVAC board, ORDVAC board, and BRLESC-I board, showing the trend toward miniaturization. The first aids to computation were purely mechanical devices which required the operator to set up the initial values of an elementary arithmetic operation, then manipulate the device to obtain the result. Later, computers represented numbers in a continuous form (e.g. distance along a scale, rotation of a shaft, or a voltage). Numbers could also be represented in the form of digits, automatically manipulated by a mechanism. Although this approach generally required more complex mechanisms, it greatly increased the precision of results. The development of transistor technology and then the integrated circuit chip led to a series of breakthroughs, starting with transistor computers and then integrated circuit computers, causing digital computers to largely replace analog computers. Metal-oxide-semiconductor (MOS) large-scale integration (LSI) then enabled semiconductor memory and the microprocessor, leading to another key breakthrough, the miniaturized personal computer (PC), in the 1970s. The cost of computers gradually became so low that personal computers by the 1990s, and then mobile computers (smartphones and tablets) in the 2000s, became ubiquitous

It will return differently depending on whether the result of the condition was TRUE or FALSE. *** ND18-1-2023 The correct syntax for an IF statement in Excel is: A =IF(LogicalTest, TrueResult, FalseResult) This syntax states that if the logical test is true, the function will return the TrueResult, and if the logical test is false, the function will return the FalseResult. The other options are not correct.

mcqs.question_en: What is the Purpose of the Presenter View in PowerPoint?
options: To display the same slide show on both the presenter’s screen and the audience’s screen.
To allow the presenter to view speaker notes
and presentation tools while the audience only sees the current slide.
To automatically add transitions and animations to slides.
To convert a PowerPoint presentation into a video format.
mcqs.correct_answer: To allow the presenter to view speaker notes
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Private Interface: Presenter View creates a private display for the speaker, showing key information that is not visible to the audience. Key Tools: This view typically includes speaker notes, a preview of the next slide, and a timer to help the presenter manage the flow and timing of the talk. Dual-Screen Setup: The feature works by utilizing a dual-monitor setup (e.g., a laptop and a projector) so the audience's screen shows only the current slide, while the presenter's screen shows the additional information.

mcqs.question_en: ALU and CU are present in ?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The principal component of the CPU is the Arithmetic Logic Unit and Control Unit. It monitors and gives proper instructions to all parts of the computer.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is the second largest measurement of RAM
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Yottabyte is the largest size of computer memory. Terabyte is the largest measure of computer memory. The terabyte is a multiple of the unit byte for digital information. The prefix tera represents the fourth power of 1000, and means 10¹² in the International System of Units, and therefore one terabyte is one trillion bytes.

Address bus - carries memory addresses from the processor to other components such as primary storage and input/output devices. Data bus - carries the data between the processor and other components. mcqs.question_ur: ان میں سے کون سی دستاویزات میں تمام سیلز کو منتخب نہیں کرے گا؟
options: Clicking three times with the right mouse button in the spreadsheet
Using the Edit- Select all menu
mcqs.correct_answer: Clicking three times with the right mouse button in the spreadsheet
mcqs.explanation: Explanation press Ctrl ( Control key ) + A together if we want to select all the cells in the document . This feature is different in MS Word where we need to press Ctrl + A in order to select the entire document .

mcqs.question_en: User developed instruction for excel are called__________?
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل کے لیے صارف کی تیار کردہ ہدایات کو کیا کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An Excel macro is an action or a set of actions that can be recorded, named, saved and executed as many times as required and whenever desired. By using macros , we are able to automate repetitive tasks associated with data manipulation and data reporting that must be accomplished repeatedly.

mcqs.question_en: In a computer spreadsheet rows are labeled:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Columns are denoted and identified by a unique alphabetical header letter, which is located at the top of the worksheet.

mcqs.question_en: In Inpage we use _________ for Title Text box_____________?
mcqs.question_ur: ان پیج میں ہم ٹائٹل ٹیکسٹ باکس کے لیےکیا استعمال کرتے ہیں
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To select title text box tool: Shift+F3

mcqs.question_en: Select the example of connectivity
mcqs.question_ur: کنیکٹوٹی کی مثال منتخب کریں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation connectivity the state of being connected or interconnected .

mcqs.question_en: Which term is not used by internet ?

mcqs.explanation: Explanation Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited is a central public sector undertaking headquartered in New Delhi , India.

mcqs.question_en: Which of these should be avoided in an E-mail? (2 Points)
mcqs.question_ur: ای میل میں ان میں سے کس سے بچنا چاہئے؟ (2 پوائنٹس)
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Wrong Email Address and Smileys should be avoided in an Email.

mcqs.question_en: If CPU executes multiple programs simultaneously, it is known as?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر سی پی یو ایک ساتھ متعدد پروگرام چلاتا ہے تو اسے کیا کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A computer system consists of a computer case, a power supply unit, a motherboard, a CPU , main memory, and a hard disk drive. Input devices include a keyboard, mouse, microphone, video camera, and image scanner. CPU: Central Processing Unit

mcqs.question_en: Which elements of a worksheet can be protected from accidental modification
mcqs.question_ur: ورک شیٹ کے کن عناصر کو حادثاتی ترمیم سے محفوظ رکھا جا سکتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation All elements of a worksheet can be protected from accidental modification. To protect a worksheet in Excel 2007 and hi gher versions, click the Review tab, click Protect Worksheet (or Protect Sheet), and click OK. Excel 2003 a nd Earlier Versions click Tools > Protection, click Protect Sheet, and click OK.

mcqs.question_en: Insert date format page number, and insert auto text or buttons on the ___ toolbar.
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹ فارمیٹ صفحہ نمبر داخل کریں، اور ___ ٹول بار پر آٹو ٹیکسٹ یا بٹن داخل کریں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A header is the top margin of each page, and a footer is the bottom margin of each page .

mcqs.question_en: Which of these stores more data than a DVD?
mcqs.question_ur: ان میں سے کون ڈی وی ڈی سے زیادہ ڈیٹا اسٹور کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Blue-ray disk stores more data than DVD . The Blu-ray Disc, often known simply as Blu-ray, is a digital optical disc storage format. ND11-2-2023

mcqs.question_en: The physical structure of the computer is called------------.
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کی جسمانی ساخت کو کیا کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Computer hardware is the physical parts or components of a computer, such as: the central processing unit monitor keyboard computer data storage graphic card sound card and motherboard. ND11-2-2023

mcqs.question_en: Specific Information we put on top of MS. Word page is ?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The header is a section of the document that appears in the top margin, while the footer is a section of the document that appears in the bottom margin. Headers and footers generally contain information such as the page number, date, and document name.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following clipboard is used to move data from one place to another in a document?
mcqs.question_ur: درج ذیل میں سے کون سا کلپ بورڈ کسی دستاویز میں ڈیٹا کو ایک جگہ سے دوسری جگہ منتقل کرنے کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The cut command removes the selected data from its original position, while the copy command creates a duplicate; in both cases, the selected data is kept in temporary storage.

mcqs.question_en: Which command brings you to the first slide in your presentation?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی کمانڈ آپ کو اپنی پیشکش میں پہلی سلائیڈ پر لے آتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + Home is used to the first slide in your presentation.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is the network service?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی نیٹ ورک سروس ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A network service is a capability that facilitates a network operation the network service includes: Print Services mean digital printing, quick copy, and offset printing File Services. Provides a grouping for role services that are related to file servers Database-as-a-service (DBaaS) is a cloud computing service. ND11-2-2023

mcqs.question_en: Which would you choose to move selected text from one place to another?
mcqs.question_ur: منتخب متن کو ایک جگہ سے دوسری جگہ منتقل کرنے کے لیے آپ کس کا انتخاب کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The cut-and-paste option is used to move the selected text from one place to another. Cut using Ctrl+X, m ove your cursor to the new location of the text, then paste to the new location with Ctrl+V. Copy using Ctrl+C, move your cursor to the new location of the text , then paste to the new location with Ctrl+V ND11-2-2023

mcqs.question_en: Cyber Security is used to protect?
mcqs.question_ur: سائبر سیکورٹی کو تحفظ دینے کے لیے کیا استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The practice is used by individuals and enterprises to protect against unauthorized access to data centers and other computerized systems.

mcqs.question_en: In Excel data series is ?

options: A row or column of numbers that are plotted in a chart
mcqs.correct_answer: A row or column of numbers that are plotted in a chart
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Excel, a Data Series is defined as a collection of related data.

mcqs.question_en: Option to save after every 10 minutes in MS word is known as ?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں ہر 10 منٹ کے بعد محفوظ کرنے کا آپشن کس نام سے جانا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Autosave is a saving function in many computer applications and video games. which automatically saves the current changes or progress in the program or game, helping to reduce the risk or impact of data loss in case of a crash, freeze or user error

mcqs.question_en: Family safety settings in MS Edge is used to ?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایج میں فیملی سیفٹی سیٹنگ کا استعمال  کب کیا جاتا ہے؟

mcqs.question_en: What is to be use to add text in slide ?
mcqs.question_ur: سلائیڈ میں متن شامل کرنے کے لیے کیا استعمال کیا جاتا ھے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation On the Home tab, under Insert, click Text. On the pop-up menu, click Text Box . On the slide, click the location where you want to add the text box. Type or paste your text in the text box.

mcqs.question_en: Which short cut key is used to calculate the range of cell in MS excel

mcqs.explanation: Explanation The quickest way to select a range of data on your worksheet is to use Ctrl+Shift+8.

mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں، پیسٹ کمانڈ کا شارٹ کٹ ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Important Short cut keys Copy: Ctrl+C Cut: Ctrl+X Paste: Ctrl+V

mcqs.question_en: Go to command in Ms Excel is located in :
mcqs.question_ur: کمانڈ پر جائیں ایم ایس ایکسل ۔۔۔ میں واقع ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Go to command in Ms Excel is located in find On the Home ribbon under “Find and Select” choose “Go To”

mcqs.question_en: To select a group of worksheet we press and hold ____ key and select the sheet we want to add :
mcqs.question_ur: ورک شیٹ کے گروپ کو منتخب کرنے کے لیے ہم ____ کلید کو دباتے ہیں اور اس شیٹ کو منتخب کرتے ہیں جسے ہم شامل کرنا چاہتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To edit an embedded Excel worksheet's contents or resize in the future in Word, you must return to editing mode. by double-clicking the embedded Excel worksheet object in the document to switch back to Excel. Press and hold the Ctrl key on your keyboard. Select the next worksheet you want in the group.

mcqs.question_en: Which among following wildcard characters are recognized by excel ?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل وائلڈ کارڈ حروف میں سے جو ایکسل کے ذریعے پہچانے جاتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Excel has 3 wildcards you can use in your formulas: Asterisk (*) - zero or more characters. Question mark (?) - any one character. Tilde (~) - escape for literal character (~*) a literal question mark (~?), or a literal tilde (~~).

mcqs.question_en: Web browser stores previous information for web pages is termed as

mcqs.explanation: Explanation Autocomplete, or word completion, is a feature in which an application predicts the rest of a word a user is typing. In Android and iOS smartphones, this is called predictive text.

mcqs.question_en: Which of following is used to display the list of all subjects ?A. Selection Pane   B. Wrap Text   C. Hyphenation   D. None of these
mcqs.question_ur: تمام مضامین کی فہرست دکھانے کے لیے مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کیا استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Selection Pane displays all objects (such as shapes or images), not subjects. - Wrap Text manages text around objects. - Hyphenation adjusts word breaks.

mcqs.question_en: Ms Word includes a series of predefined graphics called _________ that can be inserted into a Word document.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Clip Art Pane will open to the right of the document. ********* VU FIA UDC CONSTABLE PAST PAPER 31-12-2021

mcqs.question_en: What is the purpose of inserting header and footer in the document?

options: To mark the starting of a page
To enhance the overall appearance of the document
To allow page headers and footers to appear on document when it is printed
To make large document more readable
mcqs.correct_answer: To allow page headers and footers to appear on document when it is printed
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The purpose of inserting header and footer in the document to allow page headers and footers to appear on the document when it is printed. دستاویز میں ہیڈر اور فوٹر داخل کرنے کا مقصد صفحہ کے ہیڈر اور فوٹر کو دستاویز کے پرنٹ ہونے پر ظاہر ہونے کی اجازت دینا ہے۔

mcqs.question_ur: پاورپوائنٹ پریزنٹیشن میں اینیمیشن کو کتنی بار دہرایا جا سکتا ہے۔

mcqs.question_ur: صفحہ پرنٹ کرنے کے لیے کون سی شارٹ کٹ کی استعمال ہوتی ہے؟

mcqs.question_en: Which one cannot be used to enter data in a cell in MS Excel?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل میں سیل میں ڈیٹا داخل کرنے کے لیے کیا استعمال نہیں کیا جا سکتا؟
options: clicking the enter button to the formula bar
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Pressing the Esc key cannot be used to enter data in a cell in MS Excel Esc key is used to interrupt or can cel the current process or running program, or to close a pop-up window.

mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + Shift + P is used to change the font size.

mcqs.question_en: Which term identifies a specific computer on the web and the main page of the entire site?

mcqs.explanation: Explanation URL stands for Uniform Resource Locator, and is used to specify addresses on the World Wide Web.

mcqs.question_ur: کمانڈ براؤزر سے صفحہ کا تازہ ترین ورژن بھیجنے کے لیے  کیا استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Press " F5 " or "Ctrl-R" to refresh the active window.

mcqs.question_ur: کمانڈ ٹیکسٹ دستاویزات کے دوسرے حصوں پر متن کے ایک ٹکڑے کی شکل کو لاگو کرنے کے لئے کیا استعمال ہوتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Format Painter copies formatting from one place and applies it to another.

mcqs.question_en: Suppose there is a text in a document that is bold, Red in color with green background. We want to apply all of these formatting to another paragraph in one go, Which option will we use ?
mcqs.question_ur: فرض کریں کہ کسی دستاویز میں ایک متن ہے جو بولڈ ہے، سبز پس منظر کے ساتھ سرخ رنگ کا ہے۔ ہم ان تمام فارمیٹنگ کو ایک ہی بار میں دوسرے پیراگراف پر لاگو کرنا چاہتے ہیں، ہم کون سا آپشن استعمال کریں گے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Format Painter tool is used to copy and paste character and paragraph formats to existing text.

mcqs.question_en: The command used to apply look of one piece of text to other parts of text document?
mcqs.question_ur: کمانڈ ٹیکسٹ دستاویز کے دوسرے حصوں پر متن کے ایک ٹکڑے کی شکل کو لاگو کرنے کے لئے کیا استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Use the Format Painter on the Home tab to quickly apply the same formatting, such as color, font style and size, and border style, to multiple pieces of text or graphics. ************* VU FIA SUB INSPECTOR PAPER 30-1-2021

mcqs.question_en: For conducting online video meetings useful solutions are

options: Amazon and Microsoft cloud solution like S3 and Azure

mcqs.question_en: Verification of a login name and password is known as:
mcqs.question_ur: لاگ ان نام اور پاس ورڈ کی تصدیق کے نام سے ۔۔۔ جانا جاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The process of verification of a login name and password is known as authentication

mcqs.question_en: Microsoft Excel functions arguments are always written in __ ?
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ ایکسل فنکشنز کے دلائل ہمیشہ __ میں لکھے جاتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A function is a predefined formula that performs calculations using specific values in a particular order. All spreadsheet programs include common functions that can be used for quickly finding the sum, average, count, maximum value, and minimum value for a range of cells. Arguments can refer to both individual cells and cell ranges and must be enclosed within parentheses.

mcqs.question_en: In Internet explorer, favorites bar can be shown and hidden by choosing it in toolbars option under……………tab?
mcqs.question_ur: انٹرنیٹ ایکسپلورر میں فیورٹ بار کو ٹول بار کے آپشن میں …… ٹیب کے تحت منتخب کرکے دکھایا اور چھپایا جا سکتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The View tab enables you to switch between Normal or Master Page , and Single Page or Two-Page Spread views

mcqs.question_en: In a spreadsheet, letters are used to represent _____________
mcqs.question_ur: اسپریڈشیٹ میں، حروف کی نمائندگی کرنے کے لیے کیا استعمال کیا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Columns are denoted and identified by a unique alphabetical header letter, which is located at the top of the worksheet.

mcqs.question_en: The _________ folder retains copies of messages that you have started but are not yet ready to send.
mcqs.question_ur: فولڈر ان پیغامات کی کاپیاں رکھتا ہے جو آپ نے شروع کیے ہیں لیکن ابھی  ۔۔۔ بھیجنے کے لیے تیار نہیں ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The draft folder retains copies of messages that you have started but are not yet ready to send. Draft messages are saved in your Draft folder until you send them or delete them from the folder. You can enable a preference to automatically save your email as a draft while you are composing the message.

mcqs.question_en: …………… is a standard Windows control that displays the percentage of completion of a particular process as a graphical bar?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A progress bar is a graphical control element used to visualize the progression of an extended computer operation, such as a download, file transfer, or installation. ************* VU FIA SUB INSPECTOR PAPER 30-1-2021

mcqs.question_en: in Microsoft Excel template is the combination of different ______?
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ ایکسل ٹیمپلیٹ میں مختلف ___ کا مجموعہ ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Existing Templates To create a workbook based on an existing template, follow these steps. 1. On the File tab, then click New. 2. Use the search box to search for online templates or click a template from one of the Office templates.

mcqs.question_en: If you press ___, the cell accepts your typing as its contents?
mcqs.question_ur: اگر آپ ___ دبائیں تو سیل آپ کی ٹائپنگ کو اس کے مواد کے طور پر قبول کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Enter key was originally the "Return key" on a typewriter, which caused the carriage to return to the beginning of the n ext line on the paper.

mcqs.question_en: The default page size for word documents is also used in offices
mcqs.question_ur: ورڈ دستاویزات کے لیے پہلے سے طے شدہ صفحہ کا سائز دفتر میں بھی استعمال ہوتا ہے۔

A4 size is easy to work with and print since it fits into any printer or copier. Sh4-9-2023

mcqs.explanation: Explanation Superscript, subscript, outline, emboss, and engrave are known as Font effects. ************* VU FIA SUB INSPECTOR PAPER 30-1-2021 **** RY 16-01-2023 *** ND18-1-2023

mcqs.question_en: SNARC stands for:

mcqs.question_en: The columns of a table correspond to:
mcqs.question_ur: ٹیبل کے کالم کس سے مطابقت رکھتے ہیں
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The tables' columns are referred to as fields. Within a record, a field holds a specific piece of data. columns and rows make up the two-dimensional structure known as a table. The columns are referred to as fields in more formal computer terminology, while the rows are referred to as records.

mcqs.explanation: Explanation Rehearse the presentation Select Slide Show > Rehearse Timings . Select Next , click the mouse, or press the Right Arrow key to go to the next slide. mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا، تصویر، آواز یا ویڈیو کس میں ذخیرہ کرتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Multimedia database is a collection of related for multimedia data. The multimedia data include one or more primary media data types such as text, images , audio and video . AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: A smart card is a plastic card about the size of a credit card, with a embedded microchip that can be loaded with data, used for _______ and then periodically refreshed for additional use:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A smart card is a physical card that has an embedded integrated chip that acts as a security token. Smart cards are typically the same size as a driver's license or credit card and can be made out of metal or plastic. A microprocessor smart card is defined as an IC chip contact card with a microprocessor and memory. AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: ______ are the horizontal divisions of a worksheet that are identified by numbers:
mcqs.question_ur: ایک ورک شیٹ کی افقی تقسیم ہیں جن کی شناخت ۔۔۔  نمبروں سے ہوتی ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Rows are the horizontal lines in an Excel spreadsheet. A row is identified by a number, which appears on the left side of the row . AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: The _________ contains the insertion of a cell on a worksheet and is defined by the column letter and the row number.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A cell address is a combination of a column letter and a row number that identifies a cell on a worksheet . Cell Address is also known as Cell Reference . AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: ________ are graphic presentations of data from a worksheet:
mcqs.question_ur: ایک ورک شیٹ سے ڈیٹا کی گرافک پیشکشیں کیا ہیں
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The chart is a visual representation of data from a worksheet that can bring more understanding to the data than just looking at the numbers. A chart is often called a graph . AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: The shortcut key for Thesaurus tool in MS-Word is:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word, the Thesaurus tool is used for synonyms and antonyms. Shift + F7 is the shortcut key for the Thesaurus tool.

mcqs.question_en: Photoshop is a GUI driven software, so is rich in _________?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Photoshop is a Graphical User Interface ( GUI ) driven software Photoshop is rich in Menus, Tools & Options. AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Which command is used to print the active document or selected items?
mcqs.question_ur: فعال دستاویز یا منتخب اشیاء کو پرنٹ کرنے کے لیے کون سی کمانڈ استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + X Cut selected items. Ctrl + V Paste content from the clipboard. Ctrl + A Select all content Ctrl + P print active document or selected items AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: To close active document in MS word press
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Alternatively referred to as Control+F4 and C-f4, Ctrl+F4 is a keyboard shortcut most often used to close a tab or window within a program ******* VU CBT FIA  PAPER 3-12-2021

mcqs.question_en: ______ is the point at which one page ends and another begins:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A page break is a code inserted by a software program telling the printer where to end the current page and begin the next. AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: A data item is _____________ unit of data in database.
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا آئٹم ڈیٹا بیس میں ڈیٹا کی کونسی اکائی ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A database is information that is set up for easy access, management and updating. A bit is a binary digit and it is the smallest unit of data on a computer AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word, Key Tips appear whenever you press the:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation We can combine the Key Tips letters with the Alt key to make shortcuts called Access Keys for the ribbon options . AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Where database of databases stores data in?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا بیس کا ڈیٹا بیس کہاں ڈیٹا کو محفوظ کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation All the information in a database is organized and structured in database tables. These tables are stored on the hard disk of the database server. The database tables are usually divided into columns and rows.

mcqs.question_en: Where are the logical operations performed in the CPU______?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Arithmetic and Logic Unit ( ALU ) performs logical operations in the Central Processing Unit (CPU). An arithmetic -logic unit is the part of a central processing unit that carries out arithmetic and logic operations.

mcqs.question_en: In order to use a variable in C++, we ____________ first declare it.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation For using a variable in C ++, we have to first define it to tell the compiler about its existence so that compiler can allocate the required memory to it . AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Optical Character Readers are used for:
mcqs.question_ur: آپٹیکل کریکٹر ریڈرز کس کے لیے استعمال کیا جاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation OCR scans the text optically, character by character, converts them into a machine readable code, and stores the text on the system memory. OCR is an input device used to read a printed text. AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: ____ is a type of input machine.
mcqs.question_ur: کونسی قسم کی ان پٹ مشین ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Christopher Latham Sholes was an American inventor who invented keyboard . ND27122022

mcqs.question_en: UDP stands for__________?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation UDP stands for User datagram protocol. UDP is known as Less Connection Protocol. UDP is also called as Fast Protocol.

mcqs.question_en: What is the extension of MS Access?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS-Access is the program for Data Base. Microsoft Access is a Database Management System (DBMS) from Microsoft Microsoft Access combines the relational Microsoft Jet Database Engine with a graphical user interface and software-development tools accdb is the default Access file format.

mcqs.question_en: What is Communication device in Computer?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر میں کمیونیکیشن ڈیوائس کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A communications device is any type of hardware capable of transmitting data, instructions, and information between a sending device and a receiving device. Communication device examples Bluetooth devices. Infrared devices. Modem (over phone line) Network card (using Ethernet) Smartphone. Wi-Fi devices (using a Wi-Fi router)

mcqs.question_en: Which is biggest? Lake, Ocean, River, Sea
mcqs.question_ur: سب سے بڑا کون سا ہے؟ جھیل، سمندر، دریا، سمندر
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Seas are smaller than oceans and are usually located where the land and ocean meet. Caspian Sea is the world's largest inland body of water, often described as the world's largest lake or a full-fledged sea.

mcqs.question_en: The clock rate of a processor is measured in:
mcqs.question_ur: پروسیسر کی گھڑی کی شرح  کو کس میں ماپا جاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Clock speed is usually measured in MHz ( megahertz , or millions of pulses per second ) or GHz ( gigahertz , or billions of pulses per second). AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: CD command is used in DOS for:
options: Format a disk to accept DOS files
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DOS stands for disk operating system CD stands for Compact Disk. The CD command is a command-line shell command used to change the current working directory in various operating systems. AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: DOS is the abbreviation for Disk Operating System which was the __________ operating system used for personal computers.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation DOS stands for Disk Operating System. DOS was the Microsoft-marketed version of the first operating system (OS) to be widely installed on personal computers. AGM 24-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Which key deletes the character to the left of the cursor in MS word?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی کلید ایم ایس ورڈ میں کرسر کے بائیں طرف کے کردار کو حذف کرتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Backspace key or Backspace key is a keyboard key that deletes any character before the cursor's current position or the left. **** The Delete key removes characters to the right of the cursor, whereas the Backspace key deletes to the l eft . ***** The cursor is a Thin Blinking Line In Microsoft Word and other word processors, pressing Ctrl + End moves the cursor to the end of the document. Move the cursor to the top of the next page. Ctrl+Page down Move the cursor to the top of the previous page. Ctrl+Page up *** You need to jump to the next column breaking the current column right at the cursor position. How can you break the column? Break command from the Insert menu ****** RY 23-12-2022 SH4-0-2023

mcqs.question_en: Which one is not an Image file ?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی ایک تصویری فائل نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation WMV is a video format which is compressed with Windows Media compression and contains a video encoded with one of Microsoft's Windows Media Video.

mcqs.question_en: Every slide has one or more areas called:
mcqs.question_ur: ہر سلائیڈ میں ایک یا زیادہ علاقے ہوتے ہیں جنہیں کہا جاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In PowerPoint, a placeholder is a pre-formatted container on a slide for content (text, graphics, or video). AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: In MS Word, formatting is classified into ______ types.
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں فارمیٹنگ کو کتنی اقسام میں درجہ بند کیا گیا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS Word, formatting is classified into 2 types. 1. Character formatting 2. Paragraph formatting AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: ____________ function is the point by where all C ++ programs start their execution.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An entry point is the point at which execution of program starts. In C++, it is the main () function. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: _________ are those words which have their special meaning within the C++ language.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Keywords , also known as reserved words, have special meaning to the C++ compiler and are always written or typed in short(lower) cases. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Flash Drives are also known as:
mcqs.question_ur: فلیش ڈرائیوز کو ۔۔۔ بھی کہا جاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation USB Flash also known as: USB stick USB Flash also known as: USB thumb stick USB Flash also known as: USB pen drive A USB flash drive is a plug-and-play portable storage device that uses flash memory. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: A typical HDD design consists of a spindle that holds flat circular disks, also called __________, which hold the recorded data.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A typical HDD design consists of a spindle that holds flat circular disks, also called platters , which hold the recorded data. HDD stands for Hard drive disk . A hard disk drive ( HDD ) is a non-volatile computer storage device. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel window, on the bottom, right area of the spreadsheet there is/are:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Zoom slider is in the bottom right corner of the Excel window. To use the Zoom slider, drag the slider to the right or to the left. To zoom in, drag the slider to the right. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: There are _______ basic types of RAM.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation RAM stands for Random Access Memory. RAM has two basic following types: 1. Dynamic 2. Static AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Eight bits make up a byte, which can hold up to _________ characters.
mcqs.question_ur: آٹھ بٹس ایک بائٹ بناتے ہیں، جس میں کتنے حروف ہو سکتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ASCII is a coding system which provides 128 different characters. ASCII stand for American Standard Code for Information Interchange. right answer is 256 . AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Shortcut key to select a word in PowerPoint?
mcqs.question_ur: پاورپوائنٹ میں کوئی لفظ منتخب کرنے کے لیے شارٹ کٹ کلید؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + N shortcut key used to Create a new presentation document Ctrl + M shortcut key used for Insert a new slide Ctrl + S shortcut key used to save a presentation Double click the word is used to select a word. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: The shortcut key to select Text in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں ٹیکسٹ منتخب کرنے کے لیے شارٹ کٹ کلید؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The shortcut key to select Text in MS Word is the Shift key + use mouse. Additional information: Crtl + S to save the document Crtl + R to align a paragraph in the current document Crtl + Y is a keyboard shortcut most often used to redo an action reversed using the undo command

mcqs.question_en: In MICR, C stands for_______?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Magnetic ink character recognition code is a character recognition technology used mainly by the banking industry to streamline the processing and clearance of cheques and other documents.

mcqs.question_en: __________ reads characters printed in a special magnetic ink into the computer.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MICR reads characters printed in a special magnetic ink into the computer. MICR stands for magnetic ink character recognition. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: In MS Excel window the __________ menu system is how user navigates through Excel and access the various Excel commands.
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل ونڈو میں کونسا مینو سسٹم  ہے کہ صارف ایکسل کے ذریعے نیویگیٹ کرتا ہے اور مختلف ایکسل کمانڈز تک رسائی حاصل کرتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation You can find Excel commands throughout the tabs in the Ribbon . You can customize the Quick Access Toolbar by adding commands you frequently use. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: A table is grid of cells arranged in:
mcqs.question_ur: ایک ٹیبل سیلز کا گرڈ ہے جس میں  کیا ترتیب دیا گیا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Tables are useful for various tasks such as presenting text information and numerical data. A table is a grid of cells arranged in rows and columns . AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Letters, emails and telephone are related to:
mcqs.question_ur: خطوط، ای میلز اور ٹیلی فون کس سے متعلق ہیں:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In the basic communication process, a sender puts a message in words and transmits it to a receiver who interprets the message. The medium the sender chooses to transmit the message is called the communication channel . So, Letter, e-mail telephone are examples of Channel . AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Human is more ____ than computer.
mcqs.question_ur: انسان کمپیوٹر سے زیادہ کیا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Computers are certainly more adept at solving quandaries that benefit from their unique skillset, but humans hold the edge on tasks that machines simply can't perform. Not yet, anyway. Computers can take in and process certain kinds of information much faster than we can. ******* RY 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Press _______ key to display the print dialogue box, in MS Word.
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں پرنٹ ڈائیلاگ باکس کو ظاہر کرنے کے لیے کونسی کلید دبائیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS-word, Ctrl + F2 is used for print preview. Ctrl+D key is used to open the Font dialog box with the focus on the Font combo box. Ctrl+ F12 opens a document in the Word. Ctrl+D key is used to open the Font dialog box. Ctrl + H is used to open the Replace Dialog Box.

mcqs.question_en: Shortcut key open the Replace Dialog Box is:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl+D key is used to open the Font dialog box with the focus on the Font combo box. Ctrl+ F12 opens a document in the Word. Ctrl+D key is used to open the Font dialog box. Ctrl + H is used to open the Replace Dialog Box. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: The office clipboard is available in all windows based programs and can be used to:
mcqs.question_ur: آفس کلپ بورڈ تمام ونڈوز پر مبنی پروگراموں میں دستیاب ہے اور اسے کس لیے استعمال کیا جا سکتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The office clipboard is available in all windows based programs and can be used to cut, copy and paste. The Office Clipboard allows you to copy items from Office documents or other programs and paste them into another Office document. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: When you cut text, it is removed from its original location and placed in a temporary storage are called
mcqs.question_ur: جب آپ متن کاٹتے ہیں تو اسے اس کی اصل جگہ سے ہٹا کر عارضی اسٹوریج میں رکھا جاتا ہے اسے کیا کہتے ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A clipboard is a temporary storage area for data that the user wants to copy from one place to another. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Volatile memory is computer memory that ____ power (electricity) to maintain the stored information.
mcqs.question_ur: وولیٹائل میموری کمپیوٹر میموری ہے جوکونسی پاور (بجلی) ذخیرہ شدہ معلومات کو برقرار رکھتی ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Volatile memory is a computer memory that requires power to maintain the stored information. Volatile memory retains its contents while powered on but when the power is interrupted, the stored data is quickly lost . AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: In flow chart, __________ represents input or output:
mcqs.question_ur: فلو چارٹ میں، کون ان پٹ یا آؤٹ پٹ کی نمائندگی کرتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Parallelogram represents the input and output symbols in a flowchart; it also represents data in general. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Flowchart is a _________ representation of algorithm_?
mcqs.question_ur: فلو چارٹ الگورتھم کی کون نمائندگی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Flowchart is a symbolic and diagrammatic representation of algorithm A flowchart is nothing but a pictorial representation of an algorithm . AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: ______ is powerful publishing software that handles Urdu, Arabic Persian English languages?
mcqs.question_ur: کونسا طاقتور پبلشنگ سافٹ ویئر ہے جو اردو، عربی فارسی انگریزی زبانوں کو سنبھالتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Page Urdu is only powerful publishing software that included Urdu, Arabic, Persian, English and other language. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: To solve a given problem by using a computer, you need to write _____ for it.
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کا استعمال کرتے ہوئے کسی مسئلے کو حل کرنے کے لیے، آپ کو اس کے لیے کیا لکھنا ہوگا۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A program is a set of step-by-step instructions that directs the computer to do the tasks you want it to do and produce the results you want. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: In MS excel, a _____________ identifies a range by the cells located at diagonally opposed corners.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS excel, a range identifies a range by the cells located at diagonally opposed corners. A range is a group of cells in a spreadsheet that have been selected. If the cells are all together in a rectangular or square shape, it is an adjacent range . AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: A worksheet is an electronic spreadsheet that lets users to :
mcqs.question_ur: ورک شیٹ ایک الیکٹرانک اسپریڈشیٹ ہے جو صارفین کو یہ کرنے دیتی ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A worksheet is an electronic spreadsheet that lets users to Calculate, Enter & Analyze data. A spreadsheet is a computer application for computation, organization, analysis and storage of data in tabular form.

mcqs.question_en: ________ means sending and receiving data through transmission medium:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Data transmission is the process of sending digital or analog data over a communication medium to one or more computing, network, communication or electronic devices. AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: ـــــــــــ are the blank space around the edges of the page.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Page Margins are the white space strips that run around the edges of a page in a word document AGM 17-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: A program with a graphical user interface for displaying HTML files, used to navigate the World Wide Web
mcqs.question_ur: ایچ ٹی ایم ایل  فائلوں کو ڈسپلے کرنے کے لیے گرافیکل یوزر انٹرفیس کے ساتھ ایک پروگرام، جو ورلڈ وائڈ ویب پر تشریف لے جانے کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation HTML is used to create a web page **** HTML is an abbreviation for Hypertext Markup Language (HTML) is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser. ND22-7-2023

mcqs.question_en: What is a Firewall?
mcqs.question_ur: فائر وال کیا ہے؟
options: Computer hardware or software used by home owners with computers
A device that connects computers together
Computer hardware or software that can help protect your network by filtering traffic and blocking outsiders from gaining unauthorized access
A device that protects you from a fire
mcqs.correct_answer: Computer hardware or software that can help protect your network by filtering traffic and blocking outsiders from gaining unauthorized access
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A firewall i s a software or firmware that prevents unauthorized acces s to a network. A firewall inspects incoming and outgoing traffi c using a set of rules to identify and block threats.

mcqs.question_en: By encryption of a text we mean?
options: scrambling it to preserve its security
mcqs.correct_answer: scrambling it to preserve its security
mcqs.explanation: Explanation By encryption of a text, we mean scrambling it to preserve its security encryption is a crucial feature of a safe and trustworthy Internet . encryption helps provide data security for sensitive information. ****** ND4-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Which one of the following is a set of one or more attributes taken collectively to uniquely identify a record?
mcqs.question_ur: درج ذیل میں سے کون سا ایک یا زیادہ صفات کا مجموعہ ہے جو کسی ریکارڈ کی منفرد شناخت کے لیے اجتماعی طور پر لیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A super key is a set of one or more attributes (columns), which can uniquely identify a row in a table . * ***** -12-2022

mcqs.question_en: If the file saved earlier is edited then
options: The name will be needed to be changed
the length is more than a page; the file will be needed to be saved
the change will automatically be saved in the file
it is essential to save the file again to store the change
mcqs.correct_answer: it is essential to save the file again to store the change
mcqs.explanation: Explanation If the file saved earlier is edited then it is essential to save the file again to store the change Because most of the time the changes have to be saved otherwise when you open that file your changes may be discarded. Sometimes it automatically saves the changes. ****** ND4-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is an anti-virus program?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا اینٹی وائرس پروگرام ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Norton Antivirus includes features like: Real-Time Protection, Viruses and Malware, AntiSpyware and Antivirus. **** Quick Heal Total Security is known for functionalities like : Ransom Protection, Safe Mode Protection, Enhance Self-Protection Import and Export Settings. **** K7 AntiVirus is designed to be a home user-friendly virus removal software: protection against viruses, Trojans, malware, and spyware. ****** ND4-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Application software is designed to accomplish ____
mcqs.question_ur: ایپلیکیشن سافٹ ویئر کو پورا کرنے کے لیے ڈیزائن کیا گیا ہے ____
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Application software is designed to accomplish Operating system tasks Application software is third-party software Application software is designed to accomplish tasks for a specific purpose based on user requests. typically to be used by end-users. Word processors, media players, and accounting software ****** ND4-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following quality of the SRS document ensures the comparison of the results of a phase with another phase?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation software requirements specification (SRS) Traceable – and SRS is traceable if the origin of each of its requirements is clear and if it makes it easy to reference each requirement in future development. ****** ND4-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: ____ provides process and memory management services that allow two or more tasks, jobs, or programs to run simultaneously
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Multitasking provides process and memory management services Multitasking allows two or more tasks, jobs, or programs to run simultaneously. Multitasking Most of today's popular operating systems offers multitasking services. **** ND04-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: ____ is called a C++ instruction that tells the computer to do something.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation There are basically four types of Instructions in C++. Type Declaration Instructions Input/output Instructions. Arithmetic Instructions. Control Instruction. **** ND04-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: Where are data and programs stored when the processor uses them?
mcqs.question_ur: جب پروسیسر استعمال کرتے ھیں تو ڈیٹا اور پروگرام کہاں محفوظ ہوتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Data and programs are stored in the main memory when the processor uses them. while programs, files, and data stored in the computer are called Hard Disk **** ND04-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: The subset of the super key is the candidate key under what condition?

options: No proper subset is a super key

mcqs.explanation: Explanation DBMS Keys: Primary Key: A primary is a column or set of columns in a table that uniquely identifies tuples (rows) in that table. Super Key: A superkey is a set of o ne or more columns (attributes) to uniquely identify rows in a table. Candidate Key: A super key with no redundant attribute is known as a candidate key ********* ND03-12-2022

mcqs.question_en: MIME is an abbreviation of:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) is an Internet standard that extends the format of email messages to support text in character sets other than ASCII, as well as attachments of audio, video, images, and application programs.

mcqs.question_en: How will MS Word respond to a repeated word?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ دہرائے جانے والے لفظ کا جواب کیسے دے گا؟
options: A Red wavy line under the repeated word
A Green wavy line under the repeated word
A Blue wavy line under the repeated word
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A repeated word is generally not flagged with any color by default , as it is not always an error and can be a stylistic choice. What the wavy lines mean: Red wavy line: Indicates a spelling error , or a word that the program doesn't recognize. Green wavy line: Signals a grammatical error, such as incorrect subject-verb agreement or missing punctuation. Blue wavy line: Highlights a contextual error, meaning the word is spelled correctly but used inappropriately for the sentence.

mcqs.question_en: An overloaded function is actually a group of ___________ with the same name.

mcqs.question_en: The idea behind limiting the lifetime of variables is to save:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Lifetime of a variable is the time for which the variable is taking up a valid space in the system's memory .

mcqs.explanation: Explanation In computer programming, a function prototype or function interface is a declaration of a function that specifies the function's name.

mcqs.question_en: The true potential of optical fiber is fully exploited when multiple beams of light at different frequencies are transmitted on the:

Long-distance coaxial cable systems were introduced in the United States in 1946

mcqs.question_en: Trunks on long-haul networks is/are:

mcqs.question_en: __________ refers to mechanisms to detect and correct that occur in the transmission of frames.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Error Control in the data link layer is a process of detecting and retransmitting the data which has been lost or corrupted during the transmission of data.

mcqs.question_en: The basic function performed by a computer is _________ of a program.

mcqs.explanation: Explanation The basic function performed by a computer is execution of a program. Taking data and instructions from a user, processing the data as per instructions, and displaying or storing the processed data , are the four major functions of a computer.

mcqs.question_en: The UNIVAC was the __________ successful commercial computer.

mcqs.question_en: The basic function/functions that a computer can perform is/are:
