mcqs.explanation: Explanation There are four main equipment functions of a computer system: Input, Processing, Storage and Output.

mcqs.question_en: ___________ is the way in which the components are interrelated.
mcqs.question_ur: وہ طریقہ کیا ہے جس میں اجزاء باہم مربوط ہوتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Structure : The way in which the components are interrelated. Function: The operation of each individual component as part of the structure.

mcqs.question_en: A computer is a complex computer, contemporary computers contain ___________ of elementary electronic components.
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر ایک پیچیدہ کمپیوٹر ہے، عصری کمپیوٹر میں کونسے ابتدائی الیکٹرانک اجزاء ہوتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A computer is a complex system; contemporary computers contain millions of elementary electronic components.

mcqs.question_en: In a class of computers called _____________, the relationship between architecture and organization is very close.
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹرز کی ایک کلاس  جسے _____ کہا جاتا ہے، فن تعمیر اور تنظیم کے درمیان تعلق بہت قریبی ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A microcomputer is a complete computer on a small scale, designed for use by one person at a time.

mcqs.question_en: In the _________, the creation of the World Wide Web led to an explosion in the popularity of distributed computing.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation World Wide Web (WWW) World-Wide Web Worm (WWWW) English scientist Tim Berners-Lee invented the World Wide Web in 1989. WWW Birth place CERN near Geneva, Switzerland. The browser was released for general public in August 1991 .

mcqs.question_en: Who among the following is considered the inventor of the World Wide Web(WWW)
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کس کو ورلڈ وائڈ ویب کا موجد سمجھا جاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation English scientist Tim Berners-Lee invented the World Wide Web in 1989 . WWW Birthplace CERN near Geneva, Switzerland. The browser was released to the general public in August 1991. WWW is an information system . The major and most popular language of www is Html ( Hypertext markup language)

mcqs.question_en: Berners Lee also implemented the HTTP to form the communications backbone of his new hypertext information system, which he called:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation WWW stands for World Wide Web. Sir Tim Berners-Lee invented the World Wide Web in 1989 .

mcqs.question_en: In systems with virtual memory, programs are able to address more memory locations than are actually provided in main memory, also called:
mcqs.question_ur: ورچوئل میموری والے سسٹمز میں، پروگرام اصل میں مین میموری میں فراہم کردہ میموری سے زیادہ میموری کے مقامات کو ایڈریس کرنے کے قابل ہوتے ہیں، جسے ۔۔۔ کہا جاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In computing , virtual memory is a memory management technique that provides an "idealized abstraction of the storage resources that are actually available on a given machine“ which "creates the illusion to users of a very large (main) memory".

mcqs.question_en: The designers of the Multics system were the first to use the term ________ to describe a program in execution in the context of operating systems.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The designers of the Multics system were the first to use the term process to describe a program in execution in the context of operating systems. More details about this question will be shared soon If you know more details about this question, let us know please

mcqs.question_en: The General Motors Research Laboratories implemented the first operating systems in early ___________ for their IBM 701 computer.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The first operating system was introduced in the early 1950 's, it was called GMOS and was created by General Motors for IBM's machine the 701.

mcqs.question_en: The software that contains the core components of the operating system is called:
mcqs.question_ur: آپریٹنگ سسٹم کے بنیادی اجزاء پر مشتمل سافٹ ویئر کیا کہلاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Kernel is the core part of the OS which is responsible for managing resources, allowing multiple processes to use the resources and provide

mcqs.question_en: Once a structure variable has been defined, its members can be accessed using something called the:
mcqs.question_ur: ایک بار جب کسی ڈھانچے کے متغیر کی وضاحت ہو جاتی ہے، تو اس کے اراکین تک رسائی حاصل کی جا سکتی ہےاسے کیا کہا جاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Once a structure variable has been defined, its members can be accessed using something called the dot operator .

mcqs.question_en: There are ___________ kinds of casts in standard C++.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation There are two kinds of casts in standard C++. 1. Implicit 2. Explicit

mcqs.question_en: In C++, 'f' escape sequence is used for:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In C++, 'b' escape sequence is used for backspace . In C++, 'f' escape sequence is used for Formfeeding .

mcqs.question_en: In C++, 'b' escape sequence is used for:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In C++, 'b' escape sequence is used for backspace . In C++, 'f' escape sequence is used for Formfeeding .

mcqs.question_en: Member functions in C++ are called:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Member functions are operators and functions that are declared as members of a class .

mcqs.question_en: In MS-Word, for what does ruler help?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Word's rulers let you control the margins of your page and the indentation of paragraphs. They're great for precisely lining up images, text, and other elements. If you're printing a document, the rulers can help ensure that what you see on your screen translates into what you'll get on the printed page

mcqs.question_en: Being able to _________ your own types is called extensibility.
mcqs.question_ur: آپ کی اپنی اقسام کو کس  قابل ہونا توسیع پذیری کہلاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Being able to create your own types is called extensibility. When a language has the capability to produce new data types, it is said to be extensible .

mcqs.question_en: The register capable of shifting information either to the right or to the left is termed as ________ register
mcqs.question_ur: معلومات کو دائیں یا بائیں منتقل کرنے کے قابل رجسٹر کو کونسا رجسٹر کہا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A register in which data can be shifted only in one direction is called unidirectional shift register, while if data can shifted in both directions, it is known as a bidirectional shift register.

mcqs.question_en: A combinational circuit consists of
mcqs.question_ur: ایک مشترکہ سرکٹ پر کیا مشتمل ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A combinational circuit consists of input variables, logic gates, and output variables . The logic gates accept signals from inputs and output signals are generated according to the logic circuits employed in it.

mcqs.question_en: The paste special command lets you copy and paste:
options: Multiply the selection by a copied value
The resulting values of a formula instead of the actual formula
mcqs.correct_answer: The resulting values of a formula instead of the actual formula
mcqs.explanation: Explanation You can use Paste Special to maintain the original formatting or paste it as a link or a picture.

mcqs.question_en: Good Voice reproduction via PCM can be achieved with 128 quantization levels, or ____________ coding.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Good voice reproduction via PCM can be achieved with 128 quantization levels, or 7-bit coding ( 27 = 128 ). A voice signal, conservatively, occupies a bandwidth of 4 kHz.

mcqs.question_en: Analog data in electrical form __________ transmitted as baseband signals.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A baseband signal can be transmitted over a pair of wires (like in a telephone), coaxial cables, or optical fibers

mcqs.question_en: Coaxial cable, like twisted pair, consists of ____________ conductors, but is constructed differently to permit it to operate over a wider range of frequencies.
mcqs.question_ur: کواکسیئل کیبل، بٹی ہوئی جوڑی کی طرح کتنے کنڈکٹرز پر مشتمل ہوتی ہے، لیکن اسے مختلف انداز میں تعمیر کیا جاتا ہے تاکہ اسے فریکوئنسی کی وسیع رینج پر کام کرنے کی اجازت دی جا سکے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Coaxial cable supports both analog and digital signals. Consists of two conductors with construction that allows it to operate over a wider range of frequencies compared to twisted pair

mcqs.question_en: For point to point analog signaling, a bandwidth of up to about _________ is possible.
mcqs.question_ur: پوائنٹ ٹو پوائنٹ اینالاگ سگنلنگ کے لیے، تقریباً ___ تک کی بینڈوتھ ممکن ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation For point to point analog signaling, a bandwidth of up to about 1 MHz is possible. Analog bandwidth is the maximum sinusoidal frequency of the analog signal the circuit works with.

mcqs.question_en: _________________ takes the incoming data from the receiver.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Receiver: A device that accepts a signal from the transmission system and converts it into a usable form for the destination device.

mcqs.question_en: The basic building of any communications facility is the:
mcqs.question_ur: کسی بھی مواصلاتی سہولت کی بنیادی عمارت کیا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The basic building block of any communications facility is the transmission line. Frame relay networks are commonly used for terminal-to-computer and computer-to-computer communications.

mcqs.question_en: ______________ device generates the data to be transmitted.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Source is a device that generates and prepares the data for communication and receiver is also a device that receives the data transmitted by source .

mcqs.question_en: In OSI model, when data is sent from device A to device B, the fifth layer to receive data at B is
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Session Layer is the layer of the ISO Open Systems Interconnection (OSI) model that controls the dialogues (connections) between computers. It establishes, manages, and terminates the connections between the local and remote application.

mcqs.question_en: Which one of the following is not a computer language?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی کمپیوٹر کی زبان نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A paintbrush is a brush used to apply paint or ink. Java, COBOL, C++ etc. are computer languages.

mcqs.question_en: To access properties of an object, the mouse technique to use is_____________?
mcqs.question_ur: کسی چیز کی خصوصیات تک رسائی حاصل کرنے کے لیے، استعمال کرنے کی ماؤس تکنیک کونسی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Right-click an object in the Database window, and then click Properties on the shortcut menu.

mcqs.question_en: Most powerful computer is
mcqs.question_ur: سب سے طاقتور کمپیوٹر کونسا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A supercomputer is a computer that performs at or near the currently highest operational rate for computers.

mcqs.question_en: VOIP stands for:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation VOIP is an acronym for Voice Over Internet Protocol , or in more common terms phone service over the Internet.

mcqs.question_en: Which one is point and draw device?
mcqs.question_ur: پوائنٹ اینڈ ڈرا ڈیوائس کون سا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The point and draw device is an input system that helps to point and select an icon to be shown on the screen quickly. A mouse is a point-and-draw device.

mcqs.question_en: When entering text within a document, the Enter key is normally pressed at the end of every____________?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation When entering text within a document, the enter key is normally pressed at the end of every Paragraph . A paragraph in Word is any text that ends with a hard return.

mcqs.question_en: The column heading in the spreadsheet are identified by _________?
mcqs.question_ur: اسپریڈشیٹ میں کالم کی سرخی  سے کس کی شناخت کی جاتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: What term describes explanatory text attached to a cell?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی اصطلاح سیل سے منسلک وضاحتی متن کی وضاحت کرتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MS-Excel comments are used to add a note or explain an action in a cell.

mcqs.question_en: Free of-cost repair of software bugs available on the Internet is called --------?
mcqs.question_ur: انٹرنیٹ پر دستیاب سافٹ وئیر بگز کی مفت مرمت کوکیا کہتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Free of-cost repair of software bugs available on the Internet is called Path *** The path is a free-of-cost repair of software bugs available on the Internet. A patch is a set of changes to a computer program or its supporting data designed to update, fix, or improve it. Path is a free of cost repair of software bug available at Internet. A patch is a set of changes to a computer program or its supporting data designed to update, fix, or improve it

mcqs.question_en: The F1 key is used for _____?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The F1 key is used to Help **** F1: Opens the Help system for the active window. F4: Creates a new document in programs that support this command pressing F2 renames the file F5 is also commonly used as a reload key The F7 key is widely used to spell check

mcqs.question_en: Borders can be applied to ___.
mcqs.question_ur: بارڈرز کو کس پر لاگو کیا جا سکتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation I t means borders can be applied to cells, paragraphs, and text. Borders are generally used to differentiate one from the other.

mcqs.question_en: software in computer can-?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation software in computer can: enhance the quality of hardware, increase spending on CPU, increase computer security *** Alan Turing is credited with being the first person to come up with a theory for software in 1935, The history of software and its development can be traced to the early nineteenth century. The history of software development began in England in 1948 **** Software is a set of i nstructions, data, or programs used to operate computers and execute specific tasks. It is the opposite of hardware *** Graphical representation is Software in Computer technology

mcqs.question_en: In MS PowerPoint F5 is used for _____?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In MS PowerPoint Pressing the F5 key begins the Slideshow from the first slide.

mcqs.question_en: A small or intelligent device is so called because it contains a ____ within it .
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Sensor is a device which detects or measures a physical property and records, indicates, or otherwise responds to it.

mcqs.question_en: Employee address is the example of ______.
mcqs.question_ur: ملازم کا پتہ کس کی مثال ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Non – numeric data is any form of data that is measured in non-number  form. It makes use of symbols and letters. Such data can only be identified in a word format. For example, employee address, date of birth, name, etc.

mcqs.question_en: A systems theory of management includes
mcqs.question_ur: سسٹمز تھیوری آف مینجمنٹ میں کیا  شامل ہے۔
options: the manager as the control mechanism
the use of objectives or standards of performance describing what is being achieved
mcqs.correct_answer: the manager as the control mechanism
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A systems theory of management includes the manager as the control mechanism

mcqs.question_en: A device through which we enter data in a computer known as ___________?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک آلہ جس کے ذریعے ہم کمپیوٹر میں ڈیٹا داخل کرتے ہیں اسے کیا کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Scanner, Keyboard, Mouse, Microphone etc. are the examples of Input Devices.

mcqs.question_en: In which type of computer, data are represented as discrete signals?
mcqs.question_ur: کس قسم کے کمپیوٹر میں ڈیٹا کو مجرد سگنلز کے طور پر پیش کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Digital computer, data are represented as discrete signals ڈیجیٹل کمپیوٹر، ڈیٹا کو مجرد سگنل کے طور پر پیش کیا جاتا ہے۔

mcqs.question_en: Microsoft power point is ___ type of program.
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ پاور پوائنٹ ___ قسم کا پروگرام ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Microsoft PowerPoint is a powerful slide show presentation program. The program uses slides to convey information rich in multimedia. PowerPoint, a presentation program created by Robert Gaskins and Dennis, was released on April 20, 1987.

mcqs.question_en: The Movement of an object is created by using?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Animation is a cost-saving communication strategy. It educates & engages the audience through entertainment.

mcqs.question_en: Cathode ray Tube is a form of __?
mcqs.question_ur: کیتھوڈ رے ٹیوب کس کی ایک شکل ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The cathode ray tube (CRT) is a vacuum tube that contains one or more electron guns and a phosphorescent screen, and is used to display images.

mcqs.question_en: which of the following is not the part of slide design?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی سلائیڈ ڈیزائن کا حصہ نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Slide Layout is not the part of slide design *** Slide Design has an option to Design Template, Color Scheme, and Animation Scheme in Powerpoint 2003 and earlier versions the slide design is a graphical representation of themes, colors, fonts, and many more.

mcqs.question_en: what is the best way to create another copy of a slide?
mcqs.question_ur: سلائیڈ کی دوسری کاپی بنانے کا بہترین طریقہ کیا ہے؟
options: Click the slide then press Ctrl+A and paste in new slide
From Insert Menu choose Duplicate Slide
Redo everything on a new slide that you had done on previous slide
mcqs.correct_answer: From Insert Menu choose Duplicate Slide
mcqs.explanation: Explanation From Insert Menu choose Duplicate Slide is the best way to create another copy of a slide *** From Insert Menu choose Duplicate Slide in Powerpoint 2003 and earlier versions. *** In the pane on the left, Ctrl+click or right-click the slide thumbnail that you want to duplicate, and then click Duplicate Slide.

mcqs.question_en: which of the following is the correct format of email adress?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ای میل ایڈریس کا فارمیٹ درست ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation name@website.com is the correct format of the email address

mcqs.question_en: the output received on the display screen or in the audio or video form is called-------?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈسپلے اسکرین پر یا آڈیو یا ویڈیو فارم میں موصول ہونے والے آؤٹ پٹ کو کیا کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation the output received on the display screen or in the audio or video form is called Soft Copy

mcqs.question_en: A network that is used for sharing data, software, and hardware among several users owning microcomputers is called __________?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک ایسا نیٹ ورک جو مائیکرو کمپیوٹر کے مالک متعدد صارفین کے درمیان ڈیٹا، سافٹ ویئر اور ہارڈ ویئر کو شیئر کرنے کے لیے استعمال کیا جاتا ہے اسے کیا کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A network that is used for sharing data, software, and hardware among several users owning microcomputers is called LAN *** LAN stands for local area network *** LAN consists of a series of computers linked together to form a network in a circumscribed location. The computers in a LAN connection to each other via TCP/IP ethernet or Wi-Fi.

mcqs.question_en: which device is used to process data in pc?
mcqs.question_ur: پی سی میں ڈیٹا پروسیس کرنے کے لیے کون سی ڈیوائس استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation CPU is used to process data in the PC *** The processor, more formally known as the central processing unit (CPU) A processing device is any device inside a computer that interprets and manipulates incoming data during this stage.

mcqs.question_en: Which items are placed at the end of a document
mcqs.question_ur: دستاویز کے آخر میں کون سے آئٹمز رکھے جاتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation End Notes are placed at the end of a document **** Footnotes appear at the bottom of the page and endnotes come at the end of the document. Endnotes are listed at the end of the paper on separate pages. On the top of the first page, the title “Notes” is centered Endnote pages are placed before the bibliography.

mcqs.question_en: Does FM stand for-----?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation FM stands for Frequency M odulation *** Unlike AM, in an FM radio broadcast, the information is transmitted in variations in the carrier wave frequency. Edwin Armstrong introduce FM on December 26, 1933.

mcqs.question_en: Rearranging data in a new sequence is known as?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا کو ایک نئی ترتیب میں دوبارہ ترتیب دینے کے نام کو کیا کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The arranging of data in a logical sequence is called Sorting. **** Sorting is the process of rearranging a sequence of objects so as to put them in some logical order. Sorting plays a major role in commercial data processing and in modern scientific computing

mcqs.question_en: PARAM is an example of _______________.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A supercomputer is a computer with a high level of performance as compared to a general-purpose computer.

mcqs.question_en: What is the default left margin in word 2003 document
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Word 2003 and earlier, the default top and bottom margins were 1 inch (25.4 mm), but 1.25 inches (31.7 mm) were given at the left and the right. The default margins for Microsoft Word from version 2007 onward have been 1 inch (25.4 mm) all around.

mcqs.question_en: which of following is page margin?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا صفحہ مارجن ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The predefined margins include Normal, Narrow, and Moderate . Narrow space is 0.5 inches all around while moderate is 1 inch at the top and bottom, 0.75 on the sides.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is the largest unit of storage?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی اسٹوریج کی سب سے بڑی اکائی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation TB stands for Terabytes. Terabytes are the largest unit of storage *** Megabyte 1024 kilobytes Gigabyte 1024 megabyte s Terabyte 1024 gigabytes Petabyte 1024 terabytes ***** Smallest to largest unit of storage: Byte (smallest) KB MB GB TB (Largest)

mcqs.question_en: _________ Bar is located at top of WordPad/NotePad.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The menu bar is present just below the title bar.

mcqs.question_en: The Internet was originally a project of which agency?
mcqs.question_ur: انٹرنیٹ اصل میں کس ایجنسی کا پروجیکٹ تھا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The first workable prototype of the Internet came in the late 1960s with the creation of ARPANET, or the Advanced Research Projects Agency Network. Originally funded by the U.S. Department of Defense, ARPANET used packet switching to allow multiple computers to communicate on a single network.

mcqs.question_en: which of these options in PowerPoint would allow us to carry any set of slides from a given computer to another one?
mcqs.question_ur: پاورپوائنٹ میں ان میں سے کون سا آپشنز ہمیں سلائیڈز کے کسی بھی سیٹ کو کسی کمپیوٹر سے دوسرے میں لے جانے کی اجازت دے گا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PowerPoint would allow us to carry any set of slides from a given computer to another one: pack and go *** The Pack and Go Wizard help you in packing your entire presentation (including any linked files) to move it to another computer

mcqs.question_en: Which of their PowerPoint features would allow any user to create a given simple presentation more quicker?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation auto content wizard PowerPoint features would allow any user to create a given simple presentation quicker ** auto content wizard is useful for certain categories of presentations, particularly business-related presentations. Provides templates and ideas for a wide variety of different types of presentations.

mcqs.question_en: The handout Master consists of placeholders for all these except the _________?
mcqs.question_ur: ہینڈ آؤٹ ماسٹر ان سب کے لیے پلیس ہولڈرز پر مشتمل ہوتا ہے سوائے ان کے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation HANDOUT MASTER tab in Microsoft PowerPoint to edit the appearance and layout of presentation handouts.

mcqs.question_en: In MS PowerPoint presentations, MR. Ali has to design and regulate the layout and formatting of the slide. These are commonly known as:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A PowerPoint template is a pattern or blueprint of a slide or group of slides that you save as a .potx file. Templates can contain : layouts, theme colors, theme fonts, theme effects, background styles, even content. You can create your custom templates and store them

mcqs.question_en: A system software that helps Operating system to communicate with a device is called:
mcqs.question_ur: ایک سسٹم سافٹ ویئر جو آپریٹنگ سسٹم کو کسی ڈیوائس کے ساتھ بات چیت کرنے میں مدد کرتا ہے کیا کہلاتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation System software that helps OS to communicate with a device is called a Device driver. An operating system (OS) is a type of system software that controls how computer hardware and software resources are used and offer basic services to other software applications.

mcqs.question_en: Processor acts like a/an:

mcqs.question_ur: بائٹ کس کا مجموعہ ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A byte is a combination of 2 nibbles , as each nibble consists of 4 bits, and 4 bits + 4 bits = 8 bits , which equals one byte. Bit: The smallest unit of data in computing, representing a single binary value (0 or 1). Nibble: A group of 4 bits. Byte: A group of 8 bits, which is typically the smallest addressable unit of memory in most computer systems.

mcqs.question_en: What is the function of internet?

Similarly, one 1 GB is 1,024 MB, or 1,073,741,824 (1024x1024x1024) bytes.

mcqs.explanation: Explanation Referred to as a cell pointer, current cell, or selected cell, an active cell is a rectangular box that highlights the cell in a spreadsheet.

mcqs.question_en: Which of following is not true about find and replace in excel
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون ایکسل میں تلاش اور تبدیل کرنے کے بارے میں درست نہیں ہے۔
options: You can search in formula too
You can search for bold and replace
You can search in formula too
mcqs.correct_answer: You can search for bold and replace
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: Which of following is not the correct method of editing the cell content ?
mcqs.question_ur: سیل کے مواد میں ترمیم کرنے کا مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا طریقہ درست نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A cell can be edited through Press the F2 key or Click the formula bar or Double click the cell.

mcqs.question_en: Which of following series type is not valid for fill series dialogue box ?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سی سیریز ڈائیلاگ باکس فل سیریز کے لیے درست نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Time series type is not valid for Fill Series dialog box in excel .

mcqs.question_en: Which of the cell pointer indicates you that you make selection ?
mcqs.question_ur: سیل پوائنٹر میں سے کون  اشارہ کرتا ہے کہ آپ انتخاب کرسکتے ہیں؟
options: Mouse Pointer with anchor at the tip
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Doctor’s symbol (Big Plus) indicates we that we can make selection to cell.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following EXCEL feature allows users to evaluate values and return a result?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Excel, a formula is an expression that operates on values in a range of cells or a cell. For example, =A1+A2+A3, which finds the sum of the range of values from cell A1 to cell A3.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following hypertext language?
mcqs.question_ur: درج ذیل میں سے کون سی ہائپر ٹیکسٹ زبان ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language . HTML use for creating Web pages.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following have the fastest access time?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کس کے پاس سب سے تیز رسائی کا وقت ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Semiconductor memory is a digital electronic semiconductor device used for digital data storage, such as computer memory. There are mainly two types of semiconductor memory: random-access memory (RAM) read-only memory (ROM).

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is correct option for sending same letter to multiple persons?
mcqs.question_ur: ایک سے زیادہ افراد کو ایک ہی خط بھیجنے کے لیے درج ذیل میں سے کون سا آپشن درست ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Mail merge is the function of MS Word . With the help of mail merge, we can send same letter and pre-addressed envelopes etc. to multiple persons.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following is a top-level domain?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا ٹاپ لیول ڈومین ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation com is a top-level domain.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following networks cover metropolitan area?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا نیٹ ورک میٹروپولیٹن ایریا کا احاطہ کرتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation MAN stands for Metropolitan Area Network.

mcqs.question_en: Which of the following was a special purpose computer__?
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون سا کمپیوٹر خاص مقصد کے لیے تھا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation ABS stands fo r Atanasoff-Berry computer.

mcqs.question_en: Which of these keys is NOT on the number keypad?
mcqs.question_ur: ان میں سے کون سی کیز نمبر کی پیڈ پر نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A numeric keypad, number pad, numpad, or ten key, is the palm-sized, usually-17-key section of a standard computer keyboard, usually on the far right. It provides calculator-style efficiency for entering numbers

mcqs.question_en: Which of these software applications was not part of the first version of Microsoft Office?
mcqs.question_ur:
ان میں سے کون سی سافٹ ویئر ایپلی کیشنز مائیکروسافٹ\
  کے پہلے ورژن کا حصہ نہیں تھی؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Microsoft Outlook is an application that's used mainly to send and receive emails. It's also used to manage various types of personal data including calendar appointments and similar entries, tasks, contacts, and notes.

mcqs.question_en: Which one is an example of database designing software ?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا بیس ڈیزائننگ سافٹ ویئر کی مثال کون سی ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Microsoft Access is a database management system from Microsoft that combines the relational Microsoft Jet Database Engine with a graphical user interface and software-development tools.

mcqs.question_en: Which one is not an Image Editing software ?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا ایک امیج ایڈیٹنگ سافٹ ویئر نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Software that allows images to be edited and also converted to different graphics formats.

mcqs.question_en: Which one is used to save all the open files in windows?
mcqs.question_ur: ونڈوز میں کھلی فائلوں کو محفوظ کرنے کے لیےکیا استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + S = save Ctrl + F12 = Save as

mcqs.question_en: which option is not avail.able in Paste special dialogue box ?
mcqs.question_ur: پیسٹ خصوصی ڈائیلاگ باکس میں کون سا آپشن دستیاب نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To use options from the Paste Special box, click Home > Paste > Paste Special.

mcqs.question_en: Which part of the computer is used for calculating and comparing ?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کا کون سا حصہ حساب اور موازنہ کے لیے استعمال ہوتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An arithmetic-logic unit (ALU) is the part of a computer processor (CPU) that carries out arithmetic and logic operations on the operands in computer instruction words.

mcqs.question_en: Which key is used for Help in PowerPoint?
mcqs.question_ur: مدد کے لیے کون سی شارٹ کٹ کلید ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation F1 function key is used for opening help. Some of the top shortcut keys in Microsoft Word are: Ctrl + S: Save Ctrl + C: Copy Ctrl + X: Cut Ctrl + V: Paste Ctrl + Z: Undo Ctrl + Y: Redo Ctrl + B: Bold Ctrl + I: Italic Ctrl + U: Underline Ctrl + F: Find

mcqs.question_en: Which shortcut key is used for copy in ms word 2007.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl +C is often used to copy highlighted text to the clipboard Ctrl + B = Bold Ctrl+W : Close. Ctrl+A : Select all. Alt+Tab : Switch apps. Alt+F4 : Close apps. Win+D: Show or hide the desktop. Win+left arrow or Win+right arrow : Snap windows. Win+Tab : Open the Task view.

mcqs.question_en: Which shortcut key is for auto sum ?
mcqs.question_ur: آٹو سم کے لیے کون سی شارٹ کٹ کلید ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation AutoSum is a fast, easy way to add up multiple values in Excel . You can access the AutoSum command from either the Home tab or the Formulas tab, but there is a keyboard shortcut that makes it even faster: Alt + =.

mcqs.question_en: Which Social media app has changed the company name to META?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Will Facebook app change its name? No. Facebook, the social media app and service, will keep the same name. Only the umbrella company that oversees all the different apps is changing to Meta.

mcqs.question_en: Which software is not an file compression utility____ ?
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا سافٹ ویئر فائل کمپریشن یوٹیلیٹی نہیں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Microsoft-XP is not an example of file compression Program used in windows operating system .

mcqs.question_en: Which term is associated with decorative test
mcqs.question_ur: کون سی اصطلاح آرائشی امتحان سے وابستہ ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Word art or text art is a form of art that includes text, forming words or phrases, as its main component; it is a combination of language and visual imagery.

mcqs.question_en: Which tool you will use to join some cells and place the content at the middle of joined cell ?
mcqs.question_ur: کچھ سیلز کو جوائن کرنے اور جوائنڈ سیل کے بیچ میں مواد رکھنے کے لیے آپ کون سا ٹول استعمال کریں گے؟
options: From Format Cells dialog box click on Merge Cells check box B.  From Format Cells dialog box select the Centered alignment C.  From Format Cells dialog box choose Merge and Center check box
From Format Cells dialog box click on Merge Cells check box
mcqs.correct_answer: From Format Cells dialog box click on Merge Cells check box B.  From Format Cells dialog box select the Centered alignment C.  From Format Cells dialog box choose Merge and Center check box
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In 2003 and earlier versions - From Format Cells dialog box click on Merge Cells check box In 2007 and subsequent versions - Merge & Center icon on the Home ribbon.

mcqs.question_en: While finding and replacing some data in Excel,which of following statement is valid
mcqs.question_ur: ایکسل میں کچھ ڈیٹا تلاش کرنے اور تبدیل کرنے کے دوران، درج ذیل میں سے کون سا بیان درست ہے۔
options: You can Find and Replace within the sheet or workbook
Excel does not have option to match case for find
mcqs.correct_answer: You can Find and Replace within the sheet or workbook
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Excel we can Find and Replace within the sheet or workbook.

mcqs.question_en: Who among the following is known for originating concept of programmable computer
mcqs.question_ur: مندرجہ ذیل میں سے کون قابل پروگرام کمپیوٹر کے تصور کے لیے جانا جاتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Charles Babbage was a mathematician, philosopher, inventor and mechanical engineer, Babbage originated the concept of a digital programmable computer. Father of computer Born: December 26, 1791, London, United Kingdom

mcqs.question_en: Who invented liquid crystal display panel?
mcqs.question_ur: مائع کرسٹل ڈسپلے پینل کس نے ایجاد کیا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A liquid-crystal display  is a flat-panel display or other electronically modulated optical device that uses the light-modulating properties of liquid crystals combined with polarizers. Liquid crystals do not emit light directly,instead using a backlight or reflector to produce images in color or monochrome.

mcqs.question_en: Windows 95,windows 98 and windows NT are known as:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An operating system is system software that manages computer hardware, software resources, and provides common services for computer programs.

mcqs.question_en: window 2007 is an_________ System.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Operating system is software that is required in order to run application programs and utilities.

mcqs.question_en: Yahoo Inc. stops its services in _____?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Yahoo Inc. has announced that the company has stopped providing service in mainland China with effect from November 01, 2021 , due to the increasingly challenging business and legal environment in the country. With this Yahoo has ended its 22-year presence in the Chinese market.

mcqs.question_en: You can set border in Excel from ___
mcqs.question_ur: آپ ایکسل میں__ سے بارڈر سیٹ کر سکتے ہیں
options: From Line Style tool in Drawing toolbar
You can not set page border in Excel
From Border tool in Formatting toolbar
mcqs.correct_answer: You can not set page border in Excel
mcqs.explanation: Explanation There is no option to set page border in Excel.

mcqs.question_en: You can auto fit the width of column by
options: Double clicking on the column name on column header
Double click on the cell pointer in worksheet
Double clicking on column right border on column header
mcqs.correct_answer: Double clicking on column right border on column header
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: ____ includes the selected text in the index of document.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Mark the entries Select the text you'd like to use as an index entry, or just click where you want to insert the entry. On the References tab, in the Index group, click Mark Entry. You can edit the text in the Mark Index Entry dialog box. Click Mark to mark the index entry.

mcqs.question_en: _______ are used for plotting graphs and design on paper.
mcqs.question_ur: کاغذ پر گراف اور ڈیزائن بنانے کے لیے کیا استعمال ہوتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A plotter is a machine that produces vector graphics drawings. Plotters draw lines on paper using a pen, or in some applications, use a knife to cut a material like vinyl or leather.

mcqs.question_en: ______ the cell pointer indicate that you can move the content to other cell .
options: Mouse Pointer with anchor at the tip
mcqs.correct_answer: Mouse Pointer with anchor at the tip
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Mouse Pointer with anchor at the tip cell pointer indicate that you can move the content to other cell.

mcqs.question_en: ________the cell pointer indicates that you can fill series
options: Mouse Pointer with anchor at the tip
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Small thin plus icon MS Excel solution image cell pointer indicates that you can fill series.

mcqs.question_en: __________software are specific to users need.
mcqs.question_ur: سافٹ ویئر صارفین کی ضرورت کے لیے ۔۔۔۔۔۔ مخصوص ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An application program is a computer program designed to carry out a specific task other than one relating to the operation of the computer itself, typically to be used by end-users. Word processors, media players, and accounting software are examples. The collective noun refers to all applications collectively.

mcqs.question_en: پندرہ سو پچاس میگا بائٹس میں کتنے گیگابائٹ سوتے ہیں
mcqs.explanation: Explanation 1000MB = 1GB

mcqs.question_en: “Ctrl + Down Arrow” Shortcut key is used in Ms Word to ____?
mcqs.question_ur: \"Ctrl Down Arrow\" شارٹ کٹ کی Ms Word to____________ میں استعمال ہوتی ہے؟
options: Moves the cursor one paragraph down
Moves the cursor one line down
Moves the cursor one page down
Moves the cursor one screen down
mcqs.correct_answer: Moves the cursor one paragraph down
mcqs.explanation: Explanation “Ctrl + Up Arrow ” Shortcut key is used in Microsoft Word to move the cursor one paragraph up.

mcqs.question_en: Windows 2007 is an ___
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An operating system is system software that manages computer hardware, software resources, and provides common services for computer programs.

mcqs.question_en: What is the three most popular social networking websites today ?
mcqs.question_ur: آج کل تین مقبول ترین سوشل نیٹ ورکنگ ویب سائٹس کون سی ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Facebook, Myspace, and Twitter are (or have been) among the most popular social networking websites. - Facebook is widely used worldwide. - Myspace was very popular in the early 2000s. - Twitter (now X) has been a key platform for social interaction and news sharing.

mcqs.question_en: When you find someone on a social networking site, what does this allow them to see
mcqs.question_ur: جب آپ سوشل نیٹ ورکنگ سائٹ پر کسی کو ڈھونڈتے ہیں، تو یہ انہیں کیا دیکھنے کی اجازت دیتا ہے۔
options: They can see all of things you put on private so only friends can see
Nothing the same as everyone else
They can see just your picture
mcqs.correct_answer: They can see all of things you put on private so only friends can see
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Most social networks allow users to create detailed online profiles and connect with other users in some way.

mcqs.question_en: Full form of wi fi
mcqs.question_ur: وائی ​​فائی کی مکمل شکل
mcqs.explanation: Explanation It works through radio waves Wi fi speed in USA is very fast

mcqs.question_en: A numeric value can be treated as label value if ________ precedes it.
mcqs.question_ur: عددی قدر کو لیبل ویلیو کے طور پر سمجھا جا سکتا ہے اگر ___ اس سے پہلے ہو۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An apostrophe before a cell value forces Excel to interpret the value as text. This is mostly useful for values that look like a number or date.

mcqs.question_en: Which combination of keys used as a shortcut for go to specific page ----?
mcqs.question_ur: مخصوص صفحہ پر جانے کے لیے شارٹ کٹ کے طور پر استعمال ہونے والی کلیدوں کا مجموعہ ----؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Alternatively referred to as Control G , Ctrl+G is a shortcut key most often used to go to a line or page.

mcqs.question_en: What underline Tag used in HTML ?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The <u> tag in HTML stands for underline, and it's used to underline the text enclosed within the <u> tag

mcqs.question_en: Which provided power to computer parts
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A power supply unit  converts mains AC to low-voltage regulated DC power for the internal components of a computer. Modern personal computers universally use switched-mode power supplies.

mcqs.question_en: Donald Trump, to launch his own social media platform, called _________?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈونلڈ ٹرمپ، اپنا سوشل میڈیا پلیٹ فارم شروع کیا ، جسے ___ کہا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Donald Trump, to launch his own social media platform, called Truth social

mcqs.question_en: Which Country fined Facebook’s WhatsApp a record 225 million euro ($266m) on Thursday, September 2, 2021?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ireland fined Facebook's WhatsApp a record 225 million euro ($266m) on Thursday for privacy breaches after the EU privacy watchdog pressured the country to take a tougher line with a bigger penalty.

mcqs.question_en: کمپیوٹر کس زبان کا لفظ ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The term ‘Computer’ is derived from a Latin word “computare” which means to “to calculate”, “to count”, “to sum up” or “to think together”. So, more precisely the word computer means a “device that performs computation“.

mcqs.question_en: CD ROM compact disc__________
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A CD-ROM is a pre-pressed optical compact disc that contains data. Computers can read—but not write or erase—CD-ROMs

mcqs.question_en: which printer is not a type of impact printer
mcqs.question_ur: کون سا پرنٹر اثر پرنٹر کی قسم نہیں ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The correct answer is an inkjet printer. Non-impact printers print  characters without the use of ribbons. Each of these printers prints a complete page, so it is also called a page printer. Example: Inkjet printer, laser printer

mcqs.question_en: What enables a computer to work smoothly with printers
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کو پرنٹرز کے ساتھ آسانی سے کام کرنے کے قابل کون بناتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: ASI stand for
mcqs.explanation: Explanation an Assistant sub-inspector (ASI) is a non-gazetted police officer ranking above a police head constable and below a Sub-inspector.

mcqs.question_en: ROM is an example of ____
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Read-only memory is a type of non-volatile memory used in computers and other electronic devices. Data stored in ROM cannot be electronically modified after the manufacture of the memory device.

mcqs.question_en: RAM and ROM difference
options: Ram stands for Random Access Memory
Ram operation is read and write
جواب نیچے وضاحت کے ساتھ پڑھیں میں دیا گیا ہے
mcqs.correct_answer: جواب نیچے وضاحت کے ساتھ پڑھیں میں دیا گیا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation RAM and ROM difference Sr# RAM ROM 1. Ram stands for Random Access Memory ROM stands for read-only memory , 2. Ram operation is read and write Ram operation is only read 3. It is like something written on sand which is temporary and would be erased. It is like something written on stone that cannot be removed or changed once written. 4. It is temporary memory , also called volatile memory. It is permanent storage devise and data remains safe on ROM even when computer is off also called non-volatile memory. 5. RAM stores information which is currently processed by computer. When power off, it loses all the information. Data can be read, stored, modified or delete from the RAM. It contains information related to computer startup process which is written at the time of memory manufacturing 6. volatile memory non-volatile memory 7. It is a high-speed memory. It is much slower than the RAM. 8. Large size with higher capacity. 1 to 256 GB per chip Small size with less capacity. 4 to 8 MB per chip 9. Types: Static RAM, Dynamic RAM Types: Programmable ROM (PROM), Erasable Programmable ROM (EPROM), Electrically Erasable Programmable ROM (EEPROM), Mask ROM,

mcqs.question_en: Ram operation is ______
mcqs.explanation: Explanation RAM and ROM difference Sr# RAM ROM 1. Ram stands for Random Access Memory ROM stands for read-only memory , 2. Ram operation is read and write Ram operation is only read 3. It is like something written on sand which is temporary and would be erased. It is like something written on stone that cannot be removed or changed once written. 4. It is temporary memory , also called volatile memory. It is permanent storage devise and data remains safe on ROM even when computer is off also called non-volatile memory. 5. RAM stores information which is currently processed by computer. When power off, it loses all the information. Data can be read, stored, modified or delete from the RAM. It contains information related to computer startup process which is written at the time of memory manufacturing 6. volatile memory non-volatile memory 7. It is a high-speed memory. It is much slower than the RAM. 8. Large size with higher capacity. 1 to 256 GB per chip Small size with less capacity. 4 to 8 MB per chip 9. Types: Static RAM, Dynamic RAM Types: Programmable ROM (PROM), Erasable Programmable ROM (EPROM), Electrically Erasable Programmable ROM (EEPROM), Mask ROM,

mcqs.question_en: Microsoft excel is a powerful______
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ ایکسل ایک طاقتور __ ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Microsoft Excel is Microsoft's general-purpose spreadsheet program for Windows, used for data analysis and display. It is commonly used in a business environment since it is part of the Microsoft Office package.

mcqs.question_en: To select an entire column in MS Excel, press?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To select an entire column in MS-EXCEL, Click the column heading letter or press CTRL + Space Bar key.

mcqs.question_en: What do you mean by a workspace ?
mcqs.question_ur: ورک اسپیس سے آپ کا کیا مطلب ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The term workspace refers to all the open workbooks and their exact screen position and window sizes.

mcqs.question_en: Multiple calculations can be made in a single formula using
mcqs.explanation: Explanation An array formula is a formula that can perform multiple calculations on one or more of the items in an array. We can think of an array as a row of values, a column of values, or a combination of rows and columns of values. Array formulas can return either multiple results or a single result.

mcqs.question_en: What is the shortcut key to replace data with another in sheet ?
mcqs.question_ur: شیٹ میں ڈیٹا کو دوسرے سے تبدیل کرنے کے لیے شارٹ کٹ کلید کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ctrl + H shortcut key is used to replace a data with another in sheet.

mcqs.question_en: Edit> Delete Command
mcqs.question_ur: ترمیم کریں> کمانڈ کو حذف کریں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Deletes selected cells through Edit > Delete command was available in Excel 2003 and earlier versions.

mcqs.question_en: To remove the content of selected cells you must issue ___ commands
mcqs.question_ur: منتخب سیلز کے مواد کو ہٹانے کے لیے آپ کوکونسے کمانڈز جاری کرنے ہوں گے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To remove the content of selected cells we must issue Clear Contents command. Clear Contents will clear only the data, will not clear any formats.

mcqs.question_en: The command Edit >Fill Across worksheet is active only when
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Click the Fill button in the Editing group , and then click Across Worksheet a command only appears when we have multiple worksheets selected.

mcqs.question_en: Long text can be broken down into many lines within a cell.You can do this through
mcqs.question_ur: لمبے متن کو سیل کے اندر کئی لائنوں میں توڑا جا سکتا ہے۔ آپ یہ کس کے ذریعے کر سکتے ہیں۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Microsoft Excel can wrap text so it appears on multiple lines in a cell. We can format the cell so the text wraps automatically, or enter a manual line break.

mcqs.question_en: MS Excel provides the default value for step in fill series dialogue box
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ایکسل اسٹیپ ان فل سیریز ڈائیلاگ باکس کے لیے کتنی ڈیفالٹ ویلیو فراہم کرتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The default value for any series is 1 in Excel.

mcqs.question_en: Where can you change automatic or manual collection mode in Excel ?
options: Double CAL indicator on status bar
Go to File > Options > Formulas > Calculation Option - and mark the corresponding radio button
mcqs.correct_answer: Go to File > Options > Formulas > Calculation Option - and mark the corresponding radio button
mcqs.explanation: Explanation When you press F9 or click Calc Sheet on the Calculation tab on the Tools/Options menu. Calculation also occurs every time that you save the file if you have the checkbox "Recalculate workbook before saving" checked under File > Options > Formulas.

mcqs.question_en: Can you merge the main document with data source in excel. In mail merge operation, the word usually
mcqs.explanation: Explanation main document can merge with data source in Excel. In mail merge operation, Word is usually Client

mcqs.question_en: The name box on to the left of formula bar
options: Shows the name of worksheet currently working on
Shows the name of cell or range currently working on
Shows the name of workbook currently working on
mcqs.correct_answer: Shows the name of cell or range currently working on
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Name Box refers to an input box directly to the left of the formula bar. The Name Box normally displays the address of the " active cell" on the worksheet. You can also use the name box to quickly create a named range.

mcqs.question_en: Tab scroll buttons are place on excel screen
options: Towards the bottom top right corner
mcqs.explanation: Explanation On the bottom left of the worksheet we find the Sheet Tab Scroll Buttons to move to the First sheet, Previous sheet, Next sheet, and Last sheet. They are followed by the tabs for the worksheets in our workbook and the Insert Worksheet button or tab, depending on the version of Excel we are using.

mcqs.question_en: When a range is selected, how can you activate the previous?
mcqs.question_ur: جب ایک رینج منتخب کی جاتی ہے، تو آپ پچھلی کو کیسے چالو کر سکتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation To go to previous cell we use Go To function Ctrl + G.

mcqs.question_en: When all the numbers between 0 and 100 in a range should be displayed in red color apply
options: Use =if() function to format the required numbers red
Apply Conditional Formatting command on Format menu
mcqs.correct_answer: Apply Conditional Formatting command on Format menu
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A conditional format changes the appearance of cells on the basis of conditions that you specify. If the conditions are true, the cell range is formatted; if the conditions are false, the cell range is not formatted .

mcqs.question_ur: دو مصنوعات کی فروخت کی کارکردگی کا موازنہ کرنے کے لیے آپ کس قسم کا چارٹ استعمال کریں گے؟

mcqs.question_en: Storage devices ___
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A hardware device which can be used to store digital data and applications which may be in the form of images, video, audio, etc. is called a storage device. It is a key component of a computer and the hard drive is one of its examples.

mcqs.question_en: Function of a joystick is similar to that of _____
mcqs.question_ur: جوائس اسٹک کا فنکشن کس سے ملتا جلتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A joystick is the easiest and most effective way of operating a mouse. They work in a similar manner to the joystick control on a wheelchair. The mouse pointer moves fastest when the joystick is pushed fully in any direction .

mcqs.question_en: Storage devices holder ______-.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation There are two types of storage devices used with computers: a primary storage device, such as RAM, and a secondary storage device, such as a hard drive.

mcqs.question_en: Scrambling of code is called ___
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In cryptography, encryption is the process of encoding information. This process converts the original representation of the information, known as plain text , into an alternative form known as cipher text .

mcqs.question_en: A person who is used his or her expertise to gain access to other people computers is called________
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A hacker is an individual who uses computer, networking or other skills to overcome a technical problem.

mcqs.question_en: All of the following are examples of storage devices except
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Types of Printers Laser Printers. Solid Ink Printers. LED Printers. Business Inkjet Printers. Home Inkjet Printers. Multi function Printers. Dot Matrix Printers. 3D Printers.

mcqs.question_en: Where are saved files are stored in______
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: The expression builder is an access tool that controls an expression___ for entering an expression
mcqs.explanation: Explanation

mcqs.question_en: The size of yes/no field is always ________
mcqs.question_ur: ہاں/نہیں فیلڈ کا سائز ہمیشہ کیا ہوتا ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A Yes/No field in databases (like Microsoft Access) is designed to store only two possible values: true (yes) or false (no). 1- Binary Nature 2- Space Efficiency The actual logical size of the Yes/No field is just 1 bit because it only needs to represent two states.

mcqs.question_en: A window can have ______ states
mcqs.explanation: Explanation For the purposes of listing the window state elements, window state is classified into three types: base state, frame buffer capability state, and layer state.

mcqs.question_en: From where we can change the name of an User Account ?
mcqs.question_ur: ہم صارف اکاؤنٹ کا نام کہاں سے تبدیل کر سکتے ہیں؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The Control Panel is a component of Microsoft Windows that provides the ability to view and change system settings.

mcqs.question_en: Digital device is ____
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیجیٹل ڈیوائس کونسی ہے
mcqs.explanation: Explanation a clock that displays the time in numerical digits rather than by hands on a dial.

mcqs.question_en: OMR is ____
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Optical mark reader  is a method of entering data into a computer system. Optical Mark Readers reads pencil or pen marks made in pre-defined positions on paper forms as responses to questions or tick list prompts

mcqs.question_en: Word computer which means____
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر جس کا مطلب ہے ____
mcqs.explanation: Explanation First electronic digital computer called the ENIAC during the years 1943-1946, ENIAC based on the prior invention of a small, special-purpose vacuum .

mcqs.question_en: What do you use to convert lines into bullet lists?

mcqs.question_en: ___ is the term used when one has to press and hold the left mouse key and move the mouse around the slide.
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Dragging is used to move an object from one position to another position on the computer screen.

mcqs.question_en: What is the default slide name in presentation?
mcqs.question_ur: پریزنٹیشن میں سلائیڈ کا ڈیفالٹ نام کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PowerPoint= presentation1 Excel= Book1 Word = document1

mcqs.question_en: Cell range in Excel from A1 cell to M12 will be written as ?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation cell range using the cell addresses of the first and last cells in the cell range, separated by a colon. For example, a cell range that included cells A1, A2, A3, A4, and A5 would be written as A1:A5.

mcqs.question_en: What is used to split long text in excel within the cell?
mcqs.question_ur: سیل کے اندر ایکسل میں طویل متن کو تقسیم کرنے کے لیے کیا استعمال کیا جاتا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation On the Data tab, in the Data Tools group, click Text to Columns. The Convert Text to Columns Wizard opens. Choose Delimited if it is not already selected, and then click Next. Select the delimiter or delimiters to define the places where you want to split the cell content.

mcqs.question_en: When sharing data in office , the ____ document is the document in which the data was first entered .
mcqs.question_ur: دفتر میں ڈیٹا کا اشتراک کرتے وقت، کونسی دستاویز وہ دستاویز ہوتی ہے جس میں ڈیٹا پہلی بار درج کیا گیا تھا۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A source document is a document in which data collected for a clinical trial is first recorded.

mcqs.question_en: A template stores ____
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A template stores Graphics, text, styles, macros, customized word command setting, auto text entries.

mcqs.question_en: What is the default slide name in MS Word ?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں ڈیفالٹ سلائیڈ کا نام کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation PowerPoint= presentation1 Excel= Book1 Word = document1

mcqs.question_ur: کس سافٹ ویئر سلائیڈ میں ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation presentation software includes : Visme, Haiku Deck, Prezi, Microsoft Powerpoint

mcqs.question_en: What is the minimum length of Wi-fi password?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Wi-Fi stands for Wireless fidelity. Minimum length of Wi-Fi password = 8 Maximum length of Wi-Fi password = 63

mcqs.question_en: A top to bottom relationship among the items in a data base is established by a
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Hierarchical Schema. In hierarchical database model, the data is organized into a tree-like structure and the data is stored as records which are connected to one another through links.

mcqs.question_en: The software that are enhancement of a single package are called:
mcqs.question_ur: وہ سافٹ ویئر جو ایک پیکج کو بڑھاتے ہیں کیا کہلاتے ہیں
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The vertical integration of software is all about improving the functionality of your software by dividing your overall software system up into subsystems and then integrating those subsystems together according to the functions that they perform.

mcqs.question_en: What type of Software is needed to control the computer’s hardware?
mcqs.question_ur: کمپیوٹر کے ہارڈ ویئر کو کنٹرول کرنے کے لیے کس قسم کے سافٹ ویئر کی ضرورت ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The type of software that is used to control a computer is known as the operating system (OS).

mcqs.question_en: What is the default fount size in a new word document based on normal template in word 2003?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In Word 2003 and earlier versions, default font size was Times New Roman, 12 pt. From Microsoft Word 2007 and higher versions default font size is Calibri, 11 pt.

mcqs.question_en: Using ms word, we can simply :
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Microsoft Word is a graphical word processing program that users can type with. It is made by the computer company Microsoft. Its purpose is to allow users to type and save documents. Similar to other word processors, it has helpful tools to make documents.

mcqs.question_en: When Microsoft released first version of Windows?
mcqs.question_ur: مائیکروسافٹ نے ونڈوز کا پہلا ورژن کب جاری کیا؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The first version of Windows, released in 1985, was simply a GUI offered as an extension of Microsoft's existing disk operating system, or MS-DOS.

mcqs.question_en: What is UTP known for?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Unshielded t wisted pair  is a u biquitous type of copper cabling used in telephone wiring and local area networks .

mcqs.question_en: What is needed to establish a network within 100 m range?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A local area network is a computer network that interconnects computers within a limited area such as a residence, school, laboratory, university campus or office building.

mcqs.question_en: Page layouts in MS Word?
mcqs.question_ur: ایم ایس ورڈ میں صفحہ کی ترتیب؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Word offers two-page orientation options: landscape and portrait. ND26-9-2023

mcqs.question_en: What is required when more than one person uses a central computer at the same time _________?
mcqs.question_ur: کیا ضرورت ہے جب ایک ہی وقت میں ایک سے زیادہ شخص مرکزی کمپیوٹر استعمال کرتا ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A terminal is required when more than one person uses a central computer at the same time. The word " terminal " comes from early computer systems it is used to send commands to other computers and enter data it is an electronic or electromechanical hardware device

mcqs.question_en: When we look at he cost, which of the following computer is most expensive?
mcqs.question_ur: جب ہم اس کی قیمت کو دیکھتے ہیں تو درج ذیل میں سے کون سا کمپیوٹر سب سے مہنگا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A supercomputer is a computer that performs at or near the currently highest operational rate for computers. Traditionally, supercomputers have been used for scientific and engineering applications that must handle very large databases or do a great amount of computation.

mcqs.question_en: The computer Language is written in only two numbers 0 and 1 is called :
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Binary number is a number expressed in the base-2 numeral system or binary numeral system, a method of mathematical expression which uses only two symbols: typically "0"  and "1".

mcqs.question_en: What is the most important invention of 20th century?
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Computer is an electronic device for storing and processing data, typically in binary form, according to instructions given to it in a variable program.

mcqs.question_en: What is the source of exchange of information?
mcqs.question_ur: معلومات کے تبادلے کا ذریعہ کیا ہے؟
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Internet is a global computer network providing a variety of information and communication facilities, consisting of interconnected networks using standardized communication protocols.

mcqs.question_en: Electronic commerce E.Commerce means trade with the help of
mcqs.explanation: Explanation Ecommerce, also known as electronic commerce or internet commerce, refers to the buying and selling of goods or services using the internet, and the transfer of money and data to execute these transactions.

mcqs.question_en: What is a composite key in a database?
mcqs.question_ur: ڈیٹا بیس میں جامع کلید کیا ہے؟
options: Set of one or more attribute that can be used to uniquely identify the records in a table
The minimal set of attribute that uniquely identifies each occurrence of an entity type
The candidate key that  is selected to uniquely identify each occurrence of an entity type
A candidate key that consists of two or more attributes
mcqs.correct_answer: A candidate key that consists of two or more attributes
mcqs.explanation: Explanation In database design, a composite key is a candidate key that consists of two or more attributes (table columns) that together uniquely identify an entity occurrence (table row). A compound key is a composite key for which each attribute that makes up the key is a simple (foreign) key in its own right.

mcqs.question_en: This the invention of modern world:
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A computer is a machine that can be instructed to carry out sequences of arithmetic or logical operations automatically via computer programming. Modern computers have the ability to follow generalized sets of operations, called programs.

mcqs.question_en: Software application would be the most appropriate for performing numerical and statistical calculations .
mcqs.question_ur: عددی اور شماریاتی حسابات کو انجام دینے کے لیے کونسی سافٹ ویئر ایپلیکیشن سب سے زیادہ موزوں ہوگی۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation A spreadsheet is a software program you use to easily perform mathematical calculations on statistical data and totaling long columns of numbers or determining percentages and averages.

mcqs.question_en: Which alignment is used in news paper and novals
mcqs.question_ur: نیوز پیپر اور ناول میں کون سی صف بندی استعمال ہوتی ہے۔
mcqs.explanation: Explanation The edge of paper page and columns is known as margin.
